66a5: kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol du khrid kyi 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung cig phur ba las ni gzhon na
66a6: 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs 'di nyid las rgal bar ma gyur grang / 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung gcig bor ro// snyam du bsams nas 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi ngogs de nyid
66a7: las rgal te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo rgyad ring po nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te ci nas kyang ngas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya
66a8: ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bas gzhon nu grags bstan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba jis
66b1: byamangadapar 'dumadzad pas khyim bdag gas gcabs gzhan nagrags pa san nyad la 'dug pazhan dum mthang pa bram 'o/ / de nas byam bdag gis// gcam com ldan das ga pa ma
66b2: byar dam rnams nal di da kyis gsas/ / brtsam lan 'as cigagan nagags pa gagasas pa/ byam pa / 'gyur 'dag shig dang / rgyan 'i kho sa gzhon nu grags pa pa
66b3: gnas garang yin pa yod do/ / de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gca pa 'di snyam dus mas te/ gdan mi zla bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan nu grags pa gzigs par gyur te 'ad lta bcom ldan 'das 'dis
66b4: khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang stan 'di kho na la gzhon nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yad da zhes bka' phral te snyam du riganas dga' ba mag pa dang / mchog tu ga' bdang /
66b5: dga' ba rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag rigs kyi gtsa ba la bcom ldan 'das
66b6: kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rgyas
66b7: so/ / tshe dang ldan pa grags pa yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar brtul
66b8: nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ rgyan gyis brgyan bzhi nar ni chos spyad de/ dul zhing yang dag sdom pa tshangs spyod la// 'byung po kun la chad pa spangs pa ni// da ni bram ze dge sbyong dge slong yin// de'i
67a1: 'jig tan na dgra bcom badrug dang bdun panabacom ldan 'dasas/ / khyam bdag gas bya gnabs gzhan na grags bstan nyid la 'dug pa mang / nga nas kyang gno dkrugs pa la dzin dang /
67a2: smras so// gzhon nu tshur shog/ khyod kyi ma lus ngal zheng lus dub pas smre sngags 'don gyis khyim du 'dod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag ji snyam
67a3: du sems/ gang gis me slob pa'i shes pa dang mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang kun 'thung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs pa de jig khyim pa gyis na na pa' ma rdzogs 'jog
67a4: gi longs spyod kyis 'dod pa la longs spyod par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa ma lags so// khyim bdag ji ltar khyod kyis slob pa'i shes pa dang / slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun
67a5: 'byung dang 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs pa de bzhin du gzhon nu grags pas mi slob pa'i ye shes dang mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang /
67a6: lam mngon par rtogs so// btsun pa gzhon nu grags pas gang gis na mi slob pa'i shes pa dang mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam mngon par rtog pa ni/
67a7: rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so// bcom ldan 'das slad bzhin du 'brang ba'i dge sbyong grags pa dang / thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste rigs kyi gtso bo gang na ba der gshegs na legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag
67a8: rigs kyi gtso bo la cang mi gsung bas snang ngo / / de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
67b1: spyan snga nas sang ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dron bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lung gzed dang / chos gos bskams te phyi bzhin 'brang ba dag sbyong tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang / khyim /
67b2: rigs kyi gtso bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du bsu ba'i phyir bar sgo na sdod do// tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma
67b3: gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so//
67b4: bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das/
67b5: kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang
67b6: dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng stod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/
67b7: sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i rjes su
67b8: sngags pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do// gang gi tshe de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang / sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa
68a1: dang / yang dag bral gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bdan pa bzhig//
68a2: sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam rgya cher bshad do// dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'dzin du btub pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa grags
68a3: pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i mdang
68a4: chung ma gnyis kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis me bkri ba dang / ston pas
68a5: bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so// /
68a6: bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol// deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te
68a7: skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dang lags so/ / btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo //
68a8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung pas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das gdan la bde bar bzhugs pa dang / gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba
68b1: dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin cing phyag
68b2: bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang / chung ma gnyis la chos
68b3: dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
68b4: gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las gzhengs te gshegs so// ba ra na se na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso ba'i bya
68b5: gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/
68b6: dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma
68b7: yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar gyi rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa re shig shin du gzhon pa/ shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang sgra dang / kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par
68b8: rab tu byung gis/ ma la bdag cag gis kyang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/ dad pas yang dag pa kho na khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa
69a1: dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang lnga pa gang po dang / dri med dang / bal glang bdag dang / lag bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams bar na se nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags
69a2: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa gang po dang / dri ma
69a3: med pa dang / ba yang bdag dang / lag bzangs te/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag cag rab tu 'byung ba dang //
69a4: bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu
69a5: byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so// gcig pu dben pa
69a6: bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong bar gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu de dag skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa/
69a7: tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa che 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon du byas de bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa rten to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes
69a8: go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin du rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ / de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu dang / bcu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so// bA ra na
69b1: sen grong mi gtso ba rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcus rigs kyi gtse ba'i bu dang po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / ldab skye grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs te rigs kyi gtsun
69b2: bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma
69b3: yin zhing / chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa ste grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang /
69b4: lag bzangs te rigs kyi gtse bo'i bu rnams ni re shig shin du gzhon pa/ shin tu bde ba 'dod pa yang skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis/
69b5: ma la bdag cag kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung de snyam mo// de nas grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag bA ra na se nas
69b6: byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas grong mi'i gtso bo'i khye'u lde bcu po dag
69b7: gos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das
69b8: kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste// de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa
70a1: @/ / de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod brtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so// gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa tun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtong bar gnas pa na gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu de dag snga ma
70a2: bzhin du ji srid sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ / de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug bcu dang / drug bcu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
70a3: ba ra na se'i drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slong
70a4: dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /
70a5: bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing deng la khyed gnyis shig ni cig tu ma 'gro zhig/ nga yang lte rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di bar na
70a6: se'i drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags su 'dug nas de nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces chos ston te/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang ma'i/
70a7: 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar du ste/ da yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing 'gro'o// zhes
70a8: zer gyis/ ma la bdag gis de la 'di lta ste/ dkrug pa'i las shig bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khye'u yi cha byadad du dag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/
70b1: phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ ma grol grol bar 'du shes na// ji ltar bdag nyid grol bar sems// bdag gis dge sbyong ma grol bas// 'ching ba chen pos bcings pa
70b2: yin/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te/ 'di lta ste bkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongs so snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga ni lha dang
70b3: mi rnams kyi/ / 'ching ba gang yin kun las grol// bar chad byed pa khyod bcom par// sdig can de ltar shes par gyis// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i sems kyis bdag shes so
70b4: snyam du rig nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la yid gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyis su yang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga ni lha dang mi rnams
70b5: kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin no/ / dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ rgyu
70b6: zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gad na ba der gshegs so// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas
70b7: ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bA ra na ser ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / grong khyer
70b8: sde can du byon no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ras bal can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas shing zhig gi drung du brten te nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs so// de'i tshe drug bcu sde bzang po'i
71a1: tshogs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol du nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na de rnams las bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros so// /
71a2: de nas drug bcwa sde bzang po'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras bal gyi nags tshang tshing gangan ba de dong ba dang / drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa dang bar 'os pa/ dbang po zhib/ thugs zhig
71a3: thugs mchog tu rul ba/ zhi ba dang / dul ba dang ldan pa/ gser gyi mchod sdod lta bur dpal gyis 'bar zhing shing zhig gi drung na brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste
71a4: lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ga bud med gcig gzigs sam/ gzhon nu dag bud med de khyed cag gi cir 'od/ btsun pa 'di na bdag cag drug bcu sde bzang po'i
71a5: tshegs grong khyer sde can gyi slad rol tu bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyid de/ de rnams dang bdag cag rtse bar bgyid dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod
71a6: par bgyid pa na/ bud med gcig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshol lags so// gzhon nu dag ji snyam du sems/ bud med tshol ba gang yin pa dang / bdag nyid tshol ba gang ba dam/ btsun pa bdag cag
71a7: la bud med kyis ci bgyis/ bdag cag ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags pa de gdams lags so// gzhon nu dag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang khyed la chos bshad do// de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom
71a8: ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan pa
71b1: la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ / de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bani po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs
71b2: so/ / de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting ste bas pa dang / so ma nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan
71b3: gyis mi dkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jig pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gdan ba der logs su thal mo sbyar re btud nas bcom ldan 'das la
71b4: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung
71b5: du gsol/ / deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// de nas drug bcu sde bzang po'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mngon par dga' ste rjes su
71b6: yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas snga dron bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos
71b7: bsnams te grong khyer bde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma langs grong khyer sde can der thog mar su zhig la chos bshad
71b8: snyam pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ des grod pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la thog mar tshes bshad par bya ste/ de dag gi sad sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson pas
72a1: gnas pa na 'dir mang gas dang 'thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar bas bsnyen bkrang byas so snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das grang ba'i bu mo dga' ma dang / dga' stabs ma'i byal gangan ba dang gshegs pa
72a2: grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobasams bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gad na ba shams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon//
72a3: bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa de 'di la bzhugs so// de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /
72a4: dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma 'chos dang ldan pa
72a5: gtam gyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba nas/ mngon par dad nas skyabs su song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobasams bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
72a6: btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs
72a7: m as bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig cing bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang gca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de rnam grangs
72a8: du mar btsang zhing bsod pa'i gza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te phyag bcabs shing lhung bded zung par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig
72b1: blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang / dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang
72b2: dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par bzed bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can nas gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgos
72b3: te/ ngas yul ma ga d+ha 'dir dang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang zhig dbang du byas na de dbang du gyur pas tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snyam mo// de'i
72b4: tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas pa 'khogs gtugs pa zhig yod pa de ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par
72b5: bya bas dgra bcom par bkur cing 'khor lnga brgya dang nai ra Na dza nA'i chu klung gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas
72b6: nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa 'di ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ ma langs lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dbang du
72b7: bya ste 'di dbang du gyur na tshegs chung ngus skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas ga na ba der gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od srung
72b8: ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// dge sbyong chen po tshur spyon// dge sbyong chen po byon pa
73a1: legs so/ / dge slong chen po yub ring po zhig lags na gang nas 'khor 'dir byon// dge sbyong chen po gdan gshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig ba gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams pa
73a2: nyid la bzhugs so/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang // bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i btam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs gcig
73a3: tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi me khang du bzhag gcig cig 'dug go// dge sbyong chen po bdag
73a4: lam bde ba ma mchis na/ 'on kyang de na klu gdug pa zhig gnas te des khyod tho btsams par gyur du mchi'o// 'od srung khyod kyis re shig gnang bar gyis shig dang mtho btsams par mi 'gyur ro// dge sbyong chen po
73a5: gal te khyod la tho ma'i tsham na dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar bzhugs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang gdan bder gshegs te byon nas me khang gi byings sunabs pase nas pa
73a6: me khang gi nang du zhugs te/ nyid kyis rtsa'i gdade ba bshams nas skra drang por bsrang ste skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhugs so// klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas
73a7: mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang khros pa'i mthus dud pa phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dud pa byung ngo // klu gdug pas khro ba'i mthus 'bar bar byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i khams la
73a8: snyoms par zhugs so/ / de nas klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthu dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me lang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun du rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas sreg par byed do//
73b1: rgyas 'od srung ral pa can mtshan mo rgyu ska la lta ban me 'ang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar kun du rab tu 'bar te// me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg pa mthongango / mthong nas kyang 'idi snyam du sems te// dge sbyong chen po/
73b2: gau ta ma 'di ltar mdzes pa klu gdug pas thal bar byas par ma gyur na grang kyi hud nyon mongs bdag gi tshig ma mnyan to snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor nga
73b3: bcas pas cha spyad kyis/ / ma langs rdzu 'phrul ji lta bur mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa'i mi zil gyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod par mi byed cing de dul bar byas nas lhung
73b4: bzad kyi nang du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par bzhag na mes klu gdug pa
73b5: me zil gyis mnan la/ des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa de lta bu mngon par 'du badzad de/ de dul bar mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste/ lteng rgyas 'od srung gangan ba der bsnams te gshegs so// lteng rgyas 'od
73b6: srung ram pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong / / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhigi 'od srung gson no// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi klu
73b7: bzad na bsnams te byon pa ci/ 'od srung klu gdug pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi ges du mir gyur pa// rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan pa gnas su mi ster bde das btul nas lhung bzed du bcug nas khyer te 'ongs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'ong
73b8: srang ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag cag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
74a1: can gyi bsti gnas gyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod pa re re'i me thab gsum gsum te/ methab
74a2: stong lnga brgya yod do/ / de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na me spar bar ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lted rgyas 'od srung ral pa tsan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lteng rgyas 'od
74a3: srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ / mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na zhugs te spar bar rngo ma thog lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di
74a4: snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhigs byung grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
74a5: skad ces gsol to/ / dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam me la yongs su spyod par 'tshal na/ me de spar bar rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor
74a6: na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grad snyam bgyid do/ / 'od srung me sbar bar 'dod dam/ dge sbyong chen po spar du gsol// de nas 'di snyam ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams
74a7: kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to/ / de nas lte nga rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no// /
74a8: gam mo de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams me la yongs su spyad nas me bsad par 'dod na bsad par ma nus so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gad na ba der dong ste lhags nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la
74b1: 'di skad ces smras so/ / mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongs su spyad pa nas zhugs dgu ma lar 'tshal na dgus pa'i rngom thog lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can 'di
74b2: snyam du sems te/ dge slong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
74b3: gsol to/ / dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams zhugs pa la yongs su spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na dgum pa'i rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
74b4: gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byu grang snyam bgyid do/ / 'od srung me de bsad dam/ dge spyong chen po du ma dugaso'o// de nas 'di sang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus
74b5: me de rang nyid shi'o/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas
74b6: yang dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can rang nyid me la yongs su spyod par 'dod na spar bar ma nus so zhes bya ba nas/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de bzhin du yongs
74b7: su spyad nas bsad par 'dod na zhes bya ba nas/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng nga rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ 3
74b8: darab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa de la lte nga rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis bsgrims kyang bsad par ma nus so// de nas ster
75a1: rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar mgyur grang snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das
75a2: gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// dge sbyong chen po 'dir bdag gi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/
75a3: me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa de la bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bsgrims na zhugs dgum pa'i rngo ma thog nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nya 'khor
75a4: na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do/ / 'od srung me de zhi bar bya'am/ dge sbyong chen po zhi bar mdzad du gsol// de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
75a5: mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan
75a6: chetshe mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags
75a7: pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te/
75a8: me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod de 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu
75b1: 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa yod do snyam mo/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
75b2: skad ces gsol to/ / dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag mdang sum rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te ma
75b3: lce gcig tu gyur te sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongs su spyod do// 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce cig/
75b4: tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa bzhi mchis so snyam mo// 'od srung ci me la yongs su spyod dam/ dme la yongs su mi spyod de/ mkhas pa kun nas nyon mongs las// sems ni yongs su bzlog byed kyi// me'am yang na chu dag
75b5: la/ / yongs bsten yon tan ci zhig yod// de lta mod kyi 'dir mdang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na nga gang na ba der 'ongs te lhags nas nga'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/
75b6: de rnams dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi po lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du//
75b7: sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/ bcom
75b8: ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po de dag pas ches
76a1: lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na mo'i phung po
76a2: 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phaH/
76a3: pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das gan ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ de dper na me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas/ me'i phung po
76a4: chen po lnga po de me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed do/ / zhes bya ba'i bar de dag pas kyang lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi
76a5: mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar zhes bya ba nas/ dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo
76a6: shes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no/ / de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la bab po// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams
76a7: k yis dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin par shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas yod kyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang
76a8: ci ma rung snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas zhag bdun gzhan du bzhud do// de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang / bkur/
76b1: ste chen po byung nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang ldan pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin pa dang 'di snyam du
76b2: sems te/ zhag bdun po 'di la bdag la rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung nas bza' ba dang / bca' bar rab tu mang po dang ldan/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis kye mang ni dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung /
76b3: bdag gis de yang de la bsod snyoms spyod du gzhug go snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gshegs so//
76b4: lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod ci'i
76b5: slad du zhag bdun 'di nas bzhud lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bab nas 'di snyam du gal te ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar
76b6: m thu che ba yin no bar shes na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de ltar ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyam sems pa
76b7: ma yin nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo // 'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du bdag lazhag bdun du
76b8: rnyed pa dang / bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang / bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs
77a1: spyod du gzhug go snyam du sems pa ma yin nam dge sbyong chen po de lta lag so/ / nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas da 'ongs pa yin no// dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nor longs spyad du gsol/ de
77a2: nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
77a3: pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / dge sbyong chen po de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs shig dang bdag gis/ khyod la chos dang 'thun pa'i mtsho basbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas
77a4: 'od srung ral pa can la cad mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
77a5: la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / dge sbyong chen po gdugs chod lags shing mchis na dge sbyong chen po de de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol// 'od srung de'i phyir song shig nga yang 'ong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
77a6: s kyeng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam cu
77a7: snye ma rnams kyis lhung zed bkang nas bsnams te/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gdan ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// /
77a8: de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//
77b1: dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srung 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir das 'od srungs khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing 'dzam bu
77b2: z hes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na
77b3: longs spyod cig/ dge sbyong chen po ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi
77b4: bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no/ snyam mo/ shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de dang / ha cang mi ring ba zhig na a ru ra'i nags dang / bil ba'i nags dang / ka ba di tha'i nags dang / skyu ru ra'i
77b5: nags kyang de bzhin no/ / byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lus lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas lted rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bsti gnas gad na ba der gshegs te byon nas
77b6: gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bstiganas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
77b7: mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 'od srungs 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ras 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam
77b8: bzhag na byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig/ dge slong
78a1: chen po ci bde ba kho nar 'tshal lags so/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom
78a2: pa yin no snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs gzhan zhig du bdug pa nas sa zas kyi bya ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa
78a3: zhig byung ngo / / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang /
78a4: nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste chu bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu'i bya ba mdzad do// steng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po byung ste chu 'bab pa mthong ngo // mthong nas 'di snyam du
78a5: sems te chu 'di sngon ni med na chu 'di de ltar gang nas byung snyam mo/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen/
78a6: par mdzad du gsol// bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po'i chab cig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ma mchis na da ltar chu 'di gang nas bab snyam bgyid do// 'od
78a7: srung 'dir khyod las bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa na ngal chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo / / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nga la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes
78a8: nas nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i mdun du lag pas sa la snun pa las de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ba de la ngas chus tshu bya ba mdzad do 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu
78b1: 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma red du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na bde gshegs
78b2: te byon nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzib lag pas rkos par zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas/ rdzing lag pas rkos pa nas byung bar bzhed pa na shing ardzun
78b3: gang na ba de logs su phyag brgyang ngo / / de nas ardzuna'i yal ga chen po dud par gyur te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis gzung nas rdzing lag pas rkos pa nas byung ngo // ltar rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa ni/
78b4: rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na a rdzu na'i yal ga chen po dud pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ a rdzu na'i yal ga 'di sngon ni dud par ma gyur na/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'did su zhig gis
78b5: btud snyam mo/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti
78b6: gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas rkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dud par mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ a rdzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni dud par ma gyur nad su zhig
78b7: gis btud snyam bgyid do/ / 'od srung 'dir phyi ma red nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ rdzing lag pas bgos pa'i 'gram gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha'
78b8: gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste rdzing lag pas brkos par zhugs te lus khrus byas nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar 'dod nas shing a rdzun 'di dag gang na ba der logs su lag pa
79a1: brkyang ba dang / de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di dud par gyur te/ de la ngas 'dus nas rdzid lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo // 'od srung 'di ni a rdzun lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o// de nas
79a2: ldeng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phral che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan tshe med kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
79a3: kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i shana'i ras gang du bkru snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems
79a4: gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes nas ri brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan
79a5: 'das phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 'di la bkru bar gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod
79a6: pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du da gram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas brag gcig las rdo leb tshe la ring ba zhig khyer nas/ bcom ldan
79a7: 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams dgram du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i
79a8: sha na'i ras dag bkram mo/ / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring ba dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'dis/ du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni med na rdo leb cha la ring
79b1: ba 'di dgar su zhig khyer te 'ong snyam mo/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad
79b2: du gsol/ / 'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdo leb che la ring bdag cig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag sngon ni ye ma mchis na/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag
79b3: ra su zhig gis 'tshal te mchis snyam bgyid do/ / 'od srung 'dir ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes so// de nas da 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag gang du bkru snyam pa dang / de nas
79b4: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas/ brag gcig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te dgang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
79b5: 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// nga 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ras phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du bams snyam pa
79b6: dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te dgang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
79b7: ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha nA'i ras dgram du gsol/ / ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i ras shana'i ras rnams bkram mo// 'od srung rdo leb che zhing ring ba 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya'o//
79b8: de nas steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
80a1: lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe ne ra Na dza nI chu cher brug nas bab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i
80a2: steng na rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag pas 'chag par mdzad do/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po drug pas khyer bar ma gyur grang //
80a3: ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal snyam du bsams nas shing gcig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag
80a4: bar khebs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pan 'chag pas 'chag pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gson nam/ 'od srung
80a5: gson no/ / dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam 'od srung 'jug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na shing
80a6: gcig pa'i gru ji ltar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag nas shing gcig pa'i gru ji lta bar chu la 'jug
80a7: pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom
80a8: bayin no snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// srung sa pa can khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma
80b1: yin/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems
80b2: te/ dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma'i thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag legs par gsung ba'i chos 'dul ba
80b3: la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srung khyod kyi 'khor la ltas sam/ dge sbyong
80b4: chen po maltas lags so/ / 'od srung de'i phyir re shig 'khor la ltos shig/ 'dir khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa bshes rten can rnams kyis ni 'khor lag ba legs pa yin no// de nas
80b5: lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste byin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/ bram ze'i khye'u kho bo na dge sbyong chen/
80b6: po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod ba spyad na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po bdag cag gis cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po la rten nas lags pas/ gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen
80b7: po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo / / bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed kyis de'i phyir g.yang / zhi dang shing shran dang / khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang /
81a1: thugs gzar 'di dag chu klung ner Na dza nA'i 'gram du 'or cig mkhan po dka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang / shing shun dang / khang ba dang ril ba spyi blugs dang / thugs
81a2: gzar 'di dag chu klung ne ra Na dza nA'i 'gram du bor nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can la 'di skad ces smras so/ / mkhan po 'di ltar bdag cag gis bdag cag gi
81a3: bgyi ba gang lags pa de bgyis lags so/ / de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na bar der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag
81a4: g as 'khor la bltas lags te bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang snyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par
81a5: bgyi'o/ / 'od srung tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang / des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi spun
81a6: chu klung 'od srung dang / g.ya 'od srung gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / chu klung ne ra Na dza na'i mjug gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do// chu klung 'od srung dang / g.ya 'od srung spun gyis g.yang gzhi
81a7: dang / shing shun dang / khar ba dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / thugs gzar de dag chu klung nar Na dza nas khyer ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te// bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po
81a8: chotshochom rkun nam me'am chus nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang / mal bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsal lo snyam mo// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / g.ya 'od srung spun dag lteng rgyas 'od srung
81b1: ral pa can tshol zhing lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong ba de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can snga byi sngam sbyar bgos nas 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan chos
81b2: mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ / chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung gis lted rgyas 'od srung ral pa can skra byi snam sbyar bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang che dang
81b3: ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'od srung 'di mchog yin la de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srung dag 'di ni mchog yin tid nyid ma yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / g.ya 'od srung spun dag
81b4: 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa
81b5: rgas 'khogs gtugs pa ma ga ng+gA'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ rjes par byas/ mchod par byas shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang lan gnyis kyi bar du dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas
81b6: blangs kyis ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
81b7: 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen por rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// khyod kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma
81b8: bltas lags so/ / 'od srung dag de'i phyir re shig 'khor la bltos shig/ 'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa/ bshes nyen can dag gis ni 'khor la blta ba legs pa yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga
82a1: ya 'od srung spun rang gi bsti gnas gang na bder dong ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/ kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngang tsam
82a2: bar spyad pa skyed na shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po dag bdag cag cung zad ce 'tshal ba de/ thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags pas gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod
82a3: na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po dag rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo // bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus nga yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas chu klung 'od srung dang / ga ya 'od srung spu na 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu nyis
82a4: brgya lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par
82a5: gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba sab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 'od srung dag tshur shog tshangs par spyad
82a6: pa spyod cig de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang des bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang / des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can stong po de rab byung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad
82a7: nas lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ ga ya ga dan ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa nag yang byon nas ga ya'i mchod rten la sngon gyi ral ba can thams cad rab du byung
82a8: pa'i dge slong stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de la tshe 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms par mdzad de/ rdzu phrul gyi tshe 'phrul dang / kun rjod pa'i tshe 'phrul
82b1: dang rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo/ / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag pa nyid kyi gdan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur/
82b2: cing shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal bar mdzad do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
82b3: zhugs par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar
82b4: po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog go/ cho 'phrul zung du ston par mdzad de sku'i smad nas me 'bar bang mdzad la/ sku'i stod las chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad do// sku'i stod nas me ba na mdzad la
82b5: sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir
82b6: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gang na bshams pa nyid la gzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu
82b7: 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no/ / de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun rdzob pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag khyod kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o// khyod kyi yid ni 'di lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o// 'di ni rtog
82b8: cig/ 'di ni ma tog cig/ 'di ni yid la byos shig/ 'di ni yid la ma byed cig/ 'di ni spongs shig/ 'di ni ma spong zhig/ 'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs par gyis te gnos shig/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
83a1: kyi kun rdzong pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/ / de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin no// dge slong dag thams cad kun du 'bar ba/
83a2: de ci yin zhe na/ dge slong dag mig dang / gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshe rab bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/
83a3: bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun du 'bar ba yin no// dge slong dag rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / chos dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa/
83a4: ni kun du 'bar ba yin zhing yin kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun du 'bar ba yin no gang
83a5: gis kun du 'bar 'dod chags kyi me dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi mes kun du 'bar ba/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa ste/
83a6: sdug bsngal gyis kun du 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o// de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de dag
83a7: len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag bzang
83a8: pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa// yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// rgyal po
83b1: gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang / ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze
83b2: mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te/ khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur/
83b3: te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon
83b4: po rin po che yin no/ / de lta bu stong yang tshangs par 'byung bar 'gyur te// dpa' ba rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnon
83b5: par bsngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ / gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas
83b6: dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos so//
83b7: thos nas kyang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol bdag cag 'dir
83b8: lha'i yul na rgyu ba ni shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan pa
84a1: nig thos so zhes bya ba'i dgod ma bzhin du'o/ / lha dbung gig/ ltabs gcothos pas ches gtso bor 'thung du mchi'o// thong ba dag dag gA kya rnams kyi gzhon du gangs ring ngos zhes bya ba nas/ grags par zung ngo zhes bya ba'i ba god ma bzhin te/ lhad bu bzhin/
84a2: skabs gtso pas ces btsob chung dum che zhes byed pag de sa dam smra shig/ dacing phyir nan/ dag rnams kyi no du zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba go ma pa du ste/ ga tel 'o mos byung 'i rgyal po nga gsog bya'o// gal bye nga su bregs/
84a3: nas dung steg pagos nas dpal dag gnas kyi nas kyis med pa nga byung bang drung // de da gshegs pa da khom pa dag pa rdzogs pa'is sargyas su pa rten dun par grags par du do nadapos srangs yang bya'o// ma
84a4: rgyal po ba bo sbyangs gzugs can snying po ste gi khang bzangs kyi gni la 'dug nas smin pa'i gzhi lnga la smin par byed de/ kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang nags su ldan pa/
84a5: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgur bablan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa bcom ldan 'das byung ba dang de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang / zhi bar song ban des kyang bdag la chos bgan pa dang /
84a6: bdag gis kyang chos bshad ba de shes pa dang / bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung skam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa
84a7: dge slong dgas gta rgyas pogaso byangs gzugs can nang pa de grang gang bzangs kyi gan sa 'jug nas/ dz+nyAn pa'i gnas sran ba cad / tsamapa bdag gisul du jig rten gyi ston pa da bzhi gshegs pa dam
84a8: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasanas bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin na/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal ba ba'i sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i dogs 'tsho bdag cig ljongs chub/ shAH
84b1: r nams kyi gzhon nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring bzhig tu byung ba gang yin pa de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du
84b2: sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung ba de bla na
84b3: m ed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas de ga yA na ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa
84b4: zad pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/
84b5: zhes thos so// thos nas kyang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ma ga d+hi'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du
84b6: gsol/ bdag cag 'di na lha'i yul na rgyu ba na/ shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa de zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de skra dang kha spu bregs te
84b7: gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas yang dag pa khonas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de ga yA na ga yA'i mchod rten la
84b8: sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba sha sta ga dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so zhes bya
85a1: ba'i bar du ste/ lha de dag la bkur sti mdzod cig dang / de lta na lha gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur ro// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kwa'i nang rje tshur
85a2: khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/ kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la gnod pa chud dam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ 'tsho'am/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang /
85a3: bde ba dang / sku nyams dang ldan nam/ reg par spyod dam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms
85a4: dang gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab du gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+ha'i
85a5: rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan
85a6: 'das la mi des 'di skad gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chud dam zhes
85a7: bya ba nas/ reg par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du ste snyun gsol lags so// kye mi khyod dang ma ga d+hi'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can
85a8: snying po'i mchid nas/ 'di skad ces bdag bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / thabs gcig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / sU na dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /
85b1: yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la cang mi gsung pas gnang ngo // de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das cad /
85b2: mi gsud pas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas sod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi
85b3: dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang / thabs gcig tu ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs
85b4: pa na/ yul ma ga d+ha'i ba rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tshal yod pa ga na ba der gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/ ma ga d+ha ba rnams kyi mchod rten
85b5: legs par rab gnas ltad brang gi tshal yod pa na bzhugs so/ / ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong gi dge
85b6: slong gi dge 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar tu ste/ ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltar brang gi tshal
85b7: yod pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ ma ga d+ha pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltad brang gi tshul yod pa na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang shing rta bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang / rgyal po'i byor pa
85b8: chen pos rta dang / shing rta brgya stong snyed dang lhan cig 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na/ de'i shing rta'i
86a1: 'khar las 'anang du bying bar gyur te/ / des bsams pa/ bdag gis las skyon can nung zad cig byas par mgyur grang snyam mo// lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/ rgyal ba chen pa khyod kyis las byon can mang/
86a2: mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag btson ran 'dug gis de dag thon cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na gdon no zhes rgyal pos btson rnams 'don du bcug go// yang rgyal po phyir zu
86a3: bar brtsams pa na de'i dbu rgyan sgo la thug go/ / de nas yang bsams pa/ bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te des na bdag la ltas ngan pa gzhan sgo la dbu rgyan thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo// lha de rnams kyis
86a4: yang smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag kha cig ni 'dus kyang kha cig ni yul ljongs gzhan ga ge mo zhes bya ba dag na las kyi mtha' byed
86a5: cing 'dug pa de dag skyon cig/ rgyal pos yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bkug go// de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shing rta khri nyis stong dang / zha 'bring brta ba'i tshogs khri brgyad stong dang / ma ga d+ha'i brab zed da
86a6: khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo // ji tsam bzhon nga sa sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste/ bzhon
86a7: palas babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra ba na zhugs so/ / maM ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyongs gzugs can snying pos thag rde tsam nas bcom ldan 'das mtheng ba'i bar de nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po zo'u kha dang / gdugs dang ral
86a8: gri dang ner bu'i rnga yab dang / lga ma khra bo rnams phud do// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gan ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
86b1: na pam ldan 'das gang na pa dang lags su thal ma sbyar ba bdud t+ta rang ga mang nas byung stel nagasu ma dugs pag/ btsun pa gan pa ga na N+Dal pa ba // sa gzugs can nang pa lags ka/ Shadz+ran
86b2: bdag ni mag du'i rgyal po babasbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so/ / rgyal po legs so// rgyal po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rgyal po chen po khyed ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po babaskyongs gzugs can snying po yin no// rgyal
86b3: chen pa khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bcwo sbyang sa gzugs can snying po yin no/ / rgyal ba yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod nga gi spyan ci lngab la 'dug shig/ de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bab sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan
86b4: 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / mag d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag ba cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ci shin
86b5: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu la kho da// kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su
86b6: mo sbyar ba btud de 'ayod do/ / ba cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong nas cad mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe che dang ldan pa snyed rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas te de nyid du 'das shing 'dug par
86b7: gyur to/ / de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram pa dang / khyim bdag nams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dge sbyong chen po lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba tsun gyi tshangs par spyod pa la spyad dam/ 'on te steng rdzas 'od srub ram pa can dge sbyong chen po
86b8: tshangs par spyod pa la spyod snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungal tshigs su bcang pa'i dbyangs kyis
87a1: smras pa lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dir ci mthong na/ me spangs nas ni brtul shugs 'di dag spyod// khyod kyis ji ltar me yi mchod spangs pa/ don de 'od sru dang la smra bar gyis/ lteng rgyas 'od srung gis gsol pa/ 'di
87a2: na kha cig zas skom de bzhin no/ / 'dod pa dag dang bud med kho na smra// de dag phung po'i dri mar rab mthong ste/ des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' ba sregs blugs min/ khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang / de bzhin rol yid ni mi
87a3: dga' na/ lha mi 'jig rten la ci khyod kyi yid// dga' ba yin na ma 'od srung dri yis smros// phung po ma mchis zhi ba ci ma mchis// 'dod sred ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis// gzhan gyis mi bgri'i go 'phang mchog mther
87a4: ste/ des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' ba sreg thugs min// go 'phang mi nyams mchog ni ma mthong bas// mchod sbyin brtul zhugs dang ni zhugs dag gis// grol snyam bdag gi yid ni rmongs gyur te/ dmus long gyur nas skye shi'i rjes bzhin
87a5: mthong / / skyob pa gtso bo mchog gis legs bshad pa// go 'phang 'dus ma byas te bzod mthong na// thub pa gau ta ma rnam par 'dren khyod ni// skye bo'i phal chen don brtson bden la zhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod
87a6: kyis rtogs pa legs rtogs te/ / khyod kyis nyes par bsams pa yin// rab tu bye ba'i chos rnams lags// gtso bo gang yin de blangs so// 'od srung 'khor skyo ba skyed cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung bcom ldan
87a7: 'das kyis skabs phye nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na rang gi stan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur to/ / shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas skyed lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bzhir rdza
87a8: ' phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdus te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btu
87b1: nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so// bdag ni bcom
87b2: ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/ / 'od srung de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no// khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srung da ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no// khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srung byed
87b3: rang gi stan je lta ba la 'dug shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di
87b4: snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po ni lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la mi spyod kyi steng rgyas 'od srung ras pa can nyid ni dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa la spyod do snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
87b5: pa ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gzugs la skye ba yang yod/ 'jig pa yang yod/ de'i skye ba dang 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
87b6: dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba yang yod/ 'jig pa yang yod/ de'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po yang rigs kyi bus gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas gzugs de yongs su shes so// /
87b7: rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig rus rnam par shes pa de yongs su shes so// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes
87b8: nagazugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len na mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas mngon par bzhin par mi byed do/ / rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su shes na
88a1: bdag gam bdag gir las mi len na mi 'dzin lhag par ma gnas mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ / rgyal ba chen po rigs kyi bus gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/ me 'dzin lhag par mi gnas/ mngan/
88a2: par zhen par mi byed na tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smras so// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag gam bdag gi ri khas mi
88a3: len mi 'dzin/ lhag par mi gnas mngon par zhen par mi byed na tshad med cing grangs med par mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o// de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te gzugs
88a4: bdag ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin na/ 'o na pa dag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam skye ba po 'am/ gsob po 'am/ gang zag gam/ shod las skyes sam/ shed bu 'am/ byed pa po
88a5: 'am byed du 'jug pa po 'am/ shes pa po 'am/ kun nas shes pa po'am/ slong ba po 'am/ kun nas slob pa po 'am/ sgru ba po 'am/ kun nas smra ba po 'am/ tshor ba po 'am/ kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa nam yang ma byur 'byung bar
88a6: mi 'gyur zhing da ltar yang yod pa gang gis de dang dge ba dang / sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zheng gang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur
88a7: snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag bdag ces bya ba ni byas pa so so'i skye bo thos pa
88a8: dang mi ldan pas btags pa'i rjes su ltung ba yin te/ 'di la bdag ces 'am/ bdag gi med kyi dge slong dag skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skye zhing 'gag pa na yang sdug bsngal 'di 'gag go/ skye ba na 'du byed rnams skye zhing
88b1: 'gag pa na 'di 'du byed rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug go// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas/ 'du byed kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba thugs su/
