88b2: chud nas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 'dogs par mdzad de/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa'i me las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho zhes bya ba nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten
88b3: du lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes bya bar mkhyen to zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin no// dge slong dag ngas de ltar mkhyen cing de ltar gzigs pas nga 'di skad ces bdag gam sems can nam zhes bya ba nas tshor ba po
88b4: z hes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste gang nam yang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing da ltar yang yod pa ma yin pas gang gis de dang der sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyam su myong zhing gang gis phung po
88b5: 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de chos su brdar brtags pa ma gtogs pa 'di yin no zhes mi gsungs so/ / de la chos kyi brdar btags pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di yod/ 'di skyes
88b6: bas 'di skye ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen kyis 'du byed 'du byed rkyen kyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen kyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug kyi rkyen kyis
88b7: reg pa reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen kyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen kyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen kyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen kyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen kyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dag
88b8: yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ 'di med pas 'di med la/ 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta
89a1: ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag pa rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag
89a2: skye mched drugs pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas/ len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas/ srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba
89a3: 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung chen mo 'azhi po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dga'adra
89a4: byed rnams ni sdug bsngal lo/ / mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gag pas sdug bsngal 'gag ste/ rgyun bcad pas mi 'byung zhing nying mtshams sbyor ba med pas 'gags/
89a5: pa 'di nyid ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no// dge slong de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gag pa yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba/ de ni bsil bar gyur pa/ de ni nub pa ste/ dge slong dag zhi ba'i
89a6: gnas ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ phung po thams cad spangs pa sred pa zad pa 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gags pa mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyang gzugs can/
89a7: snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag gam/ mi rtag btsun pa 'di mi rtag lags so// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun
89a8: pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so/ / mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no// bdag ni 'di yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas
89b1: len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ tsher rab dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag/ btsun pa 'di ni mi rtag lags so// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug
89b2: bsngal yin nam sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so// mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no//
89b3: bdag ni 'di ni yin no// 'di bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang ci yang rung / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am
89b4: nang gi'am/ phyi'i 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag thag ring ba 'am/ gang dag thag nye ba yang rung ste/ de thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no// bdag ni 'di ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no// zhes de bzhin du
89b5: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ / rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed gang ci yang rung ba dang rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rudu ba 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba'am/ nang gi ma phyi ro//
89b6: rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag thag ring ba 'am/ gang dag zag nye ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no// bdag ni 'di ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no// zhes/
89b7: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o// rgyal po chen po 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang / ldan pa de ltar mthong ba ni gzugs la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
89b8: byed dang / rnam par shes pa la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yid byung na 'dod chags dang bral lo// 'dod chags dang / bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa bsten to//
90a1: bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po dang / lha brgyad khri dang /
90a2: ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bum phrag du mchos rnams la chos kyi mi/ rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos chos mthong ba dang chos thos pa dang / chos rig pa dang /
90a3: chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi drid mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla
90a4: gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag btsun pa
90a5: bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol// deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchis par mngon par dang /
90a6: lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / spun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams
90a7: kyis bsnyer bkur bgyis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab du gshegs su gsol// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gdang ngo //
90a8: de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de
90b1: nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+ha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na zhugs so/ / de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na mu stegs yang dag rgyal ba can zhes bya ba skyes/
90b2: nas ring po ma lon par de rnams kyi ston pa dus byas par gyur pa dang / de rnams kyi nang na nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes zhes bya ba gnyis tshegs yongs su sdud pa dang / tshogs kyi 'dren par gyur pa gang yin pa de yongs su 'dren pa
90b3: nade gnyis kyis 'di ltar yu bu cag las gcig gis bdud rtsi sngar rnyed kyang de gcig la gcig smra bar bya'o/ / zhes dam bca' ba byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs pa gos// lhung bzed dang / chos gos
90b4: thogs te 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / cung zad lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so//
90b5: de'i tshe na kun du rgyu nye rgyal rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba zhig gi phyir spyod yul du zhugs pas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang / cung zad lta ba dang / rnam par lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / snam sbyar dang /
90b6: chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la sgru ba thag ring po kho nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po'i khab 'dir rab tu byung ba ji snyed lhags shing
90b7: gnas pa dag las 'di lta ste/ rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam 'di lta bu ni bdag gis sngon chad 'ga' yang ma mthong gis ma la bdag de'i gan du song ste/ dge slong khyod kyi ston pa ni gang yin/ gang gi phyir ni rab tu
90b8: b+hung / su'i chos la ni dga' zhes dri'o// snyam du rig nas lam po che rub pa zhig na 'gro ba dang ldog pas shas cher sdod cing 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul kun du rgyu nye rgyal ga la ba der song ngo // de nas kun du rgyu
91a1: nye rgyal gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so/ / dge slong khyod kyi ston pa ni gang yin/ gang gi phyir na rab du byung / su'i chos la ni dga'/ tshe dang ldan pa shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong gau ta ma shAkya'i ris
91a2: las skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te dad pa yang dag pa po nas kyis nas bya ma med par rab tu byung ba zhig yod do/ / de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ kho bo'i
91a3: ston pa ni bcom ldan 'das de yin no/ / khe bo de'i phyir rab tu byung ngo // kho bo de'i chos la dga'o// dge slong de'i phyir chos ston cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bo ni ni gzhon pa dang / rab tu byung ba gsar bas de'i phyir kho bos bcom
91a4: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par sla ba ma yin te/ 'on kyang 'di ltar de'i don bstan par bya'o// dge slong kho bo la
91a5: ni don dgos kyi tshig ni shin du mang pos kyang ci bya ste/ khyod kyis don mang yang rung nyung yang rung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang /
91a6: de'i rgyu dang de 'gag gang yin pa'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal to// de skad gsung ba'i tshul can dge sbyong che/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pan kun du rgyu rgya la chos rnamams/ chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang
91a7: bral ba skyes so/ / de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal chos mthong ba dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis me bkri ba dang / sten
91a8: bas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas re stong bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'a
91b1: yin/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du/ sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa/ 'chi med mya ngan med pa yin// go 'thang 'di la rjes su rtogs// tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de ltag la bzhugs// tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i 'ab na 'od ma'i
91b2: tshal ka la nang ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o/ / de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa la mngon par bsted pa dang rje su yid rang ba byas ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas tshe dang
91b3: ldan pa rta thul la lan gsum bskor ba byas te song nas kun du rgyu pang nas skyes ga la ba der song ngo / / kun du rgyu bar nas skyes kyis kun tu rgyu nyo rgyal thag ring po khon nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang kun du rgyu nye rgyal la 'di
91b4: skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dbang po rnams ni rnam par dang / bzhin gyi mdog ni yongs su dag/ spags pa'i mdog ni yongs su dkar na khyod kyis bdud rtsi rnyed dam/ tshe dang ldan pa rnyed do// tshe dang ldan pa de phying
91b5: chos ston cig/ de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal gyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa smras pa/ chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang / de yi rgyu dag de 'gog gang yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal to// de skad gsung rtsing
91b6: tshul can dge sbyong che/ tshe dang ldan pa dung yang lan cig rjod cig / chod ldan brjod par bya'o// chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na kun du rgyu par nas
91b7: skyes chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ / de nas kun du rgyu pang nas skyes chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gter slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las
91b8: rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'dzeg pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas bstan po'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas ro stod bsrung nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ kun du rgyu nye rgyalag la bde logs su thal mo
92a1: sbyar ba btud te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ skyob pa rnams kyi chos 'di yin/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu// sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa/ 'chi med mya ngan med pa yi// go 'phang 'di la rjes su rtogs//
92a2: tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das de da lta ga la bzhugs/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka la na da ka'i gnas 'di nyid na'o// tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa sbyang bar bya/
92a3: tshe dang ldan pa de'i phyir ze 'khor la blta bar bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu mi grags pa dang ldan pa/ shes par gyur pa dag gis 'khor la blta ba ni legs pa yin no// de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis kyis bram ze'i
92a4: khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams shes par gyis shig/ kho bo cag gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed na khyed cag ji ltar byed/ mkhan po gnyis bdag cag cung zad ci 'tshal
92a5: gang lags pa de dag thams cad mkhan po gnyis las brten nas 'tshal ba lags na/ gal te mkhan po gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po gnyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes
92a6: su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ / bram ze'i khye'u rnams da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo //
92a7: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gyi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos ston cing bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang / pad nas skyes gnyis thag ring po kho nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang
92a8: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis grogs po'i tshogs yongs su sdud pa/ tshogs yongs su 'dren pa/ tshogs kyi mdun nas 'ong ba 'di lta ste/ nye rgyal dag pang nas skyes gnyis mthong ngam/ btsun pa/
92b1: mthang ba// 'di gnyis ni nyan thos zung dang / zung gi mchog dab zung bzang por gyur te/ gcig ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur la gcig shas ni shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas
92b2: dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ston pa dgongs yul mtha' yas pa// skyes bu'i dbang po mkhyen mthar byon bcom ldan srid pa mthar mdzad pas// grogs pa nye rgyal bang nas skyes// 'od ma'i tshal du
92b3: ma byin par/ de ltar mchi ba gzigs gyur nas// tshigs mchog dbus su de gnyis ni// 'di gnyis nga yi nyan thos kyi// zung mchog 'gyur zhes des bstan te// gcig ni rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog/ gcig shos shes rab
92b4: ldan pa yi/ / mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan mdzad// de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang / pang nas skyes gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom
92b5: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos por gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar tshangs
92b6: par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung zhing dge slong dag tshur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i
92b7: mjug kho na rasa? byi ba dang / sna ma sbyar gyon par gyur to// lag na lhung bzed thogs par sgra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to// yang smras pa/ de
92b8: bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog/ bka' stsal pas/ sra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / modado la dbang po rab bzhir gnas gyur te/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga
93a1: ca/ / tro sha ma thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab gyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas dang sa dung
93a2: king bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs shing mngon par mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dag mthong nas co 'dri zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+ha dag gi/ grong mchog rgyal po'i kha
93a3: gshegs pas/ / yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na/ phyin chad ci zhig dkri bar bya// des dge slong rnams dpa' gong zhing mi dga' ba dang mi 'jigs pa med par gyur to// dge slong rab tu mang po dag rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms rgyus
93a4: nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ phyi dro ba sod snyoms mi len pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su bab nas/ rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/ sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong te byin nas bcom ldan 'das
93a5: kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu ma
93a6: po rdza dro sham thabs 'tshal/ lhung bzed dang chos gos dag thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang ga 'a dag rtsal can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas nas rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par
93a7: rdzogs nas ring po ma lags pas/ yang dag rgyal ba'i kun byed na/ byin char yid ma rings shing mngon par mi dga' ba'i de dag gis dge slong de dang / de dag mthong nas co dri shing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma gdag/
93a8: gi/ grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas/ yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na// phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya zhes mchis nas des bdag cag rnams dpa' gong zhing mi dga' ba dang / mi 'jigs pa mchis par 'gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
93b1: kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams la 'di skad ces/ 'di la dpa' chen bde gshegs dag/ dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de// de dag chos kyis 'ir mdzad la// mkhas pa su zhig mi bzod byed ces
93b2: brjod na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi de ga dazer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam 'am/ thobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs
93b3: te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi gang dag yang dag rgyal ba can gyi mu stegs can gyi gnas na ga zung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pas yid ma rangs shing mngon par
93b4: mi dga' ba de dag gis dge slong de dang de dag mthong nas co 'dra zhing tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sangs rgyas ma ga d+ha dag gi/ grod mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs pas// yang dag rgyal ba'i kun khrid na// phyin chad ci zhig bkri bar bya//
93b5: de nas dge slong zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'di na dpa' chen bde gshegs dag/ dam pa'i chos kyis khrid mdzad de// de dag chos kyis khrid mdzad la// mkhas pa su zhig bzod mi byed// de skad ces smram pa dang / rgyal po'i
93b6: khab kyi mi de skad zer ba rnams kyi rlom pa tsam 'am/ spobs pa tsam gang yin pa de thams cad kyi thams cad du med par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
93b7: ra ba na bzhugs so/ / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/ lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol// khyod kyi bras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas bdud rtsis 'gro bar tshim par byed do zhes spring ba rgyal po zos
93b8: gtsang gis thos nas pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya gar dang gang btang ba de dang de nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to// rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas pho nya
94a1: gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byungango / / sam nas sems 'ongs su chud cing 'dug pa 'char gas mthong nas smras pa/ lha khod ci'i srang blag la zhal gtang nas
94a2: thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char ka gang gi tshe/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba sdod pa de'i tshe kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i mi gtang ba las de dag kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas gzhon nu don thams cad
94a3: grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis bzhugs so zhes smra'o/ / de ni kho bos spring yig skyel ba'i mi gtad na 'ga' yang phrin yig khyer te mi 'od na ji ltar sems khong du chung bar mi 'gyur/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag mchis te bka' mched
94a4: 'tshal la slar mchi'o/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gang dang gang song ba de dang de'i bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do// /
94a5: 'char kas smras pa/ lha slar mchis lags so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis spring yig bris pa/ lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su// khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te// nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du// rgyal ba ljon shing
94a6: la bsten na/ / de nyid khyod kyi slob ma yin// yal ga lcug ma 'phel 'gyur bas// gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar 'gyur// bdag ni sdug bsngal skal par ldan// gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na// bdag gi
94a7: bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun te/ / bu gcig yul mis 'bras bu yongs su spyad pazo 'gyur na// de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med// gang tshe thog ma bltam pa na// nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni// shin du che
94a8: dang phan gdags zhes/ / khyod kyis dam bcas mdzad pas na// khyod kyis zhi gnas de brnyes na// bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la// thugs brtses rjes su gzung mdzod de// gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol zhes spring ba'i yi
94b1: gi 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa la bsos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba'i yi ge lags so zhes bcom
94b2: ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas klags so// blags nas yi ge mtha' gcig tu bzhag pa dang / 'char kas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ser skya'i gzhir mi bzhud dam/ bcom ldan 'das
94b3: kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka 'dong ngo // 'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas de sngon gyis 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dang bdag gi mthus bkri bar bgyi lags so//
94b4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing // srid 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mda' ba de// gzhi med na ni
94b5: gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ / gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing // sred 'ag sa bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i// sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// gang zhig bcom nas
94b6: brtsegs pa med gyur cing / / 'jig rten ma bcom chung zad yod min pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' bde// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// lan la spobs pa med nas gsol ba// bcom ldan 'das mchi
94b7: ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rig par bgyi'o// 'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no// 'char kas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ rab tu byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang rab tu byung shig/ bcom
94b8: ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la mchi bar dam bcas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub
95a1: sems dpa' mur pa na yab dang / yum dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyis chos dang 'thun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog pas/ 'char kas gsol pa
95a2: bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar na rab tu 'byung lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bul bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char ka 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung shig/
95a3: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas 'char ka rab tu byung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas kun du spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas/ 'char ka/ 'di ni khyod
95a4: kyi bya ba yin te/ deng phan chad bud med dang lhan cig/ khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o// zhes bya ba dag go/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshol zhes 'char kas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos
95a5: phyag byas te song nas bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song ste/ phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir ma
95a6: lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka sod la khyod mod kho nar rgyal po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgo la sdod la shAkya'i dge slong 'ongs so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te nang du skyon cig zer na 'jug par bya'o//
95a7: zhugs nas gal te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan yang yod dam zhes zer na/ yod do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'am zhes 'drin/ 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes
95a8: brjod par bya'o/ / khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par mi bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes 'drin/ mi bzhugs so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gang du gnas par
95b1: byed ces 'dri na/ dgon pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub/
95b2: babyon napa zhes 'dzin/ skyon no zhes brjod par bya'o// de srid cig na byon nes 'drin/ zhag badran lon na 'o nas brjod par bya'o// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchilags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
95b3: smra sa sa du / ma na
95b4: ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir song ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa drag po skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag
95b5: rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do// de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ shAkya'i dge slong mchis so// /
95b6: rgyal pos smras pa/ nang du thong shig/ de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'char ka rab tu byud dam/ lha rab tu byung ngo // khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smras pa yin nam 'di ci yin/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha
95b7: bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nyin 'di lta bu ma yin no zhes bka' stsal nas chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu phyung mod kyi bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo / / rgyal pos yan lag
95b8: thams cad kyis 'khyud nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug ste/ de'i don du chu btsags pa dang 'bras bu btags pa gtsang sbra byas te/ zar bcug go// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang / dul bar gnas
96a1: pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rjes su bstan pa'i tshogs yongs su longs spyod do/ / rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa 'char kaci gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar ni
96a2: yin nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni cung zad tsam lags so// dper ji lta bu ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no// rgya mtsho dang rmig rjes bzhin no// nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no// nam
96a3: mkha' dang pad ma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga bzhin no/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char kagazhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di/ 'dra'am/ lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad kyang 'di 'dra'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ba rgyal nas
96a4: sa la 'gyel ba dang / chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar phyung ste smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa/ byon nam 'char kas smras pa/ lha byon no// dus ji tsam na dgung bdun lon na'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis
96a5: blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis// rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang byi dor byos shig/ 'char kas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do// rgyal pos
96a6: smras pa/ gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas smras pa/ dgon pa'am bcug lag khang du'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa
96a7: ri mor bris te bstan to/ / de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu rtsig tu chug shig/
96a8: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las mnyan nas n+ya gro ha de'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug bcu rtsig tu bcug go// de nas
96b1: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu song la dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras gdan 'dzom na/ khyod cag las su
96b2: zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnananas dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan
96b3: 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras gdan 'dzem na/ khyed cag las su lta bar spro ba de chos gos dag long shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhib
96b4: grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang / bral ba mdzes pa 'khor
96b5: mdzes pa/ khyu mchog pa lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta thu/ glang po che glang po'i thug gu'i tshegs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po dad pa'i tsho gas kyis bskor ba
96b6: lta bu/ nam mkha' lding ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta ba/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo ru ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam
96b7: mkhan 'dron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba
96b8: rgyu kar gyis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor blta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags pa skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig
97a1: saH/ 0/ 4 sa sa ma chags sa pa / @mas bcwa ga
97a2: tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med blta ru/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin du dul bas spyod
97a3: lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i su nyi ma'i 'od zer
97a4: stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong
97a5: gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byon to/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'bab chu ro hi ta kar byon to zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ grong khyer
97a6: ser k+ta'i gan rdo ba dang gyo mo dang / gseg ma rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dri shin du zhim po'i bog bor nye bar bshams/ dar gyi tshun 'bya dmang po sbyangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hi ta kanas
97a7: gang yang na gro da'i kun dga' ba de'i bar gyi lam shin du mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra bdag shom du bcug go// de nas 'bab chu roho ta ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khru bar
97a8: byed do/ / kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar byed do// kha cig ni khrus byed do// ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas
97b1: bskul/ / kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas/ thams cad n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste/ ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa blta'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di
97b2: snyam du dgongs te/ gal ter zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhar gshags na shAkya'i nga rgyal can rnams kye ma'o// gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi nags su/ gshegs nas ltog pa zhig grub pa lta zhig
97b3: de lha brgyad stong phrag du mas zha 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te/ des de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas bdud rtsi thob nas da zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta/ zhes ma dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro/
97b4: snyam nas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snar la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam par bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang /
97b5: bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba mdzad do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag
97b6: 'byin par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go// cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de// sku'i smad nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/
97b7: spu'i stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad de// sku'i stod nas me 'bar bar mdzad la/ sru'i slad nas chu grang mo'i rgun 'bebs par mdzad pa/ de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs
97b8: ya ji lta bar lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa de bsdus te/ ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs so//
98a1: dge slong rnams ni tal drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid
98a2: tsapa na'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i sred tsam na ni dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsaman ni/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam
98a3: na ni/ dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na/ bzhugs na ni dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams lnga'i srid
98a4: tsam na'o/ / bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na/
98a5: ni dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams me gang lhag tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das ming gang lhag tsam na ni// dge slong rnams sa la'o// rgyal po zas
98a6: gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de dang / dge slong mang po mthong nas de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ 'char ka 'di na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang
98a7: po zhig yod na de la gzhon nu gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags so// srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags// 'di ni nyon mongs sel
98a8: mdzad nyin byed don ni kun du ston mdzad lags/ / 'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mda' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags// dri med btsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang de gzigs shig/
98b1: mal pa bsag lag susmras pang / gsas sa gan/ tshigasas sa pas gas sa/ thams sangs pastod la 'dod do// kun stu bas pa lan gsum blag sargyas/ nyam par na
98b2: ni g.yos pa dang / / 'dzam bu'i gribams sku las ma 'das pa'o// de nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa mthong nas de ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed
98b3: pa ci'i tha tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed do/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag gdong kho bos gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabasal
98b4: phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang gi tshe na gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa nas chen po g.yos par gyur cig 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar 'gyur te 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun
98b5: nag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su ma myong ba gang yin pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag skyes pa
98b6: de dag snang ba des/ sems can dgagag gis gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa la/ zhes shes par gyur pa
98b7: de'i tshe yang kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so/ / gang gis tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub bzhid las kyi mtha' la bzhugs pa na/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas 'dod pa rnams
98b8: las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ tog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan dang pa
99a1: bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na/ shing gzhan rnams kyi gri mni shang phyogs sug zhog/ shang phyogs su bag shar phyogs su babakyang shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe/
99a2: yang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so// de bas na 'di skad ces/
99a3: blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni// kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te// bltam pa'i tshe nas 'dig yos pa dang // 'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
99a4: rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de btul nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gud la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing mig mchi
99a5: mas gang bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ / gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las// yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa las// dgon pa 'jigs dang bcas rnams su// ji lta thur ni
99a6: 'ba' zhig bzhugs/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang du ni// khyim gi 'ching ba las grol ba// 'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcus// thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad// rgyal pos gsol pa/
99a7: bso gser gyi rtsa ba can// shin tu bde ba bting ba yi// khril mnal bar mdzad pa las// gding ba la ni ji ltar mnal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po rnam grol gnas mal ni// dga' ba byang chub yan lag
99a8: gi/ me tog bkram par chags med cing // yongs su gdung ba rnams spangs mnal// rgyal pos gsol pa// dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na// glang po shing ta tas bzhud pa// tsher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la// zhabs kyis ji ltar
99b1: gshegs par mdzad/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang // yang rag rtsol ba'i gzhol ba yis// sa kun rnam par rgyun yang // nyon mongs cher mas gnod pa med// rgyal po zas
99b2: gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'o// na bza' mnabs nas mdzes pa las// dur smrig rtsub po'i gos mnabs pa// ji ltar khyod kyis sku yis bzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal
99b3: po de'i gos ngo tsha shes/ / de yi bgo ba snam sbyar te// de bgos thub pa zhi pa rnams// nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa 'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhod pa nas// du ma'i ro ldan
99b4: 'bras tshan gsol ba las/ / 'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i bsod snyoms ni// phal pa gsol ba ji ltar mgul du mchi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas kyi sred pa thams cad spangs nas ni// nges par
99b5: byung dang mnyam par gzhag ldan pa'i/ / nga'i chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi// 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir spyod do// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i// rgun sems kha ra'i
99b6: chab gsol na/ / rnyog pa can la dri nga ba'i// cha ba ni ji lta zhig tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi yi bdag po gang 'thungs na// bdag la 'thung ba thams cad ni// dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa// chab
99b7: kyi ro mchog de 'thung ngo / / rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang // ra bzangs steng na ji lha'i dus bzhin bzhugs// da ltar gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa// blo bzangs
100a1: ji ltar bsnyengs pa med par bzhugs/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau ta ma 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa// dri ma bag chags bcas par yang spangs pas// dade ni mya ngan
100a2: 'jigs pa med gnas te/ / nga la 'di na 'jigs pa chung zad med// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// khyod sngon khrus khang shin du yid 'ong bar// khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na// gcig pu khyod
100a3: ni nags khrod gnas ldan par/ / thub dbang da ltar su yi khrus mdzad 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ go ta ma chos kyi mtsho phran dri med pa// tshul khrims 'jug dogs dam pas bsngags pa ste/ de la reg pa'i
100a4: yon tan mi bkun/ / lus mi gsheg par pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyis kha ba ni ni gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na/ rnyog pa can la dri ba// chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags/
100a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau ta ma dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med// bsod nams 'jug dogs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus na// lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po zas
100a6: gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yis// tsan dan gyis ni sku bkrus shing // ka shi'amachog gnas mdzes pa las// de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims pa
100a7: ye rgyan yin te/ tshul khrims nyid ni thug pa yin// gser dang nor bun chad ga/ rmongs skyes ngal ci zhig bya// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ gang gis khyod na khyad du gsod// gang las 'jigs su rung ba
100a8: skye/ yid 'byung ba yang gang las skye// zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis de ni khyad gsod dang // gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang / gang las yid 'byung skyes pa
100b1: dag/ nyon cig khyod la bshad par bya// rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste// gal te 'di gsum yod min na// da yang shin du yid 'ong ba'i// yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gas gsol pa/
100b2: shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba// legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs// khyod ni 'jig tan chos brgyad kyis// dziH/ bur yang mgos so// de nas rab dga' dang pa rgyas byas pas// drang srong dge 'dun
100b3: bskor ba byas nas ni/ / thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te// bde bar gshegs la kun nas tog cing 'dug/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te// gang bdag gis bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di
100b4: lta bu thob pa ni bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang
100b5: 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ / de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa/ shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu/ mngon sum du byas te rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs so// lha sbyin
100b6: nga rgyal las nga rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa des/ bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas khro bas kun nas bkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed pa shes na/ bdag gis kyang
100b7: 'jig rten thams cad dbang bya ba zhig/ de la shAkya rnams kyis gshe ba'i tshig gis smras pa/ lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra shig ces bzlo gnas cang mi smra bar 'dug
101a1: go/ tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya drug khri drug stong gis rgyun du
101a2: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du zer ro/ / ro hi ta ka'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de// de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bdud
101a3: ci zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du zer ro/ / 'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems/
101a4: bskyed do// kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas/ kha cig gis ni/
101a5: lan cig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom par gyur// kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la/
101a6: skyabs su song / kha cig gis ni chos la/ kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste/ 'khor de dag phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang
101a7: 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang mngon du smra bar gyur na/ da ltar ni mis mchod kyis lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo// de nas
101a8: shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang srong chen po smra mchog dam chos kyi// char bas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad de// mi bzad lam du ltung ba'i 'jig rten 'di// drongs te thar pa'i lam la sbyor/
101b1: bar mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' shig/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no/ snyam ste lhag par dga' ba las/
101b2: gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du gzhug go// rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ ha cang zhum pa dang / shin du dga' ba'o// de la zhum pa'i sems dang shin du dga' ba yod kyis/ ma la
101b3: das de'i zhum pa dang / shin du dga' ba gnyis spong du gzhug go/ nyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la soms
101b4: shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu
101b5: chen po rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon// maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legs so//
101b6: btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos gdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar
101b7: mnyam par gzhagan/ rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la/ mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa pazhi byed de/ 'di sa ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang /
102a1: nyal bar byed do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer rnam
102a2: pa sna tshogs dga'abyin par byed de/ / 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go/ cho 'phrul zung ngu yang ston par byed do// lus kyi smad nas me 'brar
102a3: bar byed la lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do/ / lus kyi stong nas me 'bar bar byed la// lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa/ de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sa/
102a4: shar phyogs la ji lta bu bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul/ mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te stan bshams
102a5: pa nyid la 'dug go/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di
102a6: ltar mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ rgyal po chen po mchis so zhes tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mthu che ba dag gsum rig dang / sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang / zag zad dgra bcom
102a7: gang yin pa/ / thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar mi zad de/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i rab
102a8: tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas de shin du dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ / skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ kye ma brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams
102b1: 'ongs na/ lha'i 'khor dgag la chos bshad do snyam pa dang / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ srog chags grog spur rnams kyi sems kyis kyang
102b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa/ de'i tshe nyan thos chen po
102b3: rnams kyi sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa mi shes na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs te lha rnams kyis lta ci smos srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis lta ga la shes/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
102b4: brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas des lha'i bu
102b5: bzo thams cad pal bsgo ba/ bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang brtsegs ma gang na sna tshogs bshams pa zhig
102b6: sprul cig/ kau shi ka khyod kyi gsung mchog tu bzang do zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin las mnyen te n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtseg ma gdan sna tshogs
102b7: bshams pa zhig sprul to/ / de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhin 'khod pa ni yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po ste/ shar sgo na ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang /
102b8: rna cha gdub 'khor dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// nub phyogs na ni mig me bzang rin po che sna bdun gyis
103a1: brgyan pa'o/ / byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro da'i kun dga' rab che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/ bcom
103a2: ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lta brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/
103a3: lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste byin nas tshe dang ldan pa
103a4: maud gal gyi bu chen po nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos
103a5: 'chad de der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / / bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig rgyal po chen po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong do// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smras pa/
103a6: rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nab smras pa/ bzhi bzangs khyod bu zhig 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phag sa skyes po'o// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'a'od
103a7: dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nub sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal
103a8: po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ gzhin bzangs khyod su zhig mig mi bzang gis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni mig mi bzang ngo // ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der
103b1: mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo / / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po rna ma thos kyi bus mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po na ngam 'jug par sdod cig// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/
103b2: bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'o// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas
103b3: rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o/ / bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de bdag gis blta'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to//
103b4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te/ nga ma mthong na khrag dron po skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyis de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam
103b5: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i/ khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel las byas par sprul pa dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par
103b6: mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam
103b7: pa dang / bag nyal ba dang khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen pa nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de ltar bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ 'jig tshogs la lta
103b8: ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bdag la phas
104a1: ma bgyi sa mas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags// sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug pa dang / rang gi
104a2: skye bo dang / mnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mche ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan seng gi sgo rnams ni
104a3: bkram/ / mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ bdag lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag/ yang gsol pa/ pha la lan du pan gdags pa// dam pa'i bus ni bgyi ba gang // khyod kyis bdag la mdzad lags te/
104a4: sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis// khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las// drangs te mtho ris thar pa las// bsgrim mi 'tshal bar bzhag lags te// khyod kyis dga' ba mdzad pa legs// mgon po
104a5: byams pa khyed kyis ni/ / bdag gi tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar// mtho ris rnyed pa srid pa yi// longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas//
104a6: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdug
104a7: tsho sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang
104a8: ba ri rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te/ zas dkar gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras so//
104b1: gzhon nu rgyal srid thob kyis rgyal srid khyer cig/ ci'i slad du/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so// gang gi gdugs la lags/ de ring kho na'o// bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das
104b2: gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro de'i kun dga' bar chos bshad pa de'i nyi ma la shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lags so/ / de bzhin du the bo zas la rgyal sred khyer cig ces smras pa dang / rab zlam pa/
104b3: bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i skyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya drug khri drug stong dang bden pa mthong lags so// de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid
104b4: khyer cig ces smras pa dang / bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ro hahi ta ka'i bskyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lag so// gal te
104b5: de ltar gyur nang su zhig rgyal srid la gzhag/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bgyi'o// zhes de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang
104b6: bskur ro/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing nor bu chu snod bzhag nas
104b7: bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshed lags na/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' dang sham
104b8: thabs mnabs/ / lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po zas
105a1: gtsang gi bkang sa gangan ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
105a2: dge 'dun bde bang bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag
105a3: nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu par rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro 'di'i kun dga' ra ba phul lo//
105a4: bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsungs dbyangs kyis yon pasngo bar mdzad pa// sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'dis// shAkya rnams kyis bsams pa yi/ yid la re ba rdzogs nas ni//
105a5: rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de bzhin du bsam gtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi
105a6: shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / zhes gdags pa byas so// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs nas nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/ nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i
105a7: nang du gsol lo/ / rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dad pa yin na dka' thub drag pa'i brtul shugs kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdungs pas
105a8: lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyi/ lus mdzes pa ma yin na 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis bcom
105b1: ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las des bsams pa shAkya'i 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas/ de nas shAkya thams cad bsogs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa rab tu
105b2: byung bar ma gyur na ji ltar 'gyur 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / khyed cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/ g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// da ltar gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa chos kyi rgyal por
105b3: 'gyur na/ / khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/ lha ci rab tu 'byung ngam/ rab tu byung shig/ ci thams cad dam/ khyim re nas re re'o// bka' bzhin 'tshal/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir dril
105b4: sgregs su bcug pa/ rgyal po'i zhal nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis khyim re nas/ re re rab tu byung shig ces de skad bka' stsal to// bre bo zas la bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang ming chen no// /
105b5: ming chen ni zhing blas kyi mthar la lhag par brtson no// ma 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed do// ming chen la mas smras pa/
105b6: bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu phyung shig ces bsgos khyod rab tu byung shig/ des smras pa/ bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis// khyod kyi bu sdug pa dang bde ba dang ldan
105b7: par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu phyung shig/ bu bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems can de la khyed 'gran ma tshol cig/ yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags/
105b8: mod// de 'di la ba cung zazad kyang ma bskur dang / ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sam ma lags mngon par 'gyur ro// bu de bzhin du byas te yid ches par bya'o// des gzeb stong pa rdze'u yis bkang nas
106a1: kha ras dkar pos dkris te rgya skegs la rgyas btab nas/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur nas bsgo ba/ gal te de na ci yod ces 'dri dang / ci yang ma mchis so zhes smos shig/ des
106a2: khyer nas song ba dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/ des bsams pa/ rang sangs rgyas kun shes la bsod snyoms phul ba gang yin pa de dang ci'i phyir zas
106a3: kyis phongs par bya/ de'i zan sbyar bar bya'o zhes des rje'u de rnams sran tshe dang / tshod ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa'i zas kyis bkang ngo // ji tsam na mngag gzhug ma der khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du phyin pa dang /
106a4: ngas smras pa/ bu mo'i ni na ci yod/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu ci yang ma mchis so// ma 'gags pas bsams pa/ bdag la ma byams na 'di stong par ci ste skur gdon mi za bar 'di ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas
106a5: shig bskur gyis re shig blta'o zhes ji tsam na kha phye ba dang / bskyed mos tshal de thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur te/ de bsnams nas ma 'gags pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes so// de ma la gus
106a6: pa yin pas ngas ma la zas kyi phung bskur nas spong pa/ yum gdugs re nang zas ci yang ma yin zhem bgyi ba 'dis thub sung ba'i rigs so// des kyang mthang nas mchog tu la mtshan skyes te// des mang
106a7: chen la bstan nas bu mthong ngam/ yum mthong lags so// khyod la kho mos sngar bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po'i sems can ma'i skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod 'gran mtshol cig ces ma smras sa ma/ da
106a8: spras pa/ / yum de bsod nams kyi dbang zang chen po dang ldan pa yang rung / mi ldan yang rung / bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes ji ltar ming chen gnas skabs thams cad tu rab tu 'byung bar khas lan du ma
106b1: btub bo/ / de nas des ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrogs du bcug pa shAkya rnams la khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bsgon/ khyod ci rab tu byung ngam/ 'on te khyim par 'jug
106b2: ngas smras pa/ yum rab tu byung ba la phani yon ci mchis/ nye dmigs ci mchis/ khyim par mchis pa la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmigs ci mchis/ bu rab tu byung
106b3: bas legs par bsgrubs na/ mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro// legs pa ma bsrubs na lha dang mi 'thob par 'gyur ro// khyim par 'dug ste legs par bskyangs na lha dang mi 'thob po//
106b4: bskyangs na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas 'thob bo// yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa de ni khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas de bas na khyim na gnas pa
106b5: mi 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / rab tu 'byung ngo // des smras pa/ bu legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ ma 'gags pa'i ne'u zla shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de de'i drung du song ngo //
106b6: de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pa gas na pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur to// ma 'gags pa bi bang la byang ba yin pas nges sgra ci 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas sgor bsdad de/ sgo srungs
106b7: kyi mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje song la rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig/ sgo srungs song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la smras
106b8: gas pa'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas chab smon sdod cing mchis so/ / des smras pa shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog/ shes ldan ma 'gags par du mthong shigadanang du zhugs
107a1: ba dang / rgyal pos 'khrud nas 'jug tu bcug ste smras pa/ khyod 'ongs nas ci srid lon/ des smras pa/ gang gi tshe khyod bi bar len pa na rgyun chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so//
107a2: mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ des smras pa/ khyod pi bang len pa la byang ba yin no// shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gzhon nu don ci zhig la 'ongs/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ lha rgyal po zas
107a3: gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig par bsgo bas da khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig rab tu 'byung ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na kho ba
107a4: yang rab tu 'byung ste gros bya ba yod kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid du gnas thob shig/ de de nyid du gnas btab bo// mal 'cha' bas rims pag gi dri can gyi gos kyis bting zhing me tog gi si lams bkram
107a5: pa'i mal du ma 'gags pa nyal ba dang / de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyams su myong nas smras pa/ ci 'di 'og tu rdo phre'u yod dam/ de rnams kyis brtag pa brtsams pa na me tog gi rtsa ba
107a6: zhig mthong nas de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/ / ma 'gags pa mtshan mo mi bde zhing nyal nas nas langs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ma 'gags pa cig bde bar gnyid log gam/ des smras
107a7: pa lha bde bar gnyid ma log go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir ma 'gags pas spras pa/ lha rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting bar me tog sil ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsa bas lus snang lags so//
107a8: rgyal pos mal 'cha' ba bkug nas khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting ste ci bya/ mal 'cha' bas smras pa/ lha bdag la dkor bas btang ba lags so// rgyal pos dkor ba bkug nas
107b1: smras pa/ / khyod kyis rims pag gi dri can gyi gos phog ste ci bya// des smras pa/ lha bdag la thag pas gtang ba lags so// rgyal pos thag pa bkug nas smras pa/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir rims bag gi dri
107b2: can gyi gos 'bul/ thag pas spras pa/ lha snam bu 'thag pa'i 'phro cung zhig lus pa na/ bdag rims kyis thebs bzhin gyis pa lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis ji ltar shes/ des
107b3: smras pa/ tsha ba'i reg pa nyams su myong bas rims pag gi dri lags so// rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te smras pa// shes ldan ma 'gags pa ni shAkya'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa yin no// de nas
107b4: shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ gnon nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung na/ lha sbyin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal por gyur te/ de shAkya rnams la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis// ma la bdag thams cad la 'dus la
107b5: lha sbyin spro ba paskyed par bya'o/ / zhes shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkug sted nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa/ lha sbyin kho bo cag thams cad rab tu 'byung na/ khyod ci byed/ lha byin gyis bsams pa/ gal
107b6: te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis rab tu byung bar mi 'gyur gyis de la thabs zhig bsham par bya ste bslu'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro da'i
107b7: kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa/ ji ltar 'di'i sgyu mas skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang du bya'o zhes bsams so snyam nas smras pa/
107b8: khyed cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ci ste 'dug/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis bsams pa/ 'di ni brdzun du smra ba yin gyis dam 'char bcug la 'gro ba mang pos so sor rig par bya'o snyam mo// de nas
108a1: rgyal pos cheg de glegs bul bris nas grong khyer ser sna'i gzhir dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ grong khyer ser sna'i gzhin gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig/ bzang ldan dang / nam
108a2: dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbyin la sogs te shAkya lnga brgya rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyis thos par gyis la rab tu dga' ba skyed cig ces bsgo'o// lha sbyin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang
108a3: yid mi bde ba skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan nges par rab tu 'byung bar shes par gyur dang bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig/ de ni gal te rab tu ma byung na brdzun du smra ba yin/
108a4: no zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad dam/ ci rab tu byung la bdag rab tu byung bzhin du rgyal srid bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du
108a5: sems te/ shAkya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas des grong khyer de gsag ma dang gyo mo bsal/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan bsgreng / dar gyi tshun 'phyang
108a6: mang po sbyangs/ shin du dri zhim po'i pog bor nye bar bzhag/ me tog sna tshogs kyi sil mas dga' dga' ltar byed tu bcug go// de nas shAkya brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgo
108a7: na seng ge'i khre la 'dug go/ shAkya mo dang / shAkya gzhon nu ngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang skar khung khol ma can dang skar khung dang / stegs bu dag la 'dug go/ shAkya rnams kyi 'byor pa la lta bar
108a8: 'dod pa'i skyes pa'i tshogs yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa dag kyang lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su 'dug go/ shAkya las su dag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur su dag gis
108b1: ni thugs byung bar 'gyur brtag pa'i bram ze mtshan mkhan dang / lhas mkhan dag bkug go// shAkya rnams dog la dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pa dang /
108b2: ma dag la bltas nas/ so so'i shing rtar zhugs te phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa na/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan snal byung ba mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ re shig 'dis ni/
108b3: mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa la sogs pa phyir phyung ba na de dag gis mnam na rnams kyis lung bstan to// de nas lha basbyin phyir byung ste/ de phyir byung ban bya khras
108b4: gtsug gi nor bu phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di'i rtags dang sbyar na/ gdon mi za bar ston par 'khus nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ko ka
108b5: ka dang / 'ad dra 'a bya dang / ka ta mor ka dang / rgyal dang / rgya mtshos sbyin rnams phyir byung ba na/ bong bu'i skad grag nas de dag kyis mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di dag kyang nyan thos chen po rnam
108b6: la tshig ngan pa smras nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ / nye dga' glang po che la zhon nas phan tshun du lta bar byed pan mu tig gi do shal ltung ba dang / de glang po che las babs te blangs so// de yang de
108b7: rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di ha cang 'dod chen ches pas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye par 'gyur ro// de nas bzang ldan dang / nam gu dang / ma 'gags pa lha sbyin la sogs
108b8: pa shAkya lnga brgya po de rnams bskyed mos tshal du dus ston la 'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams
109a1: dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung na kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ kha cig gis ni mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur te/ mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ba gang dag yin
109a2: pa de dag gzhan du sems la/ dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma pa yin pas/ ma la ngas thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bzhi'i las kyis rab tu
109a3: byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs su gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams gsol pa dang / bzhi'i las kyis
109a4: rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'chal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to// rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya
109a5: rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba/ de rnams rab tu 'byung ba na skra 'breg par btang nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis sgra 'breg pa na/ de ngo ma zung gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag
109a6: cing skad mdzer cing dbugs brtsegs pas sgra 'breg par byed do/ / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa nye bar 'khor ci'i phyir du/ de snying rje rje skad du gcom chung ngur dal bus tshig re
109a7: re nas smras pa/ lha ba dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa mi phal ba rnams la yang bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba/ zhig/ khyed kyis spangs
109a8: te gson pa pas na gum mi bsngo/ / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khor khyod kyis rje bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te chog gis mya ngan ma byed
109b1: cig/ ngas ji ltar ri che ba rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes spras nas des phyogs gcig tu ras gcig bting nas shAkya'i gzhon nu rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan gzhon
109b2: nu dag nyon cig/ 'drag mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag cag la bkur bsti byas la bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyis rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen dungs kyi steng du zhog shig/ de rnams
109b3: kyis mo do dang / do shal dang / mgul rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna rgyan la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i rgyan khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi steng du phung po chen por
109b4: spungs so/ / nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams kyi mthar gyis skra bregs te de rnams khrus la dong ba dang des bsams pa/ re shig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang / lang tshol bab cing chung ma dang ldan
109b5: la mdzod dang / bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu byung na bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// gal te bdag rigs ngan dum skyes na bdag
109b6: kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo la rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo// 'di ni
109b7: chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyan lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang
109b8: byed pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyo ba skyes pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor gdan ba der song ste phyin nas 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor
110a1: la 'di skad ces smras so/ / nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin du me dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ btsun pa
110a2: shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi phyir da ltar gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang / lang tshol bab cing chung ma dang ldan la bar mdzod dang / bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/ bdag
110a3: rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsu dam pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las
110a4: rgal ba dang / spor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang / 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na bdag ci'i phyir/ sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti
110a5: bus smras pa/ bzhin bzangs thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni rigs snying por byed pa ma yin/ rus snying por byed pa ma yin/ rgyud snying por byed pa ma yin/ thos pa snying por byed pa ma
110a6: yin te/ 'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni// rgyud dang rus la rtog mi mdzad// 'das nas yun
110a7: ring lon pa yi/ / las rnams la ni rtog par mdzad// gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na chur bcom
110a8: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dod dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro// des khas grangs so// den sa sa dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor khrid de bcom
110b1: ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa nye bar 'khor 'di
110b2: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lags na thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu
110b3: byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong chur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i
110b4: mod kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon pa dang / lag pa lhung bzed dang byam bum gyis 'brel ba dang skra dang kha spu skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya
110b5: len pa'i spyod lam la bur gnas par gyur to/ / smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas// swa byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing // med la dbang po rab zhing gnas/
110b6: gyur te// sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// shAkya rab tu byung ba'i rnams ni rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byed pas/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud par byed pa
110b7: na nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes so/ / de nas des gdong bteg ste gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang gdud par bgyi
111a1: 'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'abul ba/ bud rgyal spangs pa'i byang rab tu byung bayinate/ 'di rgan gyis nga rgyal kyi drags pa chag sa thung cag/ ngas rang nang pa la gzugs
111a2: pa na sa chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'/
111a3: nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dmal/ lho phrogs mthon byang phyogs dmara'/ byang phyogs mthon lho phyogs dpa'/ #dbus mthon mtha' dma'/ mtha' mthon/
111a4: dbus dma' bar gyur te/ de ltar thams cad kyis rims bzhin du gtugs so// lha sbyin gyis ma btung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin gyis
111a5: thung cig/ des gsol pa/ bdag gis de'i rkang pa lam gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis zhes te 'dud du ma btub ste der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lhas sbyin gyis bcag go// sangs
111a6: rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro dA'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'das nas par skabs kyi gtam
111a7: 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes// thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung
111a8: du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri
111b1: bdag cag gis ni shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon kyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin pa yang ma shas na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag/
111b2: cag bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der dod la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don de nyid zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o// de nas ser skya'i/
111b3: gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas serasna
111b4: gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa 'dir bdag cag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun/ khang du 'tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi bka' mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/ shAkya
111b5: rnams ni gang las skyes thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag shAkya rnams
111b6: ni gang las skyes thogs na gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni gang yin zhes de skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes/ thog ma ni gang yin/ rgyu ni ci zhig/
