111b7: yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa yang mi shes na ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der dod la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhes te/ bcom
111b8: ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du bzung bar bgyi'o snyam nas de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di nyid zhu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams ni gang las skyes
112a1: lags/ thog ma ni gang lags/ d+hu ni ci zhig lags/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon kyi rigs rgyud ni gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgong sa te/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon bya
112a2: rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam glengs na/ mu stegs can dang kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces dge slong gau ta ma ni ci 'dod pa de lung bstod pas bdag nyid lteng bar byed de zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i gnas
112a3: 'di yod pas nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas ches kyi gtam gleng bar nus pa su yod snyam mo/ / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid du 'das
112a4: shing 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu nga rgyab skud pas re shig des bsal gyis khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rig
112a5: rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so// de nas bcom ldan
112a6: 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud nas snam sbyar blta ba ste sngas su bcug nas/ glo g.yas pas phab ste/ zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas
112a7: snang ba'i 'du shes dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis sems rnga
112a8: ltar mnyam par bzhag na shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud gang yin pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la
112b1: snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen thob sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par
112b2: zhugs pa dang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyad shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sman kyi rigs
112b3: ni gang yin pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gud la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos ser skya'i gzhi
112b4: shAkya rnams la smras pa/ gau ta ma dag 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing 'jig rten zhig nas/ sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de rnams de ni yid las byung ba'i gzugs
112b5: phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i
112b6: zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ / de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' shig du 'gyur zhing mtsho gcig tu 'gyur ro// sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' shig/ gi mcho gcig tu gyur pa'i ste
112b7: du rlung gis phris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang // khebs par byed do// dper na 'o ma bskol ba grangs par gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis phris ma chags pa dang / legs pa dang / rabs pa de bzhin du
112b8: sa che ni po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gis mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gi phris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do// sa'i bcud de ni kha dog phun sum tshogs pa
113a1: dri phun sum tshogs pa don sumatshogs pa yin ning 'do ni 'i lta bu yin te/ / dper na mar sar lta bu'o// ron 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrad ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa di yod do// gau ta
113a2: ma dag 'jig rten gang yin pa 'di 'chags shing 'jig rten chags na/ de nas sems can kha cig tshe zad las zad bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'di lta bur mi rnams
113a3: dang skal ba mnyam par 'ong zhing de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams ca dang ldan zhing kha dog bzang
113a4: pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can/ mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/ rgyu skar rnams kyang
113a5: med/ / skad cig dang thad cig dang yud tsam yang med// mtshan mo dang nyin mo yang med/ zla ba dang // zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba med do// skyes pa dang bud med du
113a6: mngon pa yang med kyi gzhan du na sems can sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ / de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis 'dzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcu dmyang bar bye'o// ji lta ji ltar
113a7: myangs pa de lta de ltar sred/ / dziH/ ji ltar sred pa de lta/ de ltar kham gyis zas rim gyis za'o// sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de 'dzub ma'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myur bar byed de// ji lA ji ltar maH
113a8: ba de lta de ltar sred la ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang de rnams kyis kyang 'dzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar bcom ste/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar
113b1: sred do/ / ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o// gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe// de rnams kyi lus la ma khrad pa dang lci bzhugs par
113b2: gyur to/ / de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de yang nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to// gau ta ma dag chos nyid kyis 'jig rten du mun pa byung ba na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis
113b3: 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de rnam
113b4: de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ / de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung zad du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par 'gyuro// kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par
113b5: 'gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan no// khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no// zhes sems can gyis sems
113b6: can la khyad du gsod do/ / kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i chus sa'i banud de nub par gyur to// gau ta ma dag sa'i bcud de nub pa na sems can de rnam
113b7: tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hung bro ba kyi hung bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dper na da ltar mi rnams kyis zas zhim po chung zad cig zos nas sngon ci yi
113b8: ge dang / tshig dang tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces// kyi shud bro ba kyi hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa'i bcud de nub pa na/ tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba kyi hud
114a1: bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no// zhes de'i don nim mi shes so// gau ta ma dag sems can de rnams
114a2: kyi sa'i bcud de nub pa nas zhig 'dog phun su tshigs pa phrin su me tshogs pa/ byung ba 'gyu // ba dog ni 'di sa bu yin te pe na do ki'i mag bu'o// don 'di lta bu yin to// dper na spang ma'i sbrang rtsi gcing ba la bu'o/
114a3: de rnams de za zhing de zas su zab la tshe ring zhing yun rang du gnas so// de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa da ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to// bzas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni la
114a4: dog ngan par gyur to/ / zas kyi tshad gnyis la rten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kye sems can kho ba ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems
114a5: can gyis sems can la khyad du gsong bar byed do/ / kha dog gis mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i zhag nub par gyur to// gau ta ma dag sa'i zhag de nub pa
114a6: gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'ang skad ces/ / kyai zung brab kyi burd bri bzhis smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal bar byed do// dper na dkar mi rnams sdug bsngal bar
114a7: yid mi bde ba 'ba' zhig gis reg pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces a mab kyi bud a me kyai bud ces sa pa de bzhin du sems can du rnams zhag de nub pan
114a8: tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces kyi phud brob kyi phung bro ba zhes smra zhing spro sngags 'dod la mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar 'gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin no zhes bya/
114b1: par mi shes so// go ta ma dag sems can de rnams kyi sa zhag de nub pa na/ myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing kha dog ni
114b2: 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na shing ka dam pa ka'i me tog lta bu'o// don 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi bcir ba lta bu'o// de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba la tshe ri zhing yun ring du gnas so//
114b3: de rnams las kha zas la ches nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur to// khe zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur to// zas kyi tshad gnyis la rten nas 'dog
114b4: rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ / kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas kye sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// kho dog
114b5: gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/ / gau ta ma dag myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing
114b6: 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ / mdun nas phar song / mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sdug sa 'don la mya ngan dang sdug bsngal bar gyur to// dper na da ltar mi rnams 'ga' zhig la drag po'i tshar bcad
114b7: par 'dod pa na sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de dag nyid rjes su thos shing 'di skad du/ mdun nas par song / mdun nas phar song zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub
114b8: dang / tshegs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ mdun nas phar song // mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la mya ngan dang sdug sngal bar gyur kyang // smras pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin/ smras pa/ 'di'i don 'di yin no zhes bya
115a1: khang 'dan namags sa/ / ta ma dag sems can de rnams myaga'atshal na nas/ sa smras ma btab pa'i 'brams yul thas bya'onapa ni bzab sa med ga / spyan pa ya sa/ kun pa gad
115a2: gtsang ma ste ste/ de nab brdzas nan ste nang spen par 'gyur/ nang brngas na nub ste shing smin par 'gyur bas/ bangs shing brdas kyang spang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon no// de nams de zazhing de za
115a3: bal tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ / gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma spos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa rba'i 'bras bu la kham gyi zas su rim gyis thos pa de nas de rnams kyi dbang po tha dad pabyung bar gyu
115a4: te/ / kha cig la ni skyes pa'i dbang po'o// kha cig la ni bud med kyi dbang po'o// de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang yin pa rnams dang / skyes pa'i dbang po can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gis mi ga tshugs
115a5: blta'o/ / ji lta ji ltar gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su lta ba de lta de ltar kun du chags so// jiHji ltar kun du chags pa de lta de ltar le 'o// ji la ji ltar zhen pa de lta de ltar log par zhug so// sems
115a6: na gzhan dag gis kyang sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang sa dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos gtor nas 'di skad ces/ sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams niH
115a7: ba ma yin pa byed do/ / sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyis kwa sems can khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sran dbyung shes smra'o// dper na da ltar gyi se rnams bag mablangs pan
115a8: byam dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang / 'bras yos kyi gtor nas 'di skad ces bag ma bde bar gyur cig ces zer ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ba nasas gtor cang
115b1: bong ba dang / gsegs dang / gyo so rnams kyis kyang gtor nas kyang 'di skad ces sems can dran pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed do// sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni bya ba ma yin pa byed kyis/ kwa'i sems can
115b2: khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun 'byung zhes bya ba smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/ / gau ta ma dag da ltar sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi 'dul ba ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/
115b3: ra chos su 'dod do// 'dul bar 'dod do// sngon smad par bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni de ltar bklas par bya bar 'dod do// de rnams kyi de zhag gcig cig spangs pa nas zhag gnyis dang / gsum dang / bdun
115b4: du yang spangs so/ / gang na sems can de rnams sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de la lhag par sdig pa can gyis brtul zhugs spyod pa de rnams khang pa brtsigs pa la brtson par byed do// 'dir bdag cag
115b5: bya ba ma yin pa spyad do/ / 'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do zhes zer bas khyim khyim zhes bya bar grags te/ gau ta ma dag 'di ni 'jig rten du khang pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no//
115b6: de yang chos kyis yin gyi chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni gtso bo yin no// de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs ka/ nang bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang nang
115b7: par sA lu'i cheng du 'dod par byed do/ / de nas sems can snyoms las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis nang bar gyis la nub blangs so// de nas sems can ka' shi gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems
115b8: can khyod tsur sA la'i phyir 'dod do/ / de nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig/ kho bos ni nang par gyis lu nub thang so//
116a1: sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni legs so// kye ma de ni shin du legs kyis ma la bdag gi zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi/ sA lu blang ngo snyam nas
116a2: zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyis lu blangs so// de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sems can khyod tshur sA lu'i phyir 'dod do// dan
116a3: sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces so/ / kye sems can khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig/ kho bos ni zhag gnyis kyi dang / gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi sa bar gyi sa lu blangs zin no// den
116a4: sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma de ni leg so// kye ma de ni shin du legs kyis mal bdag gi zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sA lu blang ngo snyam nas/ des zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sA lu blangs so//
116a5: gang na sems can de rnams kyis ma smos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru ga sog 'jog gi yongs su longs spyad pas zos pa de nas su lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang / sbran pa dang / shun pas yog par gyur to// badz+ras
116a6: shing brngas na yang phyir mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sA lu yang sbubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to// de nas sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas shes ldan dag bdag cag
116a7: sngon yi las blang ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po mnyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dag bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/ nam ma
116a8: la 'gro zhing dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la bdag cag la sa'i bcad kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag
116b1: cag sa'i banud la kham gyi zas kyi rim gyis zos te/ gang gi tshe bdag cag gigi sa'i bcud la kham gyi rim gyi sa zos pa de'i tshe bdag cag gi lus la nub pa nyid dang / lci ba nyid du zhugs par gyur te/ kha dog bzang po'i
116b2: gsal ba gang yin pa de ni nub par gyur pas 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/ / bdag cag de za zhed zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur to// bdag cag las kha zas la ches nyung ngu za ba gang
116b3: yin pa de ni kha dog bzang por gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la rten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon te// bdog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kA
116b4: sems can kho ba ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog dang ba yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la gyad du gsod par byed do/ / bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos
116b5: de dag nyid blangs pa'i chus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur te/ / sa'i bcud de nub pa nas zhag kha dag phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su zab
116b6: la che nga zhing yun ring du gnas so/ / bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan par gyur// kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te zas kyi tshad gnyis
116b7: la rten nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ / kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'e' sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod pa
116b8: byed do/ / bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag de nub par gyur to// sa zhag de nub pa na myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sus tshogs pa/ dri pun
117a1: 2/ sum tshogs pa// ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te bdag cag de mu zhing za su za ba la tshe reng zhing yun ring du gan so// bdag cag rnams las kha zas chos nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog dang ldan pa
117a2: bur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no// kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'i sems can kho bo ni kha dog dang ldan la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin
117a3: no/ / zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do// bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to// myu gu'i
117a4: ral de nub pa nam rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru tshon bzhi pa phub ma med pa/ srun pa med pa/ shun pa med pa/ dag pa/ gtsang ma skya ste/ de nub brngas na nad skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nad brnga sa na nub skye zhing smin
117a5: par gyur pas brngas shing brdas kyang slar yang skye bas brngas par yang mi mngon te/ bdag cag de za zhing zas su za ba la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so// gang nas bdag cag gis ma smos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA
117a6: lu'i 'bru sogs 'jog gi yongs su longs spyod pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang / srun pa dang / shun pas yog par gyur to// brngas shing brngas na yang slar mi skye bas brngas par mngon la/
117a7: sA lu yang srubs sam yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur pas/ ma la bdag cag tshogs shing 'dus la zhing gzhal te mtshams bcad la/ 'di ni khyod kyi'o// 'di ni nga'i 'o zhes mu thug za bar bya'o zhes de rnam
117a8: tshogs shing 'dus nas zhing dgos te mtshams su mu thug bres so/ / go ta mI dag 'di ni 'jig rten du mu thug bre ba'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i rtsom pa dang po yin no// de yang chos kyis rin gyi
117b1: ma yin pas ma yin pas de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di na chos kyi mchog yin no/ / de nas sems can zhig gis rang gis lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par blangs so// sems can gzhan dgazhing sems can
117b2: des rang gi sA lu yod de bzhin du gzhan gyisA lu ma byin par blangs pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kwa'i sems can khyod rang gis lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lum byin bar
117b3: ci'i phyir blang zhes de par drangs tshur drangs nas ci tsam na 'khor me'i nang du khrid de/ / shes ldan dag sems can 'di rang gi sa lu yod bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par len to zhes spyos so//
117b4: de nas sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so// kwa' sems can khyod rang gi sA lu yod bzhin du gzhan gyi sA lu ma byin par ci'i phyir phrad/ kwa' sems can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma
117b5: byed cig/ de nas sems can des sems can de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag sems can 'dis bdag sA lu'i phyir phar drangs tshur drangs nas ji tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang phyung nas spyos so// de nas
117b6: sems can de rnams kyis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kwa'i sems can khyod kyis sems can la sA lu'i phyir phar drangs chur drangs nas dza tsam na 'khor gyi nang du yang b+hu nas ci'i phyir s+ho// kwa'e sems
117b7: can khyod song la phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ de nas sems can da rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag sA lu'i phyir par 'dren tshur 'dren cing ci tsam na 'khor gyi nang du smra ba yang snang bas/ mal bdag cag
117b8: tshogs shing 'dus la bdag cag gi nang na sems can lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par blta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de ni bdag cag gzhang rnams
118a1: kyi bdag por bskos dang / des bdag cag chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams ni chad pas gcod par 'gyur/ pha na bdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par gyur te/ bdag cag gi zhing dag las 'grus
118a2: pa gang yin pa de las de la chos bzhin du thog shes sbyin par bya'o snyam nas de rnams tshegs shing 'dus te/ de rnams kyi nang nas lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par lta na sdug pa/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lhag
118a3: par bsod nams che bar grags pa gang yin pa de zhing rnams kyi bdag por bskos te/ 'di skad ces kyi sems can khyod tshur shog/ kho bo cag las chad pas gcad par bya ba rnams la ni chad pas chod cig pan
118a4: gdags par bya ba rnams la ni pha na thogs shig/ kho bo cag gi zhing dag la 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las khyod la kho bo cag gi chos bzhin du thog shas sbyin no// de de rnams la chad pas gcad par bya ba la ni chad
118a5: pas gcod pan gdags par bya ba rnams la ni phan 'dogs par byed cing de la de rnams kyi zhing dag las 'khrungs pa gang yin pa de las chos bzhin du thogs shas dbul te/ skyo ba'i tshogs chen pos pa zhing skye bo'i//
118a6: tshogs chen pos bkur bas mang po sa bkur pa mang pos bkur bzhes grags so// zhing de rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa na nyams pa las skyeb par byed pas rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya bar grags so// chos
118a7: kyis bye dgu mgu bar byed cing tshul khrims nyams su blangs te gnas/ shes rab nyams su blangs te gnas pas rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya bar grags so// gau ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi tshe mi rnams kyi mang
118a8: sems can sems can zhes bya bar gyur to/ / gau ta ma dag rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i bu 'od mdzes zhes bya ste/ gau ta ma dag rgyal po 'ang mdzes kyi tshe mi rnams kyi ming chung shog/ chu po/ gces bya bar gyur to//
118b1: 'damangs kyi bu dge zhes bya ste/ gtam dag zal pa dge ba'i tshe mi rnams kyi ming sme ba can sla ba can zhes bya bar gyur to// gau tam dag dge ba'i bu dge mchog ces byas// gau ta ma dag rgyal po dge mchog gi tshem rnam
118b2: kyi ming sprin mgrin sprin mgrin zhes bya bar gyur to/ / dge mchog gi bu gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ste/ gau ta ma dag rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi tshe mi rnams kyi mi rnams kyi ming ta la'i rkang ta la'i rkang zhes bya bar
118b3: gyur to/ / rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bor sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin du mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi mda' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi mnga' ba bzhin du chung zad kyang gnod pa mi bskyed do//
118b4: de smin nas brtol ba dang bye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ spyi bo las skyes pas spyi bo skyes zhes bya bar gyur to//
118b5: gzhon nu byung ma thag tu rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo drug khri'i nang du bkri ba dang / de thams cad kyi nu ma la 'o ma zag nas re res da las nur las nu zhes smras pas nga las nung las nu zhes bya bar
118b6: grags so/ / gau ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu gang gi tshe rgyal srid byed pa de'i tshe mi rnams sems par byed/ 'jal bar byed/ nye bar rtog par byed de/ de rnams bsams gzhal nye bar brtags nas bzo
118b7: yi gnas dang / las kyi gnas tha dad pa dag byed du 'jug pas des na de rnams yid las skyes yid las skyes zhes bya bar grags so// gau ta ma dag rgyal po drug po 'di dag ni tshe tshad med cing tsha dpag tu
118b8: med pa yin no/ / gau ta ma dag rgyal po nga las nu'i brla g.yas par sharme na zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin du mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab pa bzhin du chud
119a1: zad kyang gnang pa me spyad do/ / de sbyin nas brtul ba dang / khye'u gzugs bza shing bstan sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brtan pa
119a2: zhig byung ste/ brla g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes pa mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon du du rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu tshe ba yin pas da dung yang gling bzhi la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/
119a3: gau ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes pa'i brla g.yon par sha rmen zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin du mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du chung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do//
119a4: de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ brla g.yon pa las skyes pas ming /
119a5: mdzes nye mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung yang gling gsum la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go// gau ta mi dag rgyal po nye mdzes kyi rkang pa
119a6: g.yas par sharme na zhig skyes pa 'jam zhing shin du mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs
119a7: bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yas pa las skyes pas ming mdzes ldan mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to//
119a8: gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung du yang gling gnyis la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ gau ta ma dag rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa g.yon par sha rmen zhig
119b1: skyes pa 'jam zhing shin du mnyen te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am/ ras bal gyi 'dar ba bzhin du chung zad kyang gnod pa mi skyed do// de smin nas brtol ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ bltan sdug pa
119b2: mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i tshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yon pa las skyes pas med nye mdzes ldan nye mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul
119b3: che zhing mthu che ba yin pas da dung du yang gling gcig la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 'jug go/ / gau ta ma dag de ltar rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi bu 'od mdzes so// 'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba'o//
119b4: dge ba'i bu dge mchog go/ dge mchog gi thu gso sbyong 'phags so// gso sbyong 'phags kyi bung las nu'o// ra las nu'i mdzes pa'o// mdzes pa'i nye mdzes pa'o// nye mdzes kyi mdzes ldan dang /
119b5: nye mdzes ldan dang / bzang po dang / legs bzangs dang / btang ba dang / btang bzung dang / yan lag dang / yan lag shing rta dang / ngan spong dang / skal ldan shing rta dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho'i
119b6: bu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / sha ku ni dang / sha ku ni chen po dang / ku sha dang / nye ba'i ku sha dang / ku sha chen po dang / legs mthong dang / legs mthong chen po dang / rab thob dang / rab tho ba chen po dang /
119b7: rab tu sgra sgrags dang / rab tu smra bsgrags chen po dang / 'od byed dang / rdul phod pa dang / lhun po ldan dang / lhun po yod dang / 'od zer ldan dang / 'od zer yod dang / kun nas 'od zer ro//
119b8: gau ta ma dag kun nas 'od zer gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tshe'i rgyud rgyal po rgya tham pa yul gru 'dzin du drung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung ste/ dgra 'dul
120a1: bar byed pas dgra 'dul dgra 'dul zhes bya bar gyur to/ / gau ta ma dag rgyal po dgra 'dul gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyung rgyal po lnga khri bzhi stong yul dmag gi mi tshugs pa
120a2: bAng ngo / / de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba byu nga ste/ ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byed pa na ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba margyal ba las rgyal ba zhes par grags so// gau ta me dag rgya
120a3: ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri drug stong yul ba ra na ser thung ste/ de rnams kyi pha ma ni rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba byung ngo // gautam
120a4: dag rgyal po bzod dka'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / su ma tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong ki ma bi la'i grong khyer du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po tshangs pas byin ces bya ba
120a5: do/ / gau ta ma dag rgyal po tshangs byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i dU nga rgyal po sum khri nyis stong glang po che'i grong khyer du b+hu nga ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po glang pos byin zhes bya
120a6: ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po glang po sa byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / su mtsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga stong yul rdo 'dzeg tu byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po ba la bu can zhes bya ba byung ngo //
120a7: gau ta ma dag rgyal po bal bu can gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / su mtsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer brang gis nyal du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po chen po che 'dula'o
120a8: bya ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po chen po che bdul gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / su mtsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer ma rgyal ba las rgyal bar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ra r+yal
120b1: po rgyal byin zhes bya ba byung ngo / / go ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal byin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po sum khri nyis stong grong khyer ka n+ya'i kub par byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma
120b2: ni rgyal po rgyal sde zhes bya ba byung ngo / / go ta ma dag rgyal po rgyal sde'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / su ma tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri brtad stong grong khyer tsam par byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ba ni rgyal po
120b3: klu'i lha zhes bya ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po klu'i lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po nyi khri lnga stod grong khyer ta la'i phreng du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po ma'i lha
120b4: zhes bya ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po ma'i lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / su ma tsha'i rgyud rgyal po khri nyis stong grong khyer ta ma la ra byung ste/ de rnams kyi thamani rgya po rgya mtsho'i lha zhes bya ba
120b5: byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i lha'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'a gyad stong grong khyer bA ra na se'i grong du b+hung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po blo gros bzang po zhes
120b6: bya ba blu ngo do/ / gau ta ma dag rgyal po blo gros bzang po'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / su mtsho'i rgyud rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mun sel zhes bya
120b7: babyung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po mun sel gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya tham pa yang grong khyer ba ran ser byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i
120b8: sde zhes bya ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal
121a1: po rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sde'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po skyong yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du b+hu to// de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po
121a2: dka' thub spyod ces bya ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po bka' thub spyod kyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i chud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer rtswa can du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po
121a3: sa'i gdong zhes bya ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i gdong gi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum mang grong khyer ba ra na ser byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po sa
121a4: bdag po zhes bya ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa'i bdag po'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yar tsha dang / su mtsha'i rgyud rgyal po 'bum yang grong khyer dmag gi mi tshugs par byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po
121a5: sa 'dzin zhes bya ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po sa 'dzin gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong grong khyer mi thi lar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po
121a6: lha chen po zhes bya ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po lha chen po'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sumatsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang grong khyer mi thilar drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa la
121a7: spyad de/ / de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba byung ngo // su khyud las 'bying ba dang / sra ba'i mu khyud dang / rko ba dang / nye bar rko dang / rko ba yod dang / kun nas rko dang / gya nom snang dang tho
121a8: dang / chos kyi sde dngag togs pa dang rtogs pa chen po dang / rtogs pa'i sde dang / mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral dang / brtan pa'i sde dang / rga bar sbyar dang / glen bsad dang / skya reng dang / phyogs kyi bdag po dang rdul
121b1: can dang / bde byed dang / kun dga' dang / me long gdong dang / skyed pa dang / kun nas bskyed pa dang / skye bo'i khyu mchog dang / bza' btung can dang / bza' ba btung mang po can dang / mi thub pa dang / gzhan
121b2: gyis mi thub pa dang / gnas pa dang shin du gnas pa dang / stobs chen dang / stobs chen zhon dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / brtan po zhon dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / gzhu dgu bcu dang /
121b3: gzhu rgyal dang / bzhu bkra dang / gzhu sra dang / shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu bcu pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / shing rta sra ba'o// gau ta ma dag rgyal po shing u0f7f
121b4: sra ba'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bdun khri bdun stong grong khyer kun du snang bar byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po kri kr-i zhes bya ba byung // de'i tshe ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
121b5: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs
121b6: rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od bsrungs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ma 'ongs pa na byang chub par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/
121b7: dga' ldan gyi lha'i risu skyes so// gau ta ma dag rgyal po kri kri'i bu legs skyes so// gau ta ma dag rgyal po legs skyes kyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang cha dang / sumatsha'i chud rgyal po brgyams pa pang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de nam kyi
121b8: tha ma ni rgyal po rna ba can zhes bya ba byung / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po rna ba can la bu gnyis te/ gau ta ma dang / b+ha ra dra dza'o// de gnyis las go ta ma ni mngon pa byung bar dga'o// ba ra dra rda ni rgyal srid la mngon par
122a1: dga'o/ / de pa chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa mthong nas des bsams pa/ bdag yab 'das nas rgyal por gyur te/ bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar
122a2: gzhol bar 'gyur bas 'dir ci'i dus la bab ce na/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o// snyam du bsams nas/ rgyal po rna ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba btab pa/ yab
122a3: mkhyen par mdzod cig bdag ni dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo / / des smras pa/ bu gang gi phyir mchod sbyin mchod par byed pa dang / sbyin bsreg sreg par byed pa dang / dka' thub dka' thub spyod pa de dag ni 'di'i ched yin
122a4: te/ da 'das na rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs te rgyal po byed par 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung / des smras pa/ yab bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid bgyid rngo ma thog go// de ltar bas na mkhyen par mdzod cig rab tu bya'o/
122a5: de nas rgyal pos gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas gnang ngo // de'i tshe ba ste gnas shig na drang srong mdog gnag ces bya ba gnaso// de nas gzhon nu gau ta ma rgyal pos gnang nas dga' zhing mgul dka' ba rgya chen po dang yid bde ba
122a6: skyes nas/ drang srong mdog nag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / spyod lam dul bas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis bdag rab tu phyung shig/ des de rab tu gyung do//
122a7: dra srong mdog nag ni 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang chu 'thung bas de yang drang srong gau ta ma drang srong gau ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to// ji tsam na ngas gzhan zhig na rgyal po rna ba can shi nas gzhon nu ba ra drA dza pa'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang
122a8: byed du bcug go/ / ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na drang srong gau tams mkhan po la smras pa/ mkhan po dgon pa'i gnas na zas kyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thog gis grong 'dab tu gnas par bgyi'o// des smras pa/ bu rung gis grong ngam
122b1: dgon pa na gnas pa'i drang srong gis ni mdor na dbang po bsrung ba yin gyis/ / khyod song la gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i skyil bu byos la 'dug shig/ mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ drang srong gau tam gru 'dzin gyi
122b2: nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byas te gnas so/ / de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzin na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / skyes bug yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba gnas te/ des de la dga'as gur spyad pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan dag
122b3: bskur ro/ / des gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las yang mi gzhan zhig kAr shu ba na lnga brgya thogs pa zhig 'ongs nas/ bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis tshur shog des bsams pa/ gal te bdag song na kAr shA ba na lnga brgya
122b4: yang mi 'thob la khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni legs pa ma yin no snyam nas des bu mo ma dag gzhug ma la smras pa/ song la pad mo'i rtsa lag la jo mo'i mchid nas re shig bdag skabs ma mchis te slad kyis
122b5: mchi'o zhes smros shig/ des de'i gan du song nas smra so// mi de yang bya ba mang po zhig yin pas de de dang dga' mgur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo // des bsams pa nam tshed ring du yod pas de'i sems kyang bsrung bar nus so snyam nas des yang
122b6: bu mo de la bsgo ba/ pad ma'i rtsa lag gi gan du song la jo me'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags na skyed mos tshal gang du mchi zhes smros shig/ des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyi skad cig la skabs med/ skad cig la skabs yod
122b7: ce'am/ bu mo de de dang rigs mi 'grod pa zhig pas des smras pa/ rje'i sras skabs mchis pa ni ma lags mod kyi/ de khyod kyi gos dang rgyan dag gis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do// de'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang
122b8: bral bar gyur cing gnod sems kyi kun nas dkris pa skyes te/ de mi bsod pa skyes nas smras pa/ bu mo song la bzang mo pad ma'i rtsa lag narare bskyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog shig ces byos shig/ des song nas bzang mo la
123a1: smras nas dedas de bskyed mos tshal du song ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can dadam pagan skal/ khyod la ba'i gas dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang ldan cig dga' mgur spyod pa rags sam// ngas smras pa/ rje'i sras da ni bdag gis no
123a2: 'on kyang bud med ni rtag tu ston can lags pas bzod par mdzod cig/ de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas byung ste bsang ngo de nas bu mo mngag gzhag mas ngom pos do da nga ma bsad do zhes tso sgra chen po bton paskye ba'i tshogs chen po kun kyis
123a3: thos nas brgyugs pa dang / de ji tsam na bsti gnas de nyid na drang srong gau ta ma gan so// de nas skyes bu g.yon can pad ma'i rtsa lag de sgra ga nas ral gri khrag can drang srong gau ta ma'i mdun du bor nas skya bo'i tshogs de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so// skye bor
123a4: tshogs chen po de ral gri khrag can mthong nas spras pa/ rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo bsad do zhes de nas drang srong go ta ma de bskor te/ mi bzod pa skyed nas smras pa/ kra ye rab tu byung ba dang drang srong gi rgyal mtshan thogs nas 'di 'dra ba'i las
123a5: byed dam/ des smras pa/ ci byas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bsad do// des smras pa/ kho bo'i sdig pa zhi bas las de mi byed do zhes de zhi ba smras kyang skye bo'i tshogs des lag nga pyi ka lag tu dam du bcings
123a6: nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bkum lags so// rgyal po rnams ni mi rtog pa yin pas// nges smras pa// gal te de ltar gyur na rab tu byung ba 'dings spangs kyis gsal shing la gzhon
123a7: de rab tu byung ba de me tog ka ra bai ra'i phreng ba mgul du btags shing skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su bsgrags pa'i sgor
123a8: bsgrags te grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas gson po nyid du gsal shing la gshon no/ / de'i mkhan po mdog gnag de dus su nga'i ste gnas su 'gro ba yin pas jiHma dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas des phan tshun du bcal
123b1: bar brtsams pa dang ji tsam na de gsal shing la gshon pa mthong nas de skad migasal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus smras pa/ kyi hud bu 'di ci zhig/ nges kyang skad mi gsal zhing yi chad la gnang dug
123b2: ba'i gnod pa'i tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/ mkhan po gzhan ci lags las lags mod// des smras pa/ bu rma byung ba'am gnod pa zhig ma byas grang / mkhan po bdag gis lus kyis ma byung gi sems kyis ni ma yin no//
123b3: bu ji ltar shes/ mkhan po bden pa gsol gyis gson cig bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lus kyi rma phyung gi sems kyis ma yin na/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i lpags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin
123b4: pa'adi gser gyi kha dog tu gyur cig/ bdag nyid chen po de lhag pa'i bsams pa goms pa yin pas tshig spras ma thag tu drang srong mdog nag gi lpags pa nag po mi snang zhing gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to// kun du drang srong mdog nag gser
123b5: gyi kha dog tu gyur to/ / zhes sgra sbags pas de'i ming gser mdog ces bya bar gyur te/ de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to// de nas drang srong gau ta mas smras pa/ mkhan po bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni gang / skye ba ni gang / tshe phyi ma ni gang
123b6: zhig lags/ des smras pa/ bu bram ze rnams khye'u med pa la 'gro ba med do zhes zer na khyod kyis bu dka' bskyed pa lta yod dam/ mkhan po yab kyis rgyal srid kyi slad du spro ba bskyed pa na bdag gzhon nu nyid du rab tu byung bas bud
123b7: med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/ bdag gi bu skyed pa lta ga la mchis/ bu gal te de lta na sngon yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par gyis shig/ mkhan po tshor ba drag pos nyen pas nga ni bdag gi gnad rnams chad cing tshigs rnams bye ste/
123b8: 'bum pa gcig tu dran par bas na ji ltar sngon gyi yuya la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/ de'i mkhan po mngon par shes pa thob pa yin pas/ de rdzu 'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po sprul nas chang ba'i thigs pas de'i lus la phog pa dang /
124a1: de nas char ba dang drung grang mo rag pas sdug bsngal rnam par mnan nas// des sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so// gang gi tshe des 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las khra ba'i thigs pa
124a2: gnyis khrag dang lhan cig lhung ngo / / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ni bzhi ste/ bdag sems pa dang 'jig rten sems pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
124a3: yul sems pa'o/ / khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgong gnyis su gyur nas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang / khye'u gnyis shig byung nas da dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bu ram shing gi tshal gseb der de gnyis
124a4: zhugs so/ / de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin du tsha ba byung ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis drang srong gau ta ma'i gdungs nas shi'o// de nas drang srong gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas des gsal shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na// sgo nga rdol
124a5: ba'i khog pa gnyis shig 'dug nas/ de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing tshal ga sab tu zhugs pa las ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo // des 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa las zhugs pa dang drang srong go ta ma'i
124a6: bu yin par gyur nas/ de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/ des de gnyis pasti gnas su khrid nas bsnun gsos te// de de gnyis kyi ming btags pa nyi ma shar bi'i tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin par byas pa las 'di gnyis skyes par
124a7: byung bas de bas nyi ma'i rigs yin pas des na nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to/ / drang srong gau ta mA'i bu yin pas ming na/ ya na tam go bya bar gyur to// rang gi yan lag las skyes pas ming gsum pa yan lag skyes bya bar
124a8: gyur to/ / bu ram shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas ming bzhi pa bu ram shing ba zhes bya bar gyur to// ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po b+ha ra dwa dza bu med par shi nas/ blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa shes ldan dag su
124b1: zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ / gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de'i gcen go tas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste rgyal srid 'di ni de'i rigs rgyud du 'ongs pa yin pas de dbang bskur ro// de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong
124b2: gser mdog gi drung du song ste phyin pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la btugs nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po gau ta ma gang du mchis/ des smras pa khyed cag khe nas bsad do// de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de mthong bar
124b3: yang mi dran na ji ltar bsad/ kho bos khyed cag dran par bya'o ma nongs so// des de rnams dran par byas pa dang / smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na sdig pa spyod bde ming tsam smos pa yang bsgrags pa ma yin
124b4: gyis zhog shig/ des sdig pa'i las ci byas/ 'di dang 'di'o// skyon med pa gnod pa mi byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do// de ltar ci mngon des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams yid mi bde
124b5: bskyes nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po gal te de lta na des ma logs kyi/ bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so zhes de rnams de skad du smra bar byed pa na khye'u de gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so// blon po rnams kyis spras
124b6: pa/ drang srong chen po khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/ des smras pa/ de kho na'i bu'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis ji ltar skyes// 'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/ des byung ba dang bcas par rgyas par smras pa/ blon po rnams
124b7: kyis de thos te mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas de gnyis las gzhon nu pu bo shaso rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las de yang ba med par shi'o/ / de nas gcig shos nubo
124b8: dbang bskar nas de'i ming rgyal po bu ram shing ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ / gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing ba'i bu dang / tsha bo dang yang tsha dang sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing ba brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni rgyal po
125a1: bu ram shing ba 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo / / gau ta ma dag rgyal po bu ram shing ba 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/ skar mda' gtong dang / lag na dang glang po che 'dul dang / rkang gdub can no// dus gzhan zhig na de'i btsun
125a2: mo dam pa shi nas de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci ba slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs// des smras pa/ nga'i btsun me dam pa shi na ci'i
125a3: phyir sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug/ lha gal te de lta na nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na ci'i slad du lha'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgal
125a4: ba 'di dag yod na da la su zhig bu mo ster bar 'gyur/ lha dgongs shig dang / bdag cag gis btsal lo// ji tsam na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba lta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa btsun mo dam par 'tsham pa yod pa/
125a5: mi rnams kyis brtags te/ rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas// de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu rgyud de rgyal po de la rig par byas pa dang rgyal pos bsgo ba/ khug shig/ de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas rkang pa gnyis
125a6: la gtugs te thog mar gtam byas nas 'dug go/ gtam gyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas smras pa/ lha bkra shis par gyur cig/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shos ldan dag khyod ci gsol/
125a7: rgyal po bu ram shing ba 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched du sras mo smad do// rgyal pos smras pa/ 'thab ring bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te de'i bu mo la khye'u zhig
125a8: yod par gyur na da gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag pa lta na sbyin no/ / lha bka' bzhin 'chal mchis la lha la snyan du gdas par gsal lo zhes de rnams dong nas/ rgyal po bu ram shing ba 'phags skyes po la ji ltar
125b1: gyur pa smras pa/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni 'os pa ma yin no// lha don 'di la nges pa ma mchis//
125b2: te/ re shig btsun mo blangs la lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang / dgyes pa dang / dgyes dgur spyod pa mdzod cig/ de la khye'u ba 'a bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/ skye ma mchis par 'gyur ba sus 'tshal rgyal pos smras
125b3: shes ldan dag gal te de lta na deng la long shig/ de rnams dong nas bsu ste/ ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga'
125b4: bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u
125b5: gzugs bzang ba/ lta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas so// bcas nos de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes mid 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ltar ma skyes
125b6: pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal srid dga' zhes bgyi'o/ / khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed
125b7: drag par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zhang po rgyal po sa thos nas/ des de la pho nya btang ste/ tshig rtsub po dang chas pa'i spring yig bskur ba/
125b8: khyod kyis sngon khas blangs shing / dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de lta na legs/ gal te de ltar ma byas na khyod kyi mthu dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des sbed cig/ kho bo'i
126a1: nasangs nas yul 'bar bya ma na ga/ rgyal bsatha can pa dang ldan pangs pas nas blags/ tha pa rnams pasogs nas smras pa/ shes dag la rgyal ba sa padad/
126a2: na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya// de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal srid dga' rgyal 'tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu ches phu por gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams
126a3: spangs te/ nu bo rgyal srid kyis dbang bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no// de rnams kyis spras pa/ lha rgyal po de ni stobs dang bzhon pa rgya che bas gal te 'dir mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar yul bur mar rlog pa
126a4: gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par dbang bskur la/ gzhon nu de rnams ni smug tu gsol// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag skyon med
126a5: cing gnod pa ma byas pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar spyug/ lha bdag cag ni blon po lags te/ lha la sman par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas skyon ma mchis pa dang / nongs pa ma mchis pa yang skyugs la
126a6: skyon mchis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa ni gzhag go/ rgyal pos btang snyoms su bzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag thabs
126a7: shig bsham par bya ste/ des na rgyal po gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar 'gyur ba zhig bya'o zhes de nas de rnams kyis bskyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs bris par shin du dri zhim po'i pog por nye
126a8: bar bzhag/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go// de nas de rnams kyis blon po rnams kyis bskyed mos tshal de'i byi dor byed pa rgyad ring po nas
126b1: mthong nas gzhon nu rgong bag can de rnams bskyed mos tshal gyi phyogs dang / / bran pa rnams bskyed mos tshal bye bya dor byas nas slar byung ba dang gzhon nu rnams kyis dras pa 'di su'i bskyed mos tshal// de rnams kyis
126b2: smras pa/ lha'i lags so// de rnams slar log par brtsams pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig/ ci'i phyir slar ldog de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i bskyed mos tshal yin na 'dir 'jug tug
126b3: rung blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ci mchis/ de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so// blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bskyed mos tshal legs
126b4: par byi dor bgyis lags kyis lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab lags so/ / rgyal po chas pa dang / bskyed mos tshal na ku tse'i sgra zos so// zos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bskyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra
126b5: grag na/ 'di na su zhig 'dug/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu rnams so// gal te de lta na ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so// blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha
126b6: bzod par mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams spang bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu de rnams sprug par chad pa dang rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras
126b7: pa/ lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo dang lhan cig mchi na de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa da ltar bka' stsal pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos bsgo nas/ de rnams chas pa na de rnams dga'
126b8: ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te/ zhag bdun du grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas ni skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so// blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gal te
127a1: grong khyer gyi skom bkum na ring po mi thogs par gu 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro/ / gal te de lta na sgo tshod cig/ de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang gi sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye ba chub
127a2: skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram na/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas de rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil bu dag byas te/ gnas btab nas ri dag ma bsad cing bsad nas 'tsho ba byed cing dus gsum du drang srong
127a3: ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong par byed do/ / lang co dang dar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen to/ sha bring na ba skya bo ba sang ba sang por gyur to// ji tsam du gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas
127a4: dris pa/ khyed cag ci'i phyir skye bo bsang ba sang por gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag caga'adod chags kyis shin du nyen pas so// des smras pa rang rang gi srid mo spongs la mas dbyen gyi srang mo rnams
127a5: dang lhan cig 'dug shig/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyi rung ngam/ shes ldan dag rgyal rigs rgyal srid stong ma rnams kyis rung ngo // de nas de rnams drang srong gi tshig ni tshad ma yin no snyam nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
127a6: kyis nyen pas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ mas dbyen gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed// dga' mgur spyod par bye'o// de rnams dang de ga dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na bu po dang / bu mo dag btsas te de
127a7: rnams chen por gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tshor ma ni sgra yin pas drang srong ser skya sems rtse gcig pa nyid tu ma btub nas shes ldan dag mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o// drang srong chen po ci'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi cher
127a8: ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub pas so/ / drang srong chen po khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gzhan du mchi na/ 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag cag la phob shig/ shes ldan dag rung ngo // drang srong bdag nyid
127b1: chen po de rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa yin pas des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ chu'i rgyun gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so// drang srong ser myas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gzhi yongs
127b2: su btang pas ser skyi gzhi ser sku'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur to/ / de rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen por gyur te/ dogs pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to// lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan
127b3: zhig bstan pa dang / de rnams der dong ste grong khyer gcig shos brtsigs nas ltas bstan ltas bstan ces bya bar gyur to// de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag
127b4: cag sprugs pa ni rigs mnyam pa las chung ma ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis de bas na ba dag gams sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blang bar mi bya ste gcig kho nas chog shes par bya'o/ / de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las
127b5: chung ma len gyi chun ma ni mi len to/ / de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grong pa dag gzhon nu de rnams da ltar gang na 'dug/ de rnams kyis smras pa/
127b6: lhas nongs pa 'ga' zhig la sprugs pa las de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa na gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste// rang rang gi
127b7: sring mo spangs te/ mas dbyen gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid// dga' dgu spyod par bgyid do// de rnams rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' dgur spyod par bgyid pa na bu pho dang / bu mo dag btsas so// grong pa
127b8: dag gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byad pod dam/ lha rdo thog lags so// de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes pas ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams
128a1: ni phod pa yin no/ / kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phor pa yin no zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/ kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni bong pa yin no// kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin tu phod pa yin no zhes
128a2: byas pas de rnams shAkya shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to/ / de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro// de yang bu med par shi nas skar mnga' gtong rgyal srid kyi dbang
128a3: phrug la dbang byed tu bcug go/ / de yang bu med par shi nas lag na rgyal por gyur to// de yang bu med par shi nas glang po che 'dul rgyal por gyur to// de yang bu med par shi nas rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur to// de'i bu gnas 'jog go//
128a4: ma dag gnas 'jog gi bus khyim mo// gau ta ma dag rgyal pos khyim gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang sum cha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu
128a5: bcu dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / brtan pa'i shing rta dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / gzhu dgu bcu dang / gzhu rgyal dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu brtan no// gau ta ma dag gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge'i 'gram dang / seng/
128a6: ge'i sgra'o// gau ta ma dga' jam bu'i gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na seng ge'i 'gram mchog tu grags so// gau ta ma dag seng ge'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste/ zas tsang dang / zas dkar dang / bre bo zas dang /
128a7: bdud rtsi'i zas so// bu mo gtsang ma dang / dkar mo dang / bre mo ma dang / bdud rtsi ma'o// zas gtsang la bu gnyis ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o// zas dkar la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang /
128a8: shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no// bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'o// bdud rtsi zas kyi bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha sbyin no// gtsar ma'i bu ni legs par rab sad do// dkar mo
128b1: bu ni phreng ba can no/ khre bo ma'i bu ni bzang len no// bdud rtsi ma'i bu ni dge 'phel lo// bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni sgra gcan 'dzin yin te/ go ta ma dag mang pos bkur gyi rgyud tsha dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin du rdzogs srid pa'i brang chung chad/
128b2: 'khor ba zad de ni yang srid pa med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mod gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas bzhengs te bzhugs so// bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gye bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mod
128b3: gal gyi bu legs so legs so/ / maud gal gyi bu khyed kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa yang khyod legs so// maud gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs chud
128b4: las brtsams te chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang / des ni de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi
128b5: gtam chongs shig/ zung shing / lhogs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud la brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni den dang ldan chos dang ldan pa nas tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung /
128b6: bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing bklags pa'i rig so// de nas ser skya'i bzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
128b7: mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas dong ngo / / de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin rgyal po seng ge 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'dug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa// skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab
128b8: ba dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang // bu ram shing gi pred dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid stong bar bye// grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal
129a1: po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed tu 'jug ste/ 'byong ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / cod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom
129a2: rkun med cing na rab tu ni par bya bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bucig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// rgyal po legs par rabasad kyi btsun mo dam pa
129a3: gzugs pathang ba/ bstan sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yul gyi bzang mo lum pa ni zhes bya ba yod do// sa bstan na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongasu bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa// rnam thos kyi rdu
129a4: nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus
129a5: dus su tsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan ci zhugs nas de na dga' ba'i rtsad mo nyam su myong bar byed do/ / lum bi nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa/ kun dga' ba 'di bdag la sum du gsol rgyal pos smras pa/ dkun dga' ba dici
129a6: bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o// de nas rgyal po legs par bsad kyis lum bi ni'i ched du depas khyad par du 'phags pa'i kun dga' bzhig byed du chug
129a7: nas/ de'i ming lum bi na'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po seng ge 'gram pa yun ring po nas/ kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los sgyur ba skye bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// rgyal po legs par rab sang la yang ya/
129a8: ring po nas kye ma'o bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na/ de'i btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa las dus gzhan
129b1: shig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba bstan sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// btsas pa de'i gzugs bzang pos rgyal
129b2: po legs par rab sang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ the tsom du gyur nas ci 'di bu mo yin nam// 'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo//
129b3: de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang / tshong
129b4: 'dus dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo rnams su gleng pa kha cig gi mched nas ni 'di bu mo kho na lags te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o// gzhan dag gi mched
129b5: nas ni 'di bu mo ma lags kyi 'o na ci zhe na las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas/ / de bas na bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes bgyi bar gdag so zhes btags so// bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad
129b6: la rjes su gtang de zhes bya nas chen mor gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa du ma dang ldan pa zhig btsal bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyis 'khor los
129b7: sbyar bar 'gyur ro zhes brtan to/ / yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa mdzes pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig bcas so// debacas
129b8: pan grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so// de'i bcas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i
130a1: ming car gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul pas 'di lhag par gzugs bzad pas/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bgyi bar gdags so zhes btags so// de yang bskyed pa srings nas chen mo/
130a2: byung pa dang / de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ de'a'akhor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi rgyal po
130a3: seng ge 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo gnyis shig bcas pa ni sgyu 'phrul dang / sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcig la ni mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur/ de ni stobs kyis 'khor los snang ba'i/
130a4: rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// gcig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa
130a5: gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig/ seng ge 'gram gyis slar spring pa/ gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi/ 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas/ gang la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
130a6: kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur ba de yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de re shig 'dod do/ / gcig shos kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o// des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o// de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir rgol
130a7: ba skya bsed zhes bya ba ri khrod pa cig yod nas shAkya rnams 'dus te/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas/ lha skya bsed ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo
130a8: rgas pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so/ / lha gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam gcig bslangs pa'i dam de sbyin pa bltan gtad do// de rnams kyis
130b1: smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gzhon nu zas gtsang la bsngo nas des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom// rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta'o// de nas shAkya rnams mgunas rgyal po seng ge
130b2: 'gram gyi drung du dong ste lha gzhon nus ri khrod pa rnams bcom rab tu bcom ste rmag btal lags pas bdag cag glob dga' na/ gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsungs shig dbul lo// shes ldan dag shAkya rnams kyi khrim du bcas pa sus kyang mnyam/
130b3: ba las chun ma gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bcas so// lha ci khrims 'dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin du bsdam gyi dral bar mi bya na/ 'on kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa gcig slong ba ni mnyam pa las chun ma blang ba yin no// lha rung gis de bzhin du
130b4: mdzod cig/ de nas seng ge 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas/ kho bos tshogs brtags zin gyis bu mo gcig shos kyang bkri shig/ des de yang 'khong lnga brgya dang bkri ste/ gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyi ga blangs so// ji tsam dus
130b5: gzhan zhig na rgyal po seng ge 'gram shi nas/ ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du bcug ste/ 'byod pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba// 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang /
130b6: 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing / nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang ba lang dang / ma te phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyor bar byed do// des dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul/
130b7: chen mo dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi skyes pa med par dong nas/ rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'jig rten la/
130b8: gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad do// rigs la gzigs pa dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / rgyud la gzigs pa dang bud med la gzigs pa ste/ rgya cher mdo snga ma dang sbyar ro// mngon par 'byung ba'i medo rdzog s+ho//
131a1: 6u0f7f// rgyag gyi mkhan po a tsar+ya d+ham shris+t+ra nga? dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ b+hik+ta ba du srutra na ma khod skad du/ dge slong la rab tugaye pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/
131a2: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po pad ma rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ de na dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor stong phrag byed dang /
131a3: bcwa gsum dang thabs gcig go// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'phags pa nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba dbang po dul ga/ zos pa dang ldan pa/ shes rab zab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos
131a4: 'dul ba la lhag par mos shing mchog tu 'dzin par gnas pa rang gi stan las langs ste/ / bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzur te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo snying khang sbyar ba byas te/ 'dzum dmyal nas bcom
131a5: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / 'khor ba'i 'dam nas pad ma ltar byung ba'i// skyob mdzad ri bo lta bur mid spyod thub pa'i sku// dpe byang rgyan gyis brgyan cing mtshan gyi me tog mdzes// blta bas mi ngoms rab mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis
131a6: bdag cag 'dir 'dus 'di dag la/ / dge slong 'ba' shig gnas pas dge slong gi/ ngo bo dbye dang sgra 'jug cher bya ba// bzhi po 'di dag thub pas gsung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan bde gshegs rab dgyes te// nye bar 'khor la spyan gzigs 'di
131a7: ska gsungs/ / legs par nyon cig pu khyod nye bar 'khor// ngas ni khyed kyi sems rangs bya phyir dang // dge slong rnams la phan phyir de bshad do// dge slong zhes bya chos kyi rgyal mtshan te// dge slong zhes bya rdo rje srog shing yin// dge slong zhes bya sdug bsngal spangs
131a8: pa ste/ / dge slong zhes bya rgyal ba'i sras po yin// dge slong zhes bya nyon mongs srog bcad de// dge slong zhes bya thar pa'i tshal 'gro'o// dge slong rang gi ngo bo bsdams pa ste// rta ba bzhi sogs nyis brgya lnga bcu pa// ched du bya ba rnam dag tshul khrims yin//
131b1: dbyeb ming gi dge slong gang yin dang // rtags tsam 'dzin dang yang dag dge slong ste// sgra 'jug rnam par zad phyir dang // dge ba slong dang zad srong dang // zhi bar gnas dang lam zhugs dang // legs par 'tsho dang chags spangs dang // yid 'ong mar na
131b2: dge slong ngo / / dge slong zhes bya brgyan pa sa// rgyan spangs rgyan gyis legs par rgyan// chags spangs chags pa chen pos spyad// byug pa khrus dang bza' ba dang / rgyan dang gos dang kha dog dang / rta dang glang po khyogs sogs kyi// bzhon pa tha med da pa
131b3: bzhed/ / de dag 'byor pa dge slong ste// de dag mi 'byor dge slong min// de nas nye bar 'khor de yis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// ci bde bar gshegs pa yis// ska dbyings rtogs par dka' ba gsungs// de nyid bde bar gshegs pa yis//
131b4: tshig gi mun pa tshig gi ni// mang mes gsal bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gser lo sogs pa 'jig rten rgyan// rab tu spangs pas snying rje yi// brgyan gyis mchog gis brgyan par bya/ 'jig rten ma yin
131b5: bslab pa yi/ / gos gyon gos mchog bzang po yin// ga bur la sogs ma yin pa'i// tshul khrims byug pa mchog gis byug/ dkar dmar la sogs ma yin pa'i// dad pa'i kha dog rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten ma yin brtson 'grus kyi
131b6: bzhon pa bla med mgyogs pa'i mchog/ bsam gtan chos spyod zas mchog ni// 'bras chan pas ni ro mchog ldan// dge 'dun tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang // zhi gnas stan la rab tu spyad// de dag ldan zhing phyir mi ldog/ de ni
131b7: yang dag dge slong yin/ / gtso bo gsum dang 'khor ldang ldan// drang srong snang bcas khar bsil ldan// lus ngag yid gsum rnam par bsdams// rang gi spyod pa btul zhugs bstan// de yang yang dag dge slong yin// de gnyis
131b8: thar pa'i kong khyer la/ / bsnyen pas thar pa'i bde ba'i mchog/ yang dag ma yin gcig shos ni// lhung bzed la sogs rab 'bar bas// dmyal bar khro chu lta bur ni// bskal pa stong phrag bzhi ru 'tshed
132a1: mam 'tshul thams pa da u0f7f/ / la la 'a rgyal khrims sdug bsngal na// rdul thams ldan pa'adab 'a mchog/ rgyal thams 'tshal ba sdug bsngal yin// gan du lags par rgyal thams gang // bsdams pa
132a2: mi mdzes pa'i gzugs/ / 'dul ba lan nye bar gnas// tshul khrims bslab par de yid ches// mi de nyi ma gcig la yang // bsod nams phung po dpag med pa// sogatsang sangs rgyas 'bras bu srun// rang gis ngal bslus 'dabs
132a3: shi/ slab pa la ni mi gnas shing // de bar gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin// gzugs tsam la ni brtan nas su// da ni dge slong yin zer ba// glang skyon ska la ral btags pa'am// sbrum ma sbyar rtsi 'thungs pa ltar// mi de nyis
132a4: gcig la yang / / sdig pa'i sa bon dpag med dang // rang la gnod pa sna tshogs pa// byed par 'gyur ba kho na yin// gang zhig bslab la mi gnas shing // bde gshegs rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa pas// bslab pa mi gnas skad cig la// gzu
132a5: por khyim par gnas pa bzang / / bslab pa mi gnas rtags 'dzin pa// 'jig rten pa ni thams cad kyi// snying du sdug par mi 'gyur zhing // kun gyi tshig gi na snod sa// dper na sdong po bzang po la// yun
132a6: ring yal ka 'khrud pa bzhin/ / mi de rtags tsam yun ring na// kha na mtho'i gtam 'phel dang // sdig pa'i las rnams 'phel bar bshad// tshul khrims 'di ni bde ba'i mchog/ tshul khrims 'di ni thar
132a7: pa'i lam/ / tshul khrims 'di ni yon tan zhing // tshul khrims 'di ni sangs rgyas rgyu// tshul khrims 'di ni mchog yin no// mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du srungs// srog la bab kyang tshul khrims ni/ gtod ba
132a8: mi mkhas blon po yin/ / srog chad phyi mar skye ba ste// tshul khrims phyi nas de ltar min// de bas nye bar 'khor sogs kyis// 'di nyid la ni brtan par zung// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te//
132b1: nyeb 'khor la sags pa dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsnyad do// / dge slong la rab tu gces pa'i mad rdzogs s+ho// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shA la sa na yug ta ka swA tra/
132b2: bod skad du/ tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
132b3: med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
132b4: shes pa ni 'grig/ srog ni chod/ tshe'i 'du byed ni nges par 'joms par 'gyur na/ ci'i phyir brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba brtan pos sgrub par mi byed/ mi'i lus ni shin du rnyed par dka' na de thob nas des rnyed pa'i rgyal
132b5: ba'i bstan pa la rab tu byung yang rnyed na thar pa'i don dang mi mthun pa dag gis bslus te sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ srog dang bral zhing shi ba ni bla yi// tshul khrims nyams pa ni de lta ma yin no// de ci
132b6: phyir zhe na/ srog dang bral ba ni tshe 'di nyid kyi skye ba zad par 'gyur gyi// tshul khrims nyams shing zhig pa ni skye ba 'bum phrag brgya'i bar du rigs dang bral zhing bde ba sangs te rnam par ltung ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro//
132b7: dpyir ston pas tshul khrims rab bsngags bshad// / tshul khrims ldan pa sangs rgyas 'byung dang phrad// tshul khrims ldan pa rgyan rnams kun gyi mchog/ tshul khrims 'byor pa
132b8: dri dang byug pa yin/ / tshul khrims ldan pa dga' ba kun gyi gnas// tshul khrims ldan pa gdung ba sel ba'i chu// tshul khrims ldan pa 'jig rten kun gyis bstod// tshul khrims dag gis 'gro ba dam pa mnos// ji ltar
133a1: sbrul gdug bu chen nag po yang / / tshul khrims can la gnod ma gzhan thos// tshul khrims ldan pa dge slong 'ad dang ldan// rnal thams ldan pa grags 'gyur dpa zog// rdul khrims ldan pan thos/
133a2: 'gro ba'i zla// nga mi/ med gzugs mthong mi rung ltar// de bzhin tshul khrims med na chos mi mthong // ji ltar rkang med lam 'jug gal nus// de bzhin tshul khrims mngan thar mi 'gyur// ji ltar bum pa bzang po rin chen
133a3: sdod/ / de bzhin tshul khrims chos rnams skyed pa'i gzhi// ji ltar bum chag rin chen snod mi rung // de bzhin tshul khrims ral pas chos kun gtugs// dang po tshul khrims med par gyur pa des/ phyi nas mya ngan 'das
133a4: pa thob snyam 'am/ / sna dang rnab rdum la sogs gang yin pa// de la me long dag ni dgos mi 'gyur// rnabs ma thos mig sngar ma mthong bzhin// bstan srung mi de mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// thos mar zos ldan thos byung mtsho
133a5: ris zhing / / bud med bsten dug la rung // rgyal po'i pho brang ga la dga'// lbu ba snying po ga la yod// longs spyod rtag pa ga la yin// bud med dag la rung ba med// rgyal srid dag la dga' ba med// lbu ba dag la snying po
133a6: med/ / longs spyod dag la rtag pa med// longs spyod dag ni 'bab chu bzhin// gru de ci 'dra khyim de 'dra// me tog ci 'dra gzugs de bzhin// srog ni chu bur 'dra ba yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' skum
133a7: nA/ dag slong de dag yang dngas// com ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngan par bstod do// tshul khrims yang dag par ldan pa'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// rgya ga ska du/ paN+Da da ti ni tre a buSh+Ta thAn /
133a8: k+Sha sU tra/ bod skad du/ ltung ba sde lnga'i dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu btag pa'i mdo// sangs kyis dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
133b1: 'dus mnyan 'don rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon ma skyed kyi kun ga na zhugs te/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyi lo lnga bdus
133b2: yin pa ni rgyal tshan pa de'i ris kyi ste rnams kyi nyin 'ag gcig go/ / nyid zhag dmas byan la zlab gcig/ zlab bcu gnyis la logacigatu brtsis pa lo lnga brgyani rgyal rkyen bzhi'i rIs kyi sta rnams te
133b3: tshad do/ / dge slong dag bslab pa'i chos gang dag bsrung ba dang / sbed pa dang / yongs su spyong pa dang / 'da' bar mi byed pa dang / de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang/ rab tu ston pa ni lngas zhig nas bde 'gro u0f7fsa
