200a4: spong bar 'gyur ro/ / sdug bsngal la bdag med pa'i 'du shes kun du bsten bsgoms lan mang du byas na bdag tu lta ba spong bar 'gyur ro// zas la mi 'phrod pa'i 'du shes kun du bsten bsgoms la namang du byas na rol
200a5: sred pa spong bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes kun du bsten bsgoms lan mang du byas na 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs dag la 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags kyi rjes su chags pa spong tha
200a6: 'gyur ro/ / snang ba'i 'du shes kun du bsten bsgoms lan mang du byas na ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes kun du bsten bsgoms lan mang du byas na kun du 'dod chags spong bar
200a7: 'gyur ro/ / 'gog pa'i 'du shes kun du bsten bsgoms lan mang du byas na phung po zad par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i 'du shes kun du bsten bsgoms lan mang du byas na gson pa la 'tshums pa spong bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan
200a8: pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos de ltar yang dag par tshul bzhin byed pa'i bdag nyid la bar du gcod pa'i chos nyi shu ste/ 'di lta ste/ mi brtson pa dang mi brtson pa dang 'grogs pa dang / yongs su mi 'dri ba dang mi 'dri ba dang mi mthun
200b1: pa'i lung dang lug ltar lkug pa nyid dang sred pa can nyid dang bya ba med pa nyid dang las kyi mtha' nyes par byas pa nyid dang / brtson pa btang ba nyid dang bar du gcod pa rnams thos na nyam nga ba dang / khengs pa dang mi mthun par
200b2: 'dzin pa nyid dang brjes ngas pa nyid dang bag med pa dang yul du mi gnas pa dang dbang po rnams kyi sgo ma bsrungs pa nyid dang / zas kyi tshod mi rig pa nyid dang / nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes
200b3: su mi brtson pa nyid dang dben pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin la so sor mi rtog pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag par du gcod pa ma bcom pa de dag yang dag par 'jom par gyur pa'i gces smras byed pa'i chos ni bcu
200b4: gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa 'thob pa dang phan yon mthong ba nyid dang mngon par spro ba nyid dang / rnam par 'gyed pa dang rgyal ba dang chos rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang bdag la mi brnyas pa dang gus par nyan pa
200b5: dang yongs su 'dri ba dang dben pa la mngon par dga' ba dang ji lta ba bzhin la so sor rtog pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos de ltar yang dag par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi gces spras byed pa'i
200b6: chos nyi shu ste/ 'di lta ste/ brtson pa dang brtson pa dang 'grogs pa dang yongs su 'dri ba dang 'thun pa'i lung dang lug ltar lkug pa ma yin pa nyid dang sred pa can ma yin pa nyid dang bya ba mi mang ba nyid dang las kyi mtha' leg
200b7: par byas pa nyid dang brtson pa ma btang ba nyid dang bar tu gcod pa rnams thos na nyam med pa dang mkhengs pa dang 'thun par 'dzin pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid dang bag yod pa dang yul du gnas pa dang dbang po
200b8: rnams kyi sgo bsrungs pa nyid dang zas kyi tshod rig pa nyid dang / nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa nyid dang dben pa la mngon par dga' ba dang ji lta ba bzhin la so sor rtog pa'o// tshe
201a1: dang ldan pa dag gnas nyi shu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni rab tu byung bas yang dang yang du so sor brtag par bya ba ste/ bdag ni khyim pa'i rtags spangs pa ste/ mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas 'di rab tu byung bas yang dang yang
201a2: du so sor brtag par bya'o/ / bdag ni mi 'dra ba khas blangs pa ste/ bdag gi cha byad dang bya ba gzhan yin no// bdag gi 'tsho ba ni gzhan la rag las pa ste/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang bsod snyoms/
201a3: dang mal stan dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad pha rol las btsal dgos pa'o// bdag ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi rnams kyi 'dod pa dag las ldog pa byas pa'o// bdag ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi rnams kyi rtsed mo'i dga'
201a4: bdag las ldog pa byas pa'o/ / cig bdag gis bdag tshul khrims dag gis ma smad dam/ cig bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis chos nyid kyis ma smas sam/ cig bdag nyid ma smras pa dang ma
201a5: nyams par spong ngam/ cig yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za 'am/ cig gcig pu kun dga' ra ba stong par mngon par dga' 'am/ bdag ji lta bur gyur pas nyin mtshan 'da'/ cig 'du byed thams cad zhi ba/
201a6: stong pa nyid du dmigs pa/ sred pa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bdag gi sems rab tu 'jug pa dang / dad pa dang yang dag par gnas pa dang rnam par grol bar gyur tam/ cig phung po mi
201a7: rtag pa nyid dang phung po gsob nyid dang phung po snying po med pa nyid la bdag gi sems rab tu 'jug pa dang / dad pa dang yang dag par gnas pa dang / rnam par grol bar gyur tam/ cig bdag 'chi ba'i tshe tshangs pa mtshungs par
201a8: spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis bdag la dris na yul yul po ma yin zhing bag tsha ba med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par yang dag par lung ston par lung bstan par bya ba gang yin pa dge slong gi 'bras bu bzhi las 'bras bu/
201b1: gang yang rung ba zhig 'thob bam/ bdag ni skye ba'i chos can te/ skye ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa/ rga ba'i chos can na ba'i chos can 'chi ba'i chos can te/ bdag ni 'dod pa dang sdug pa dang / phangs pa dang yid du 'ong ba thams
201b2: cad dang 'bye ba dang / med pa dang bral ba dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba'o// bdag ni las bdag gir bya ba/ las kyi skyes gnas dang las kyi bgo bskal la spyod pa las brtan par bya ba ste/ las dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba gang dang gang
201b3: byed pa las de dang de nyid kyi skal pa can du 'gyur ro snyam du gnas 'di rab tu byung bas yang dang yang du so sor brtag par bya'o/ / gnas nyi shu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag la yang dang yang du so sor rtog pa de'i dge sbyong gi 'du
201b4: shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / dge sbyong gi 'du shes yongs su rdzogs na 'du shes bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ rtag par rgyun du byed pa dang rgyun du 'jug pa dang brnab sems dang gnod sems med pa dang
201b5: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams de'i ched dang / ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa gang yun ring por gzugs la
201b6: chags pa dang sgra la chags pa dang dri la chags pa dang ro la chags pa dang reg bya la chags pa dang gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dag gis kun du bsags pa/ nye bar bsags pa de ni so sor brtags pas 'di lta
201b7: ste/ mi 'chi ba'i dbyings la nye bar rnam par bzhag pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa dag so so'i skye bos rnam pa nyi shus sems skyo bar bya ste/ bdag ni rtogs pas gsog yin no// ma dul bar 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gang yang /
201b8: sar ltung bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs mi shes pa'o// las mi shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin ma thob pa'o// yang srid pa ni sdug bsngal ba'o// ngal ba phun sum
202a1: tshogs pa ni snyed dka' ba'o/ / 'dod pa gsod bar byed pas rtag tu rjes su bcings pa'o// bdag ni 'gro ba lam 'das pa'o// bdag ni ngan song dag las yongs su ma grol ba'o// bdag ni lta bar gyur pa dpag tu med pa dang
202a2: yang dag par ldan pa'o/ / bdag ni mtshams med pa'i las rnams mi bya ba'i phyir gags ma byas pa'o// bdag ni skye ba'i 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mthar ma byas pa'i mthar ma byas pa'o// mthar ma byas na byed pa gzhan med
202a3: ro/ / ma byas na bde ba'i nga pe med do// las byas pa rnams ni chud zab med do// bdag ni ma rig par gyur cing mi mkhas pa 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// zhes so so'i skye bos sems skyo bar bya'o// de rnam pa nyi shu po de rnams
202a4: kyis sems skyoshin b+h+yo/ skrag shin du skrag zhag shin ba gag na/ rnam pa gzhan nyi shu sems myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas te/ de sems kyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa'i sems myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas so// de sems bla na med
202a5: pa'am/ sems rtse gcig pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma 'am/ ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ zhi gnas kyi mtshan ma 'am/ rab tu 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma 'am/ btang snyoms
202a6: kyi mtshan ma 'am/ spyod yul ma yin pa spong ba 'am/ spyod yul la gus pa 'am/ mdor bstan pa 'am/ dmigs kyis bsal ba'am/ kun du skyo ba med pa'am/ bla ma la rten pa 'am/ yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yid la byed pa'i sems
202a7: myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas so/ / de dbugs brngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa sgom pa'i sems myur ba myur bar yang dag par gnas so// de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom pa'i sems myur ba myur bar yang dag
202a8: par gnas so/ / tshe dang ldan pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos de ltar yang dag par tshul bzhin yid la byas pa'i bdag nyid kyi bar du gcod pa ni bcu gcig tu rig par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dang yang du tshogs par 'dra ba dang /
202b1: zas la gdu ba nyid dang las la dga' ba nyid dang smra ba la dga' ba nyid dang 'du 'dzi'i gtam la dga' ba nyid dang 'du 'ji la dga' ba nyid dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / 'phyar ba dang bag med pa dang yul du mi gnas pa'o// tshe dang
202b2: ldan pa dag par du gcod pa ma bcom pa de dag yang dag par 'joms pa mkhas pa bcu la bslab par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa dang ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la mkhas pa dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba la
202b3: mkhas pa dang rab tu 'dzin pa la mkhas pa dang / btang snyoms la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dang mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos chos de ltar mngon
202b4: par sgrub pa la mkhas pa la mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po bcu gsum skye ba na skye ste/ dad pa can de sten pa'am/ chos sam dge 'dun nam bdag gi tshul khrims sam gzhan gyi tshul khrims sam/ bdag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos
202b5: rnams sam bdag gi rtogs pa 'am/ gzhan gyi rtogs pa yid la byed pa na mchog tu dga' ba bskyed pa 'di ni ded pa can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po yin no// bcom ldan 'das de bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi ches mang po sal
202b6: ba'i zhes mchog tu dga' ba skye ba 'di ni dad pa can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bde ba'i ches mang po sgrub pa'o zhes mchog tu dga' ba skye ba 'di ni dad pa can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos
202b7: po yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das de bdag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma sel ba'o zhes mchog du dga' ba skye ba 'di ni dad pa can gyi mchog du dga' ba'i dngos po yin no// bcom ldan 'das de bdag gi dge ba'i chos rnam
202b8: du ma sgrub pa'o/ / zhes mchog tu dga' ba skye ba 'di ni dad pa can gyi mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po yin no// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'phags pa nyan thos chos bzhi la brten na chos lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/
203a1: 'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang dben pa dang phyir mi zlog pa'o// chos lnga po gang dag bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ mchog tu dga' ba dang dga' ba dang shin du sbyangs pa dang bde ba dang ting nge 'dzin to// tshe dang
203a2: ldan pa dag de chos lnga po de dag kun du bsags shing nye bar bsags na zug rngu brgyad med par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dang zhe sdang gi zug rngu dang gti mug gi zug rngu dang / nga rgyal gyi zug rngu dang sred pa'i zug rngu
203a3: dang lta ba'i zug rngu dang the tshom dang som nyi'i zug rngu'o/ / zug rngu brgyad po de dag med par gyur na mi slob pa'i chos bcu thob par 'gyur te/ mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang yang dag pa'i ngag dang yang
203a4: dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang yang dag pa'i ye shes so// mi slob pa'i chos bcu po de dag
203a5: skyes shing thob ste ldan na 'phags pa yan lag lnga spangs pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa bsrungs pa gcig pa/ rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa so so'i bden pa bsal ba/ bsal ba spangs pa/ kun du rtog pa'i rnyog pa med// /
203a6: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ad b+hud d+harma par+yA ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
203a7: dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos te/ lhung zed thogs nas rgyal
203a8: bo'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar chags su bsod snyoms pa spyod pa'i tshe phyogs shig na khang pa brtsegs pa sgo brgyad bcu yod la/ byug pas byugs pa/
203b1: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bdan basbed dang gyi sna ldi mang po sbyangs bzhig mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'dis bu byas te/ phyogs can
203b2: dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa lus sgyu ru ra'i 'bras bcum byas la/ kha ba tsam hU~M/
203b3: srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de gnyis las bsod nams shin du che ba gang yin snyam mo// de yang 'di
203b4: snyam du sems te/ ston pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis don 'di nyid gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ji skad bstan
203b5: ba bzhin du gzung bar bya'o snyam mo/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms blangs te/ zas kyi bya ba byas nas bsod snyoms kyi zas phyi ma spangs te/ chos gos dang lhung zed bzhag nas rkang pa
203b6: bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun
203b7: dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag 'dir snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos lhung zed thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi slad du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar
203b8: chags su bsod snyoms spyod pa'i tshe phyogs shig na khang pa brtsegs pa chab sgo brgyad bcu mchis la byugs pas/ byugs pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang pa dan bsgreng ba/ dar gyi lda ldi mang po spangs pa dag mthong
204a1: napa 'di snyam du bsams te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu bgyis te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa
204a2: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam bgyis la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol
204a3: nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs bgyis la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel stsal na de gnyis bsod nams shin du che ba gang lags snyam mo// bdag gis yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ ston pa ni bdag gi mngon
204a4: sum du gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis don 'di nyid gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gzung bar bgyi snyam
204a5: nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag don 'di nyid zhu lags na thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la don 'di nyid legs par bstan du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
204a6: kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs nas lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /
204a7: bde ba'i don gyi phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di nyid 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu glid
204a8: gi gling na chur dpag tshad bdun stong / rgyar yang dpag tshad bdun stong / byang du ni kha tshon che ba lhor ni sogs kar 'dug pa de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang
204b1: bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas gang
204b2: gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug
204b3: gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta zhog gi/ kun dga' bo
204b4: shar gyi lus 'phags shes bya ba'i gling yod de chur ni dpag tshad brgyad stong / rgyar yang dpag tshad brgyad stong ste/ kun nas zla gam lta bur grub pa de/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna
204b5: bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la
204b6: p hul ba bas gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing
204b7: btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel btsug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o// kun dga' bo 'dzam
204b8: bu'i gleng lta'ang zhog/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta'ang zhog ste/ kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling yod de/ chur ni dpag tshad dgu stong / zhed yang dpag tshad dgu stong ste/ kun nas zla ba nya ba lta ba
205a1: grub pa de rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang dgra bcom pa
205a2: rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod
205a3: rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsags te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas/ nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la/ yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de
205a4: bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ / kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta'ang zhog/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling lta'ang zhog/ nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling lta'ang zhog ste/ kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan ces bya ba'i gling
205a5: yod de/ chung ni dpag tshad khri/ rgyar ya dpag tshad khri ste/ kun nas gru bzhi ldam par grub pa de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dang ba gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa na
205a6: dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
205a7: pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las s+phu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol
205a8: nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ / kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lta'ang zhog/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling wA'
205b1: zhog/ nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling lta 'ang zhog/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta yang shog ste// kun dga' bo lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba yod de/ de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la lazhin
205b2: gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la
205b3: bral ba ba/ / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'jim pa las sbya ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs
205b4: shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel btsug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ / kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling lha yang zhog/ shar gyi lus
205b5: 'phags kyi ming lta yang zhog/ rab kyi pa lang spyod kyi gling lta yang shog/ byang ga sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta yang zhog/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba lta yang zhog ste/ kun dga' ba srung gsum gyi slo
205b6: chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang phyir mi 'ong ba rnams
205b7: dang dgra bcom pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das tha
205b8: mchod rten 'jim pa las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/ rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs byas nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de
206a1: bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis dpag tu med pa/ tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med pa/ bzod pas dpag tu med pa/ brtson 'grus kyi
206a2: dpag tu med pa/ bsam gtan gyis dpag tu med pa/ shes rab kyis dpag tu med pa byams pas dpag tu med pa/ snying rjes dpag tu med pa/ dga' bas dpag tu med pa/ btang snyoms kyis dpag tu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
206a3: ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma 'dres pa gsum dang snying rje chen pos dpag tu med pa ste/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
206a4: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di
206a5: lta ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar legs so// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar legs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs
206a6: 'di rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs shes bya bar zung shig/ de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs shes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang
206a7: ldan pa kun dga' bo yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / su re na dra bo d+hi ding / zhu chen
206a8: tsi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes nus te gtan la phab pa/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga ta prad ti bi mi ba pra ti shwA a nu shang sA sam pa dan tin+da ma d+harma ba rA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
206b1: 'arnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
206b2: med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag cig rim gro'i gnas su lhags te 'dug nas bar skabs der gtam 'di lta bu zhig glengs so// khyed cag la bram ze 'am/ khyim bdag dang pa can
206b3: thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ dge ba ji ltar bya zhes tshol ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid par spro ba bskyed pa dag snang la de dag gal te bdag cag gi drung du lhags nas btsun pa dag de bzhin gshegs/
206b4: pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par bgyi zhes rmed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa la phan yon ji tsam zhig yod bdag cag gis mi shes
206b5: te/ de'i tshe de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang 'thun par lan gdab par bya/ gang don 'di dag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa//
206b6: thams cad gzigs pa/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ ston pa de la bdag cag gis zhu'o// 'on tang bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag la lung ston par mdzad de/ bdag cag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang / khyim
206b7: bdag dad pa can nas sa la rgya cher phye ste lan gdab par bya'o zhes bgros so/ / de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig
206b8: tu 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu 'khor nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag rim gro'i gnas der lhags te 'dus par gyur par der bka'
207a1: mchid 'di lta bu zhig glengs te/ khyed cag la bram ze 'am/ khyim bdag dad pa can thos pa 'dzin pa/ thos pa bsags pa/ dge ba ji ltar bgyi zhes tshol ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi bar spro ba skyes pa dag gangs
207a2: la/ de dag gal te bdag cag gi drung du mchis nas/ btsun pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par bgyi zhes rmed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzug
207a3: brnyan bgyid pa la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis pa bdag cag gis ma 'tshal na/ de'i tshe de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar chos dang 'thun par lan gdab par bgyi/ gang don de dag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
207a4: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ ston pa de la bdag cag gis zhu bar bgyi'o// 'on tang bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag la lung
207a5: ston par mdzad de/ bdag cag gis de bzhin bzung nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la rgya cher phye ste lan gdab par bgyi'o snyam bgyid do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das don de dag nyid bdag cag zhu zhing mchis na/
207a6: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyid pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon ji tsam zhig mchis par rig par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba
207a7: dang snying brtse ba dang lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhus te/ khyed gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de nyid zhu bar sems pa logs so legs so// dge slong dag de'i phyir
207a8: legs par rab tu nyon la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o/ / dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po la phan yon 'di lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ gzhal med khang chen por gnas pa dang / bong stang
207b1: bzang por grags pa dang / spro ba mang ba dang tshe ring ba dang grags pa dang ldan pa dang / bde ba mang ba ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po phan yon dang po yin no// gzhan yang phyug pa dang nor/
207b2: mang ba dang long spyod che ba dang / nor rdzas dang / yo byad mang ba dang bdag dbang ba bdag gir bya ba mang ba dang / nor dang 'bru dang dbyig dang gser dang mdzod dang bang ba'i tshogs mang ba dang rta dang glang po che dang ba lang dang lug dang bran dang bran mo dang
207b3: las byed pa dang / zhogs 'tsho ba mang ba dang blon po dang mdza' bshes dang gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams mang por 'gyur te/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon gnyis pa
207b4: yin no/ / dge slong dag gzhan yang gzugs bzang po dang / lta na sdug pa dang / mdzes pa dang mdog gser ltar bzang ba dang / mgo gdugs ltar zlum pa dang lag pa ring ba dang dpral ba dbyes che ba dang / smin mtshams par ma tshang ba dang yan//
207b5: lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyur te/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon gsum pa yin no// dge slong dag gzhan yang
207b6: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor bzang po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa dang / bu stong gis bskor bar 'gyur te/ de'i bu 'am chung ma 'am/ bran nam nye bar 'tsho ba gang yan pa de dag thams cad de la gus par nyan pa dang / bka' nyan pa
207b7: byed de/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no// dge slong dag gzhan yang de lus dang bral nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba zung
207b8: te/ der skyes nas lha'i rgyal po khyad par can lha dang / lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyi rten du 'gyur la/ gnas bcu po lha'i tshe dang lha'i mdog dang lha'i stobs dang lha'i bde ba dang / lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed pa dang / lha'i gzugs
208a1: dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams kyis dga' bar byed de/ dge slong dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan byed pa'i gang zag sbyin pa po'i phan yon lnga pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa/
208a2: dang / dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag pa'i phan yon yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs s+ho/
208a3: rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha mA ka ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes snying pos sgyur/ ban de dpal brtsegs kyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ tse t+ya pra bak+Shi Na gA thA/ bod skad du/ mchod rten bskor ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon
208a4: mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ / shes rab blo ldan 'jig rten na// chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bskor ba// shes rab chen po shA ri'i bus// ston pa la ni zhu ba zhus/ mchod rten bskor ba bgyis pa yis// rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur ba/ skal pa
208a5: chen po'i 'jig rten mchog/ rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsungs// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ ston pas de la bka' stsal pa// mchod rten bskor ba byas pa yi// yon tan gang yin phyogs tsam bstan// mchod rten skor
208a6: ba byas pa yis/ / lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang / lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci// lto 'phye che rnams mchod byed 'gyur// dal ba rnyed dka' thob gyur nas// skad cig gcig tsam bar du yang // mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// mi khom brgyad rnam
208a7: spong bar 'gyur/ / mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan// kha dog ldan zhing 'dzangs pa dang // thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyis// tshe ring ba yang de yis/
208a8: 'thog grags pa chen po'ang 'thob par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'dzam bu'i gling du rus kyi mchog/ tshe rigs yongs su dag par yang // blo ldan de ni skye bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// kha bzhin dag kyang bzang
208b1: ba dang / / mdog sdug pa dang mkhas pa dang // bde bar gnas pa thob par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// phyug cing nor yang mang ba dang / ser sna med cing gtod phod dang // sbyin pa dag la dpa' bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas
208b2: ni/ yid du 'ong zhing lta na sdug/ mdog bzang mthong na dga' ba dang // longs spyod rgya chen spyod par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'du byed stong par mthong nas kyang // de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur// myur du dga' ba thob par 'gyur
208b3: mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ / rgyal rigs mchog tu skye bar 'gyur// bu smad 'khor dang ldan pa dang // stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// bram ze che zhing mtho bar skye// tshul khrims ldan zhing thos
208b4: dad ldan/ / rig byed gsang sngags ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// khyim bdag che zhing mtho bar skye// phyug cing nor yang mang ba dang // nor dang 'bru rnams ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'dzam bu'i
208b5: gling gi mda' bdag rje/ / sa steng mtha' dag dbang byed pa'i// chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// rin chen bdun dang ldan pa yi// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// chos bzhin 'khor lo bskor bar
208b6: byed/ / mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'di nas 'phos nas mtho ris 'gro// sangs rgyas bstan la dga' ba dang / rnal 'byor ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// lha yul dag nas 'phos nas kyang // de ni mi yi nang du
208b7: skye/ mongs pa med par mngal du 'jug/ mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// mngal gyi skyon gyi dri ma yis// de la gos par mi 'gyur te// de ni nor bu dag pa bzhin// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// ma lhor bde bar gnas par 'gyur// de ni bde
208b8: bar btsa' ba dang / / bde bar nu zho 'thung bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// phas kyang g.yog 'khor mang po yis// de la gso zhing gnas par 'gyur// ma mas rtag tu rim gro byed// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// nye du rnam
209a1: kyi snying du sdug/ de bzhin pa ma lhag par byams// skyes nas longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// sha za dang ni srin rnams kyis// de la gnod par mi 'gyur te// longs spyod dag la skyon med spyod/
209a2: mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// bskal pa brgyar yang de dag rnams// zhar ba grum por yongs mi 'gyur// lus kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// mig kyang rnam par dag par gyur// dkyus ring mthon thing
209a3: sdug pa dang / / lha yi mig kyang de yis 'thob// mchod rten bskor bar byas pas ni// lus bde sems kyang brtan pa dang // de bzhin brtson 'grus brtan pa dang // dpung mgo zlum zhing brtan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni//
209a4: stobs dang byed gzugs phun sum tshogs// yan lag thams cad mtshan rnams kyis// legs par brgyan cing ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// sum bcu rtsa gsum dbang phyug rje// rdzu 'phrul che ba'i brgya byin du/ lha'i
209a5: dbang po chen por 'gyur/ / mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'thab bral lha'i rgyal po dang // de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan dang // 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
209a6: tshangs pa yi/ / dbang phyug nyid du de 'gyur zhing // lha rnams bye ba snyed kyis mchod// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// bskal pa bye ba stong dag dang // khrag khrig phrag brgya dag tu yang // shes rab ldan pa rtag tu mchod// mchod rten skor ba byas
209a7: pas ni/ / bskal pa byi ba stong dag tu// lus gtsang gos kyang gtsang ba dang // dkar po'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// stobs dang brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs// de ni le lo med pa dang // shin du bsgrub pathob
209a8: par 'gyur/ / mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni/ brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu yang brtan// rgyal brtan ces kyang mi tshugs shing // don rnams myur du 'grub par byed// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// gdangs snyan gsang yang mthob dang / yid
209b1: dngabong ba'i nga ro can/ / gnod pa med cing nad med 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// de nyid kyis ni bstan pa yi// gnas der myur du de 'gro zhing // shas cher skye ba thob par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// dran pa nye bar
209b2: gzhag pa bzhi/ / sems kyi tshad med bzhi po dang // rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i dbang yang 'thob// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dang // dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang // byang chub yan lag 'bras bu 'thob//
209b3: mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// mngon shes drug ldan zag pa med// nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yi// dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas par ni// 'dod chags zhe sdang spangs pa dang // 'khor rnams
209b4: thams cad spangs pa yi/ / rang rgyal byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas pas ni// 'jig rten dag tu de bzhin gshegs// mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa dang // gser gyi sku mdog 'thob par 'gyur// lus kyi las
209b5: kyang bskor ba yin/ / dag gis las kyang bskor ba yin// yid kyi las kyang bskor ba yin// smon lam btab pa'ang bskor ba yin// 'dir ni bskor ba byas pa yis// bgrod dka' bde dgur don rnams 'grub// 'jig rten mgon po'i
209b6: mchod rten la/ / bskor ba byas pa'i yon tan gang // da ni tshig tsam nyim yis// lags par bstan par mi nus pa// sems can rnams la snying btso'i phyir// shA ra'i thus ni zhus nas kyang // mtshad rten phyag rgyas yon tan gang/ 'dzi/
209b7: rten mgon pos bstan pa yin// rta brgya dang ni gsar srang brgya// dri mo'i shing rta brgya dag dang // rgod ma brgya yi shing rta rnams// rin chen sna tshogs bkang ba yang / bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i// bcu drug char yang mi phod do//
209b8: kam po rdzi yi bu mo brgya// nor bu rna cha gdur 'khor thogs// gser gyi dpung rgyan 'chang ba dang // mgrin pa gser gyis legs brgyan pa// bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// gangs kyi glang chen brgya rten
210a1: dag/ lus chen namachod yangs pa dang // swa yang gshol mda' 'dra ba'i glang // gser dang nor bus brgyan pa dang // bskor ba'i gom pa gcig bor ba'i// bcu drug char yang mi bod do// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod
210a2: rten la/ / dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa gcig por ba// 'dzam bu'i chu klung gser srang 'bum grangs snyed// de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dga' ba'i sems kyis 'jim
210a3: gong gcig bor ba/ / 'dzam bu'i chu klung gser gyi pho brang 'bum// de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog sil ma spungs// 'dzam bu'i chu klung gser
210a4: snod 'bum bzhag pa/ / de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dga' ba'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba thogs// 'dzam bu'i chu klung gser khal bye ba gnyis// de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod
210a5: ma yin/ / mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dga' ba'i sems kyis spos chus dbang bskur ba// 'dzam bu'i chu klung gser gyi phung po 'bum// de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas
210a6: mchod rten la/ / dga' ba'i sems kyis mar me 'bul byed pa// 'dzam bu'i chu klung gser srang bye ba 'bum// de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// mkhas pa gang gis sangs rgyas mchod rten la// dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal
210a7: mtshan 'phan gdugs thogs/ / gser gyi ri bo lhun po cher 'bum yang // de ni de dang mtshungs pa yod ma yin// 'di ni dpag med de bzhin gshegs// rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// ded dpon bla na med pa la// phul
210a8: pa'i phan yon bstan pa yin/ / bzhugs pa'i tshe na gang gis mchod// mya ngan 'das 'og gang gis mchod// sems dge ba ni mtshungs 'gyur na// bsod nams la ni khyad par med// de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/
210b1: sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam me khyab// bsam mi khyab la dang rnams kyi// rnam par smin pa'ang bsam ma khyab// mchod tan paskong ba'i tshigs sa bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rtag ska du/ zas na dzad thArmA/
210b2: bod skad du/ gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po gsal rgyal gdugs dang cod pan dang // rnga yab ral gri nor bu lham bzhag ste// thal mo sbyar te legs par byas
210b3: 'tshal nas/ / 'jig rten mgon po la ni zhu ba zhus// phan par dgongs pa thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// de bzhin gshegs rnams mya ngan 'das pa na// mchod pa bgyis pas blo mchog ji lta bur// srid pa gzhan du mi rnams
210b4: bde ba thob/ / bcom ldan mi yi seng ge lnga phyi'i mtha'// chos rnams kun la mngon sum spyad gyur pas// kun dga' bzang po yi ni mngon sum du// gsal rgyal zhus lan 'di dag bka' stsal pa// ji ltar mchod rten
210b5: dag la mi rnams kyis/ / mchod pa byas pas srid pa gzhan dag tu// rnam smin 'dod pa sna tshogs ci thob pa// zhus pa'i don de rgyal pos mnyan par gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod rten rnams dang ni// sku gzugs
210b6: rnams la rdul phran ci song ba/ / de yi grangs snyed de byed mi rnams kyis// lha yul sa stangs nges par rgyal srid 'thob// gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyi ting nge 'dzin// phun sum tshogs pa'i sa mchog kun myong nas//
210b7: tha mar skye dang rga las sogs pa yi// sdug bsngal med pa'i sangs rgyas go 'bar 'thob// su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs byed pa// de dag gzugs bzang yid 'ong yon tan ldan// dbang po bsdams shing 'ong 'bar nyi ma
210b8: bzhin/ / 'jig rten dgan mig tu skrag par 'gyur// su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa// de yi lus ni dri ma med pa dang // pad ma'i snying po lta bur 'jam zhing yangs// nad dang mya ngan sdug bsngal 'jigs las
211a1: thar/ / su zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs byed pa// bran du mi skye mngag gzhug skye mi 'gyur// dbul bor mi 'gyur rigs dman mi 'gyur zhing // dbang po rnams kyang nyams par yang mi 'gyur// thub dbang
211a2: mchod rten byed pa'i mi rnams ni/ / mya ngan yongs med lus kun brtan pa dang // longs spyod mchog ldan rin chen mdzod mang ldan// dgra yi tshogs rnams kyang ni thub par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten srog shing phul ba yis// chos
211a3: dang rjes 'thun chos la sgrub pa dang / / tshul khrims thos dang bzod pa'i mchog dang ldan// 'jig rten dag na don kun grub par 'gyur// mchod rten mchog la gdugs brtsegs phul ba yis// lha dang mi yind na skye ba dang // sred med
211a4: bu yi lus 'dra lus kun brtan/ / bkur sti bya ba'i yon tan ldan par 'gyur// thub dbang mchod rten rdo thal byugs pa yis// lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na tshe ring zhing // lus sems nad dang mya ngan byed spangs te// rtag tu skyid cing
211a5: nor gyis phyug par 'gyur/ / gser dngul spa ba'i glegs mas g.yogs pa yi// thub pa'i dbang po mchod rten byas pa yis// mi rnams srid pa'i khyad par gzhan dag tu// lus mkhregs 'od kyang 'bar zhing mdzes par
211a6: 'gyur/ / su dag la la mchod rten sku gzugs la// dad pa'i sems kyis bla re 'bul byed pa// de dag sa steng rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa// ma lus gnod med rgyal gcig dbang byed 'gyur// bde gshegs mchod rten dag la
211a7: dga' bzhin du/ / rnam par rgya chen gdugs ni btags pa yis// lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na gdugs 'dra bar// lha dang mi yi dbang po lta bur 'gyur// mi rnams su dag sku gdung snying po can// dri med bsod nams 'byung
211a8: gnas gyur pa la/ / ba dan mdzes pa sna tshogs 'dogs pa dag/ mthu dang ldan zhing srid gsum mchod gnas 'gyur// bde gshegs mchod rten cod pan btags pa yis// mi dbang dpal dang lha dbang dpal thob cing // bde ba'i
211b1: mchog kyang nyams su myong gyur nas/ / rnam par grol ba'i cod pan khyad par 'thob// rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la dril phul bas// tshig bcan grags pa chen po dag dang ldan// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs yid 'ong skye ba dran// de dag
211b2: gis ni rgyal rnams sna tshogs 'thob/ / mkhas pa su dag bde gshegs mchod rten la// dad pa'i sems kyis phreng ba 'dogs byed pa// gser phred rin chen mang pos legs smras pa// bsod nams las ldan de yi mgo la thog/
211b3: ston pa'i mchod rten dag la rgyan 'phyang 'dogs// de dag do shal rgyan phreng nor bu dang // gdub bu dag dang dpung rgyan mchog rnams kyis// lus brgyan 'jig rten dag na rgyu bar 'gyur// su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod
211b4: rten la/ / sa dang lci bas nyug pa de dag ni// lha dang mir skye lus mdog sdug pa dang // rnam dag rma med bde dang ldan par 'gyur// thub dbang mchod rten byi dor byas pa yis// shin du lta na sdug cing mig tu mdzes// byang bzhin
211b5: bzang zhing pad mo'i mdog dang ldan/ / sred pa'i skyon rnams dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur// su dag spos mchog sbyor ba'i 'bru mar gyis// bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten nyug byed pa// de dag spos kyis mchod cing tsan dan
211b6: byigyis/ lus byugs nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra bar 'gyur// mi rnams gang ngag thub dbang mchod rten la// spos chu gtsang zhing dad pas khrus gsol pa// de dag lus la dri ma med pa dang // gdung ba med cing mdog 'jam mya ngan med//
211b7: su zhig sangs rgyas mchod rten sku gzugs khang // tshon rtsi sna tshogs dag gis mdzes byed pa// de ni bde gshegs mnga' ba'i yon tan rnams// sna tshogs ldan pa kun gyis brtsegs par 'gyur// su dag dpyid ka'i dus su
211b8: gtsang ma'i chus/ / mchod rten nyen 'khor rdul rnams zhi byed pa// de la bud med rnams ni dga' bzhin du// rdul yab gser gyi yu ba can gyis g.yo ba// dkon mchog gsum phyir mi rnams gang dag gis// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i
212a1: dkyil 'khor byas pas ni/ / rkang lag sor mo dra bas 'brel ba dang // yan lag thams cad kyang ni skyon med 'gyur// su dag dkon mchog gsum la me tog dang // 'bras bu gsar thog byung ba 'bul byed pa// de
212a2: dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na/ / ro mchog kun thob mi rdzi stobs dang ldan// phreng ba rgyan chen me tog char rnams kyis// su dag 'dir ni rgyal ba'i gzugs la mchod// de dag lha dang mi yi 'jig rten du// cha byad yid 'ong sna
212a3: tshogs legs par brgyan/ / sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la dri zhim phul// bdug spos rgya chen mang po ldan sbyar dang // a ga ru yi bdug spros phul ba yis// de yis lus kun spos dang ldan par 'gyur// su dag bde bar
212a4: gshegs pa'i mchod rten la/ / dga' bzhin rnga yab rnams ni 'bul byed pa// thugs dga' rgyal rnams snying rje rnga yab thogs// che ba de la cher yang g.yo bar byed// shin du dri med zla ba nya 'dra ba'i/ me long sdug gu thams cad/
212a5: mkhyen la 'bul// de dag tshe rabs brgyud pa rnams su yang // lha mi rnams kyi lta bar 'os par 'gyur// su dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la// mchod pa'i khyad par ci yod ci 'byor pa// 'tsham par 'bul byed
212a6: de dag dri med cing / / mya ngan med pa'i bla med byang chub 'thob// mi rnams gang dag sangs rgyas mchod rten nam// sku gzugs dag la mgos btu dgus phyag 'tshal// de dag lha rnams dang ni mi rnams kyis// char yang
212a7: che bar bkur ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ / su zhig dad pas thub pa'i mchod rten nam// sku gzugs dag la bskor ba byed pa de// phyi ma'i tshe la dgra chen rnams kyis btud// bzang po'i snod 'gyur yon tan rnams dang ldan//
212a8: mi rnams su dag dga' bzhin gus pa yis// bla med mchod rten rnams dang sku gzugs la// lus kyi las rnams byed pa de dag ni// srid pa kun du mdzod nams shin du rgyas// rgyal ba'i mchod rten rol mo'i sgra
212b1: bul bas/ / zab cing rigs pa'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs// yan lag lnga rdzogs yid 'ong tshig dang ldan// sgra skad dag gis 'jig rten 'gengs par byed// su dag rgyal ba'i gdung ldan bstod byed pa// de dag gling bu'i /
212b2: dang klu snyan dang // sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba thob pa dang // so so yang dag par rig pa'ang thob par 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag rtswa shing so phag gis// 'jig rten bla ma'i spyi gab rigs pas byed// yang na gzhan dag byed du 'jug
212b3: kyang rung / / de dag 'gro ba rnams kyi skyabs 'drar 'gyur// mi rnams gang dag rgyal ba'i gtsang khang byed// de dag 'gro ba rnams su 'khor ba na// lha dbang gnas 'dri'o khang khyim 'od 'bar ba// dus tshigs kun du bde ldan
212b4: thob par 'gyur/ / mtho ris las bzang 'bras bu'i gnas rnams su// bskal pa dga' byed rtag tu dga' bzhin du// rtsen par byed cing mya ngan med pa dang // tha mar zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur// gang dag 'ja' khugs
212b5: 'dra ba'i rta babs mdzes/ / thub pa'i chab sgor sbed byed de dag ni// sred pa gzhan du khang khyim sgo dang bcas// rnam par brgyan pa rnams ni thob par 'gyur// me rnams gang dag ston pa'i sku gdung khang // bsrung phyir dang
212b6: pas 'obs dang sgo 'dzugs pa/ / de dag tshe rabs gzhan du dgra rnams kyis// dpal yon rnams dang 'bral bar yod mi nus// mi rnams su dag mchod rten rnyed pa rnams// gzhan gyi dor byed ma yiner dge blos// ral
212b7: tshems byed pa'i skye bo de dag ni/ / lus bzang yon tan dam pas brgyan par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rnying bsal bas// 'dod chags chags med zhe sdang sngar mi 'gyur// gti mug rmongs med lta ngan chags
212b8: mi 'gyur/ / mi rnams rab tu dga' zhing skyid par 'gyur// su dag glang chen dril sbyangs sba bar brgyan// dul ba'i rta dang sbyar ba'i shing rta dag/ ston pa dang ni 'phags pa'i tshogs la 'bul// de dag bla med thog
213a1: chen thob par 'gyur/ / skye bo su dag 'jig rten mgon po la// rin chen 'bar ba yid dang 'thad pa rnams// 'bul ba de dag rin chen bdun po dang // byang chub yan lag rin chen dri med 'thob// rgyal ba'i mchod
213a2: rten la ni gos phul bas/ / bsod nams byas pa ngo tsha'i gos gyon te// dga' zhing yon tan kun ldan ser sna med// mdog kyang 'jam zhing kha dog gser 'drar 'gyur// dpe med mchod rten mar me phul ba yis// ud
213a3: pa la sngon po kha bye 'dra yi mig/ gsal zhing sdug la mig gi dkyus ring mdzes// dri ma med pa'i lha'i mig dang ldan// su dag mchod rten mar me dngar ba 'bul// de dag mig tu sdug cing mdzod rab rgyas// mig gi dkyus ring
213a4: mthon ga'i mdog dang ldan/ / skyes pa bud med dag gis lta ba'i 'os// mtshan mo thub chen spyan sngar thal sbyar 'khod// 'byor dang mtshan mo mar me'i sdong bu 'bul// de dag srid pa gzhan du 'bras bur ldan// rin chen
213a5: rigs pa'i 'od ldan lus kyang 'thob/ / rgyal la phul ba'i mar me 'chi ba na// dga' ba'i sems kyis 'dir ni dga' bzhin du// snying po skul bar byed pa de dag ni// spyan lnga dag kyang nges par 'thob par 'gyur// mi rnams//
213a6: gang dag dge ba'i sems ldan pas// rgyal ba'i mchod pa gzhan gyis byas pa la// rjes su yi rang don de ma byas kyang // mdor na de dag gis kyang byas par 'gyur// tshul khrims ldan pa phyogs nas lhags pa la// su
213a7: dag dga' bzhin mal stan sbyin byed pa'i/ / mi rnams 'gro ba dag tu 'khor ba na// gser gyi khri dang stan gyi mchog rnams 'thob// su dag rab tu byung dang mtsham pa yi// kha zas bzang po dge 'dun sbyin byed pa// de dag 'khor//
213a8: ba'i dgon par gnas pa na// kha zas kha dog ro las sogs ldan 'thob// su dag rab tu byung dang 'tsham pa yi// btung ba rgya chen dge 'dun sbyin byed pa// de dag 'khor ba'i dgon par gnas pa na// btung ba kha dog ro las
213b1: sogs pa 'thob/ / su dag 'jig rten bla mas gsungs pa yi// dam chos tshul bzang thos nas nyams su len// de dag nyon mongs chu rlabs rab 'jigs pa'i// srid pa'i rgya mtsho myur du rgal bar 'gyur// rgyal po dag pa'i las 'di
213b2: thams cad ni/ / 'khor ba'i bde ba sna tshogs smin gyur nas// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub dam pa yi// 'bras bu bde blag kho nar thob par 'gyur// de nas rgyal po dga' mdangs ldan pa yis// drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas/
213b3: nas kyang // thub dbang zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// rgyal po rgyal byed tshal nas byung bar 'gyur// gsal rgyal gyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ e ka bA thA / bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa gcig
213b4: pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// skyes bu khyu mchog khyod 'dra'i dge slong chen po gzhan dag lha yul sa la med// 'jig rten 'di na'ang yod pa ma yin rnam thos bu yi gnas na'ang yod ma yin lha'i pho brang
213b5: gnas mchog dag na'ang yod min phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med/ / ri dang nags su bcas pa'i sa steng rgyas pa kun du yul cig ga la yod// tshigs su bcad pa gcig pa rdzogs s+ho// /
213b6: @// rgya gar skad du/ tsa tur gA thA/ bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// skur gyur pa ni thams cad la// mtshan mchog sum bcu gnyis mnga' ba// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
213b7: grags ldan pa'i/ / rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs sangs gang du bltam pa dang // gang du byang chub la reg dang // zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // zag med mya ngan 'das pa dang // bde gshegs gang du bzhugs pa dang /
213b8: 'chag pa dang ni bzhengs pa dang / seng ge lta bur gzims pa yin// gnas de la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// stang dang 'og dang bar dag dang // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang // sku bcas sku ni med pa yi// mchod rten la
214a1: ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ / gang gis tshigs bcad 'di bzhi yis// de bzhin gshegs la stod byed pa// de ni tshe rabs stong du yang // ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho//
214a2: rgya gar skad du/ nA ga rA dzA b+he rI gA thA/ bod skad du/ klu'i rgyal po rda sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pas rab bstan pa// byang chub sems
214a3: dpa' skyes pa'i rabs/ / thams cad legs par 'dus nas su// shin du dad pa'i sems kyis nyon// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha yi lha// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na// dge slong rnams ni gcig la gcig kha stob
214a4: las sogs rnams kyis 'gyed/ / dge slong tshig ngan 'don pa dag/ drang srong chen pos gsan pa na// de phyir thub pas dge 'dun rnams// bsdus nas 'di skad bka' stsal te// khyed cag la stobs las sogs pas//
214a5: gcig la gcig ni 'tshe byed pa// khyim nas khyim med rab byung dang // de dag 'thun pa ma yin no// rtag tu yang dag dga' byed pa'i// chos drug gang yin la 'jug pa// 'di ni khyim nas khyim med par// rab tu byung ba rnam
214a6: dang 'thun/ / sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir// 'tshe ba med par des bsgoms nas// ji ltar byang chub don gnyer ba// dge slong nga las 'di nyon cig/ shes rab ldan pa'i mi yis 'di// thos nas sdig pa rnams
214a7: spongs la/ / grub dang bde ba thob bya'i phyir// dge ba'i chos la spyad par gyis// sngon gyi spun drung gyur pa yi// klu yi rgyal po gnyis byung ba// gcig gi ming ni rnga zhes bya// gnyis pa nye rnga zhes bya'o// gnyis ka srog gcod
214a8: las ldog cing / / tshul khrims ldan zhing dbang chen grangs// klu yi skye gnas la smod cing // ma yi srid pa 'dod par gyur// tshul ldan mang du thos pa yi// dge sbyong bram ze mthong ba dang // mi yi tshul du bsgyur nas ni// bsnyen
214b1: krung dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ / zlab phyed dang ches brgyad dang // bcu bzhi bcwa lnga gang yin pa// de la yan lag brgyad pa la// gso spyang la ni legs mnyam 'jog/ da gnyis sngon gyis gnas spangs nas// yul gzhan
214b2: zhig tu phyin pa dang / / de dang nye ba'i gnas de na// rnga sgra zhes bya'i klu gnas so// klu yi skyes mchog spun gnyis po// de gnyis 'od par nges shes nas// khengs shing khros pa'i yid kyis su// du ba can gyi dbugs 'byin cing //
214b3: khyed gnyis chos spyod ma yin te// g.yon can tshul ngan mchog pa'o zhes// rnga sgras tshig ni rtsub mo yis// yang dang yang du skrod par byed// dman pas bskrad pa thos pa dang // nye rnga rab tu khros gyur te// de tshe phu bo rda la ni// tshig
214b4: rnams kyi ni gos byas pa/ / kye rnga mi yi 'jig rten dag 'di ni// tshig ngan mngon du smra bas gdung byed cing // sbal zan chu yi 'gram na skyes pa yis// mche ba gdugs pas bdag cag skrod par byed// 'di ni chu nang dud
214b5: 'gro rnams la 'tshe/ / thad la mi nams la yang 'tshe bar byed// gtso bo gal te bdag la bzod mchis kyang // tshig dan smra la yid ni bzod mi nus// deng ni 'di yi grong khyer dang // pho brang gnyen 'dun bcas brlag ste//
214b6: rnga sgra gtan nas blangs nas su// 'di nas bdag cag 'dod par bya// klu yi rgyal po stobs po che// de yis nu bo'i tshig thos nas// yid la 'bab par byed pa yi// tshigs bcad 'di skad smras te bsgo// gang gis khyim
214b7: du nyin zhag 'ga' gnas shing / / bza' dang btung ba legs par blangs gyur pa// de la yid kyis gnod par mi bsam ste// byas pa gzo ba skyes bu dam pas bsngags// ljon shing gang gi grib ma yis// yul tsam/
214b8: zhig kyang legs 'gabs de'i// lo ma 'ang gcad par mi bya na// yal ka ljon shing smos ci dgos// nags tshal shing ni bcad dam bsregs kyang rung // slar yang skyes 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// lag pa rlon
215a1: bcad phyir yang mi skye ltar/ / grogs la 'khu bas yun ring pad mi thos// skye bo ngan pa yun ring mchod byas shing // bza' btung zhim po mang pos phan btags kyang // des ni nges par grags po spod
215a2: 'gyur te/ / glang chen gyis ni ge'u shi'i spyil bu bzhin// ji ltar chu 'gram shing ni 'gyel 'gyur ltar// mi gang blo ni g.yo zhing 'gyur byed pa// de yi mdza' bshes brtan par mi 'gyur te// shing shun mtshon gyis ras
215a3: dkar btsos pa bzhin/ / gal te mkhas pas dgra ba dag/ mi dga' bar ni byed 'dod na// sems la skyon ni med byas dang // de nyid kyis ni der gnod 'gyur// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang // sa rnams bdag gi khur min
215a4: gyi/ / byas pa mi gzo gang yin pa// de ni bdag gi khur chen yin// mi gang sems ni mi rgod cing // byas pa gzo dang byas pa tsher// byas pa chung gzon mi byed pa// de dag mkhas pas rab tu bsngags// chos bde byams
215a5: ba bde ba ste/ / 'jug dogs bde ba'i chu klung bzhin// grogs la 'khu ba med pa dang // nga snyems nga rgyal zad pa bde// khengs dang zol byed nga rgyal che// sdig pa'i grogs po bstan pa dang // stobs ldan rnams la
215a6: rgol byed pa/ / de dag rnams kyi grags pa 'jig/ de phyir khengs par mi bya ste// khro ba rnam par spang bar bya// khengs dang khro ba 'ongs 'gyur na// grags pa mtha' dag 'jig par 'gyur// gang zhig rgan dang byis
215a7: banang ba dang / / nyam chung thabs stor de bzhin dman pa dang // rgyal pos spangs dang skyabs med pa dag la// snying brtse med pa de dag mir mi rung // rang gi yul 'khor gnas spangs te// gzhan gyi ljongs su phyin
215a8: ban/ / tshig ngan so sor zlog pa la// bzod pa chen po bya dgos so// rang gi yul na brnyas bzhin 'dug pa bas// mi rnams gzhan gyi yul na gnas kyang rung // gang na mi rnams gzhan gyis mi brnyas te// rang gi yul
215b1: yin de dag rang gi me/ / mi mchog rnams ni brnyas thabs byas pa'i tshe// chung ma sdug dang longs spyod rgya chen gtong // ngan pa rnams ni de na'ang yongs su 'khyam// brnyas thabs byas pa de yang chu bzhin 'thung dang ba rnyed pa//
215b2: dkar ba ste// rgud pa mod pa yin pa'i phyir// sems can ngoms pas gyur pa'i tshe// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// gal te nod med phyogs nyung ngam// mdza' bshes phyogs kyi stobs chung ngam// dgra bo phyogs kyi stobs
215b3: ldan to/ / ba rag 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// mi rnams chos min byed pa dang // 'dod pa'i longs spyod mngon dga' zhing // dang chung ngo tsha med pa'i tshe// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// mi rnams khro bar byed pa dang // gnad
215b4: sems mang por gyur pa dang / / gzhan la'ang gdug pa'i tshul ldan che// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// mi rnams dad pa med pa dang // khwa bzhin mu cor smra ba dang // sgra dang g.yo dag byed pa'i tshe// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba
215b5: 'thob/ / mi rnams tshul khrims 'chal ba dang // gtum zhing gzu lums byed pa dang // bden pa'i chos dang mi ldan tshe// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// mi rnams dang tshul ngan pa dang // log pa'i lta bas bcom pa dang / gtum
215b6: zhing sdang bar gyur pa'i tshe/ / kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// ngo tsha med cing brdzun du smra// don meng pra ma tshig rtsub dang // dbyen dang khyal ba smra ba'i tshe// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// ya rabs tshul med shin du khengs//
215b7: nga rgyal gyis ni 'gyid pa dang // phrag dog brkam dang tshul nyams tshe// kha rog 'dug dang bde ba 'thob// gang tshe mi yi dus rnams dang // rigs rnams shes pa ma yin pa'i// mi dang lhan cig 'dug pa na// de tshang rgyal byar
215b8: mi rung / / gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang // gzhan gyi 'tsho bas 'tsho ba'i tshe// yul gyi phyir dang bde ba'i phyir// gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya// gzhan gyi yul na gnas pa dang // gzhan gyi 'tshe bas 'tshe ba'i tshe// sdang bas
216a1: 'khrug par 'gyur ba na/ / gzhan gyis brnyas pa de bzod bya// gzhan gyi yul na 'dug pa dang // gzhan gyi 'tshe bas 'tsha ba'i tshe// dman pas bskrad par gyur kyang rung // shes rab ldan pas de bzod
216a2: kye ma yul log bdag gnas shing / / mdza' bshes ngan dang phrad pa na// byis pa rnams dang 'grogs pa yi// gnas su mi ngan rten byed med// shes rab ldan pas de bsams nas// mi shes mi dang 'grogs
216a3: byed kyang / / mkhas pas nor dang longs spyod phyir// gzu lums kho nar khro ma bya// ji ltar thal bas 'aka' ba'i me// rtswa dang shing gas g.yogs pa la// rlung rnams kyis ni legs bus na// shin du rab tu 'bar/
216a4: 'gyur te// rtswa dang shing de bsregs nas su// chen por mchod cing 'bar ba yis// rtswa dang gal ba mang po dag/ ljon shing chen po sreg pa ltar// de bzhini rnam rtog bud shin las// byung ba'i khro ba me 'dra bas// /
216a5: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag la// phung khrol chen po byed par 'gyur// de phyir khro ba byung ba na// zhe sdang mnyen por gyur pa yi// byams pa'i sems la bsgoms nas su// mkhas pa rnams kyis zlog par byed/
216a6: bstod pa byas na mdza' byed la// ma bstod mdza' bar mi byed cing // mod la yongs su spong byed pa// de ni byis pa'i mtshan nyid yin// gal te 'di ni byis pa dag/ sgrogashog btogs pa'i bya lta bur// blo spangs
216a7: shes rab ma 'chal na/ / mkhas pa ji ltar 'tsha bar 'gyur// gang phyir byis pa phal cher ni// blo gros spangs shing shes 'chal ba// de phyir mkhas pa shes rab can// khyad par du ni bde bar 'tsha// mkhas pa nor skyed
216a8: dga' bar mi 'gyur la/ / phongs par gyur kyang mi 'khrul 'khrug pa med// rjes su gzung phyir phan pa de smra na// legs smra yin zhes gzhan gyis cis mi rtogs// mkhas pa gzu lums med par gyur pa de// de nyid
216b1: dbyang ba legs par mnyan nas su/ / de ltar rnam par bsams nas rang don dang // gzhan gyis don dag lags par spyod par byed// mkhas pa rnams ni 'tsho ba'i rgyu tsam gyis// sdig pa'i las rnams kun du spyod mi//
216b2: 'gyur// gal te bde dang sdug bsngal ldan gyur kyang // rtag tu chos don yongs su gtong ba med// blo ldan g.yo sgyu can du mi 'gyur te// rmongs par mi 'gyur tshig rtsub khro mi 'gyur// phongs pa'i gnas na mya dan mi
216b3: byed pa/ / gzhan gyis gnang la 'bebs par byed re skan// ha cang thal dang ha cang zhum pa yi// dman pa'i mi rnams lo yang ma yin te// bar ma'i gnas la bsten par byed pa dag/ de ni mkhas pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid
216b4: yin/ ha cang thal ba rtag tu 'khon// ha cang zhum pa rtag tu bsnyes// de phyir de gnyis spangs nas su// go 'phang bar ma bsten par bya// res 'ga' lkugs pa 'am 'on pa lta bur gyis// dus la bab nas bdag bzhin du
216b5: smras/ / res 'ga' gangs ri bzhin du bsil bar gyis// dus la bab na me lce bzhin du spong // res 'ga' rtswa dang 'dra ba zhum par bya// dus la ba ba na ri rab lta bur gyis// res 'ga' rgyal po lta bur 'gyur bar bya// dus
216b6: la bab na thub 'dra nags su song / / res 'ga' bkres dang skom pa'ang bzod par bya// dus su bde dang sdug bsngal dang du blang // nor phyir bran bzhin bkol bar mi bya ste// khro ba'i dbang du gyur par mi bya'o// res 'ga'
216b7: dga' ba'i glu dang sil snyan gyis/ / rtse zhing sha dang chang yang spyad par bya// res 'ga' ri dgas lta bur 'jigs bzhin song // dus su gcan zan bzhin du mnyams stsal bstan// dang por rus dang dus min dang // bdag nyid
216b8: stobs ldan stobs med dang / / dar dang rgud pa brtags nas su// de nas don rnams legs par brtsam// bzod med rnams la bzod pa dang // bzod ldan rnams la'ang bzod par gyis// nyam chung rnams la'ang bzod pa/
217a1: dang / stobs ldan rnams la rtag bzod kyis// bon gyis khon zhing nams kyang mi 'gyur pas// bzod mang rnams la'ang bzod par byas na legs// khros pa rnams la rtag tu dang ba dang // gzhan gyi skyon rnams
217a2: rtag tu bcab par gyis/ / gtso bo rnams kyi tshig ni 'jigs phyir dang // 'thab zla'i tshig dag 'thab gtsugs gyur phyir bzod// gang zhig 'og ma'i tshig dag bzod byed pa// de ni bzod pa'i mchog ces dam pas gsungs// gshe
217a3: dang gya tsom smra ba dang / / tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la// blo gros chung ngu mi bzod de// pad ma la ni rdo tshar bzhin// gshe dang gya tsom smra ba dang // tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la// mkhas pa shin du bzod byed de// glang chen me tog cha rab bzhin//
217a4: khro bo dang ni brdzun dag dang // tshig ngan smra bar byed pa la// mkhas pa shes rab ldan gyur pa// gang yin de ni thams cad bzod// rdo ba bsregs kyang 'dzu mi 'gyur// char pa bab kyang 'jig pa med// de bzhin bde dang sdug
217a5: bsngal gyis/ / mkhas pa nyams par 'gyur ba med// gang zhig bden pas gshe byed pa// de la mkhas pas bzod par byed// bden pa ma yin pa yang bzod// de las gzhan pa bstan du med// 'di ltar skyes bu mkhas
217a6: pa nor gyi phyir/ / sdug bsngal bzod bya bzod par 'gyur bar bya// gal te mi bzod mya ngan rnams spangs te// gzhan du song na stong phrag rnyed dang 'dra// yal ga stegs la 'ju bar mi bya zhing // chags bral sems
217a7: la chags par mi bya ste/ / bzang zhing sdug pas sa snyed gang bas na// 'jig rten yangs pa bzhin du 'gror zad mod// gang na brnyas byed bkur sti mi byed dang // smod par byed cing bstod par mi byed na// mkhas dang
217a8: yun 'grogs ched ka mi che bas/ / rang rgyal bzhin du ma sma de 'gro rigs// gang na skyes bu 'thab la dga' gyur nas// g.yo sgyu'i bsam ldan rtag tu grangs kyang med// kyal ba dbyen brdzun tshig rtsub smra byed pa// de che
217b1: mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song / / gang na mi rnams 'che bar byed gyur nas// phan tshun gnod la 'bebs par dga' ba dang // lus dang ngag yid sdom pa med 'gyur ba// de tshe mkhas pa myur du yul gzhan song // gang
217b2: na mi rnams phrag dog byed gyur nas/ / gzhan gyi rnyed la rtag tu mi bzod cing // sdang ba'i bsam pas rnam rmongs tshul 'chos pa// de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis// gang na mi rnams sdig byed 'dod gyur nas//
217b3: brkyang sti 'dod cing tshul 'chos g.yo smra byed// nang yang ma dag phyi yang ma dag pa// de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis// gang na mi rnams zhes med gyur nas// ya rabs tshul med khengs shing nga rgyal ldan//
217b4: byis pas mkhas pa rtag tu brnyas byed pa// de tshe bdag 'dod yul gzhan 'gro bar gyis// gang dang gang du bza' btung dang // gang du gos rnams rnyed pa dang // gang du 'tsho ba der song la// chags 'gyur gnas su ma 'dug
217b5: ga lan 'ga' rtsod 'gyur sred pa gang yin spongs/ / rtag khengs mchod med nga rgyal ga nga yin spongs// 'bras bu ngan pa'i khro ba gang yin spongs// phongs dus mi lta'i grogs po gang yin spongs// me yis gang
217b6: ba'i lam 'dra'i ma rig spongs/ / byas gzo med pa'i gnyen 'dra'i 'dod chags spongs// mche ba mi bzad klu 'dra'i chags pa spongs// dgra bo mtshon thogs lta bu'i sdug bsngal spongs// klu mo lta bu mi bzang chung ma spong
217b7: mgo la me 'bar lta bu'i bu rnams thong / / 'go ba'i nad bcas lta bu'i khyim rnams thod// btung ba dug chen lta bu'i 'dod pa thod// khyim gyi phyir ni ci btang ste// grong khyer don du khyim btang ngo // ljongs kyi phyir ni grong
217b8: byer te/ / bdag gi don du sa btang ngo // mi yi yan lag phyir ni nor btang zhing // srog gi don du yan lag btang bar bya// nor dang yan lag rnams dang de bzhin srog/ thams cad gtang gi 'dir ni chos sung ngo // chos spyod/
218a1: bal 'jigs skrag med pa nyid// chos spyod pa ni ngan 'gror ma 'gro ste// chos spyod pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dod par 'gro// chos mi spyod pa shi nas gdung bar 'gyur// mkhas pa nor rnyeng dga' bar mi'i 'gyur la//
218a2: nor zad na yang blo gros mi'i 'aldar bar// 'jig rten dag na cing kar legs chu ba// sems can nang na mi yi snying por chud// gang zhig dga' bas gzhan la nor sbyin zhing // nga rgyal mche ba rnam spangs bden la gnas/
218a3: rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i sems ldan de dag ni// dpa'o rtul po da ya rabs thabs ldan yin// gang zhig de dang de la legs bslabs pas// don rnams kun la mkhas par gyur pa dang // des la 'grogs na bde ba de dag ni/
218a4: dam pas legs pa yin zhes bsngags pa mdzad// nye rdzas smras pa// rnga khyod la ni phyi phyir zhing // 'di ltar bdag ni rab tu dang // bdag gi lus 'di skams pa 'am// yang na sems ni med kyang bla// sdug bsngal
218a5: shin du mi bzad par/ / lhur yang phyin chad sdig mi bgyid// tshul khrims nyams pa gson pa bas// tshul khrims ldan pa shi yang bla// skye ba gcig tu 'di yi phyir// ji lta bur ni mi zad spyad// bcom ldan 'das
218a6: kyis bka' stsal pa/ / sngon tshe gang du rab gnas shing // de dang der ni skyes pa na// mi dge'i grogs dang grogs pa yis// nga yis mi dge las rnams byas// dge ba'i bshes dang phrad pa na// mi dge'i las rnams spangs par//
218a7: gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yis// sngon gyi gnas rnams mngon mkhyen nas// de phyir dge slong rnams la ni// thub pas lung yang bstan pa'i mdzad// sngon tshe nga ni rngar gyur te// kun dga' bo ni
218a8: nyirnga yin/ / lha sbyin rnga sgrar gyur to zhes// skyes rabs de ltar gzung bar gyis// chos rnams sdud par byed pa yi// don rgyas mdo sde 'di thos nas// dge slong thams cad gos bcas par// chos la spyad pa nyid du gyis//
218b1: klu rgyal po rnga sgra'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs s+ho// / ye d+harma he tra pra b+ha bA he dran+teb+hats+tsha thA ga to h+ya ba data/ te ShA ny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma rA shra ma naH// 96// rgya gar skad du/ u dAn pa ra ga/ bod skad du// ched du
218b2: brjod pa'i tshams bam po dang po/ / thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis par gyur cig/ rgyal bas ched tu brjod gsungs pa// bdag gis rab tu bshad par bya// gnyid dang mugs pa rnams sol la/ yid
218b3: pa yang ldan pa / rna ga da / ga sa/ la mye /
218b4: can yin// skyes nas 'jig par 'gyur ba ste// de dag nye bar zhib bde// de ltar rab tu 'bar ba la// ci zhig dgar yod mgur ci yod// mun pa'i nang zhugs gnas pa dag/ ci phyir sgron ma tshol mi byed// rus pa thi ba'i
218b5: medog 'dra ba/ / bar ba gang yin 'di dag ni// phyogs dang phyogs su rnam 'thor ba// de mthong 'di la ci zhig dga'// gang gi zhub mo kho na nas// mngal du dang por 'jug pa'i mi// de ni sdod med 'gro 'gyur zhing // song ba las
218b6: kyang ldog pa med/ / snga dro skye bo mang mthong ba// phyi dro kha cig mthong mi 'gyur// phyi dro skye bo mang mthong ba// snga dro ba cig mthong mi 'gyur// skyes pa bud med mang po dang // dar la bab pa'ang 'chi 'gyur na// da la mi 'di gzhon zhes
218b7: te/ / gson pa'i rjeng drod ci zhig yod// kha cig mngal du 'chi bar 'gyur// de bzhin kha cig btsas pa'i sar// de bzhin kha cig 'gog tsam na/ de bzhin kha cig yongs rgyu gnas la la rgan
218b8: dang la la gzhon/ / la la dar la bab pa'i mi// rim gyis rab tu 'gro 'gyur te// 'bras bu smin pa srung ba bzhin// dper na 'bras bu smin pa rnams// ltung bas rtag tu 'jigs pa ltar// de bzhin skyes par gyur pa'i mi/
219a1: rtag tu 'chibs 'jigs par 'gyur// dper na rdza ma'i mkhan po yis// 'jim pa las ni snod byas pa// thams cad tha mar 'jig pa ltar// mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no// dper na thags ni brkyang ngal// sman ni
219a2: gang dang gang bcug pa'i/ / spun gyis rting la gtugs pa ltar// mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no// dper na nges par bsad pa dag/ gom pa gang dang gang bor bas// gsang sa'i drung du bsnyen pa ltar// mi rnams sreg kyang de
219a3: bzhin no/ / chu klung drag tu 'bab pa'i rgyun// ldog pa med pa ji lta bar// de bzhin mi yi tshe 'gro ba// slar ni ldog par 'gyur ba med// dka' ba nyid dang thung ba dang // de yang sdug bsngal ldan pa dang // myur ba kho nar 'jig 'gyur te//
219a4: tshul la dbyug gus bris pa bzhin// dper na phyugs rdzi dbyug thogs kyis// phyugs rnams gnas su phyin byed ltar// de bzhin nad dang rga ba yis// mi rnams 'chi ba dag drung du skyel// chu bran gyi ni chu lta bur// nyin dang mtshan mo
219a5: 'das pa yis/ / mi rnams tshe yang zad 'gyur zhing // srog kyang nye bar 'jig par 'gyur// mel tse byed la mtshan mo ring // lam gyis dub la rgyang grags ring // dam chos rnam par mi shes pa'i// byis pa rnams la 'khor ba
219a6: ring / / bdag la bu yod de bzhin du// nor yod ces pas byis pa brlag/ phyi rol nang na bdag med na// su yi bu yin ci zhig nor// skyes pa bud med rnams kyi rigs// brgya dang stong phrag mang po dang // longs spyod khegs
219a7: par bsgrubs pa yang / / 'chi bdag dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur// bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing // bslar ba'i mtha' ni 'gyel bar 'gyur// phrad pa'i mtha' ni bral ba ste// gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin//
219a8: gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pas na// sems can thams cad 'chi 'gyur zhing // dge sdig 'bras bur nye 'gro ba'i// ji bzhin las kyi rjes su 'brang // sdig pa'i las kyis dmyal ba dang // bsod nams byas pas
219b1: bde 'gro ste/ / gzhan dag gis ni lam bsgoms pas// zag med mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// gang yang sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos kyang // sku lus 'di ni spong mdzad na// skye bo pal
219b2: pa smos ci dgos/ / gang du gnas na 'chi bas mi tshugs pa'i// sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te// bar snang la med rgya mtsho'i nang na med// ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu zhugs na'ang ma ni// byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed
219b3: pa/ kun gyis lus 'di btang nas 'gro ba dang // de kun 'jigs par mkhas pas rtogs kyis te// chos la gnas kyis tshangs par spyad pa spyod// rga ba mthong zhing nad kyis sdug bsngal dang // sems dang bral ba'i shi
219b4: ba mthong nas ni/ / brtan pas btson ra 'dra ba'i khyim spangs kyi// 'jig rten phal pas 'dod spang nus re skan/ rgyal po'i shing rta shan du bkra ba'ang 'jig/ de bzhin lus kyang nye bar rga bar 'gyur// dam pa rnams
219b5: kyi chos 'di dam pa ste/ / mi mchog gzhan rtogs byed cing rga mi 'gyur// rga ba khyod ni blun zhing ngan// khyod ni mi rags byed pa ste// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs 'di yang // khyod kyis mngon par bcom par gyur// gang
219b6: zhig lo ni brgyur 'tsho ba/ / de yang 'chi bdag nyid kyis khrid// 'di dag rga bar 'gyur ba 'am// yang na na ba'ang 'chi bas 'joms// rtag tu ldog pa med par 'gro 'gyur zhing // nyin dang mtshan du rab tu 'jigs pa dang /
219b7: skye dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa// chu chen nang du gdus pa'i nya dang 'dra// tshe 'di nyin dang mtshan mo dang // 'gro ba dang ni 'dug pa na// chu klung chen po'i rgyun bzhin du// phyir mi ldog par 'gro bar 'gyur// chu
219b8: chung nang gi nya lta bur/ / gang zhig nyin mtshan 'da' ba yis// tshe 'di shin du thung 'gyur na// de la dga' bar byar ci yod// gson mtha' 'chi ba yin pa'i phyir// lus 'di yongs su rga ba dang // nad kyi tshad 'di myur
220a1: 'jig cing / / snod gi tshogs kyang 'jig par 'gyur// kye ma lus 'di mi thogs par// stong zhing rnam shes dang bral nas// dur khrod bor ba'i mgal dum ltar// sa yi steng du 'gyel bar 'gyur// rgyun du nad
220a2: kyis mngon gdung zhing / / rtag du mi gtsang 'dzag pa dang // rga dang 'chi bas 'tsher 'grib pa'i// lus 'di dor bcing mi rung // myur du 'jig cing na ba dang // rnag dang ldan pa'i lus 'di yis// grub dang bde ba bla med pa// zhi
220a3: mchog don du gnyer bar gyis/ / dgun ka dang ni dpyid ka dang // dbyar ka 'di dag bya'o zhes// byis pa rnam par sems byed pas// bar chad mthong bar ma gyur to// bu dang nor phyugs 'byor pa la// mi yi yid ni rnam chags
220a4: pa/ / 'chi bdag gis ni blangs nas 'gro// nyal grong chu bos 'das pa bzhin// 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na// bu rnams skyabs su mi 'gyur zhing // pha yang ma yin gnyen 'dun min// khyod la skyabs su 'gyur ba med// 'di
220a5: ni bya ba byas zin don 'di bya/ / de dag byas nas bdag gis 'di byas zhes// de ltar mi ni yongs su shom pa na// rga dang nad bcas 'chi bas mngon du bcom// de ltas rtag tu ting 'dzin la dga' mnyam par zhog/ brtson
220a6: bskyed la skye dang rga ba'i mtha' ma ltos/ / bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa mngon par zil non la// dge slong dag gi skye shi'i pha rol 'gro bar gyis// mi rtag pa'i choms te dang po'o// kun tog las ni 'dod skyes pas//
220a7: 'dod pa'i rtsa bar shes kyis te// khyod ni kun rtog ma byed dang // des na khyod la 'byung mi 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams las mya ngan skyes// 'dod pa rnams las 'jigs pa 'byung // 'dod pa dag ni rnams spangs na// mya ngan med
220a8: cing 'jigs pa med/ / dga' ba rnams las mya ngan skyes// dga' ba rnams las 'jigs pa 'byung // dga' ba dag ni rnam spangs na// mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med// 'dod dga'i rnam smin sdug bsngal te// dang po mdar/
220b1: la 'bras bu tshe// me sgron lag nas ma bor ba// mjug tu byis pa sreg byed bzhin// nor bu'i rna cha bu dang bu mo la// yongs su chags sems gang yin la ltos na// lcags shing gres ma las byas chings ma gang // de dag dam
220b2: po min zhes 'phags pa gsung / / 'dod pa'i chings ma gang yin de lhod kyang // rab tu dgrol bar dka' nas 'phags pas gsungs// brtan rnams 'dod pa'i bde la mi lta bar// de dag gtubs nas myur du 'gro bar
220b3: byed/ / 'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod min gyi// skyes bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'dod pa yin// 'jig rten sna tshogs de bzhin gnas kyang ni// 'on kyang brtan rnams 'di la 'dun pa 'dul// mi rnams la ni rtag
220b4: pa'i 'dod pa med/ / 'dod can gang la chags de mi rtag pas// yang srid med phyir sems kyis rab spongs la// 'chi ba'i gnas mi 'gyur bar byos shes gsungs// 'dun pa skyes shing zad par mi byed dam// /
220b5: sems la skyon med pa dang dran pa dang // 'dod pa rnams la so sor ma chags gang // de ni gong du 'pho ba yin zhes gsungs// mgar ba yis ni dngul bzhin du// blo gros ldan pas rim pa bzhin// skad
220b6: cig skad cig chud zad tsam/ / rang gi dri ma btsal bar bya// lham mkhan gyis ni ko ba dag/ yongs su sbyangs nas lham byed ltar// 'dod pa gang dang gang spangs pa// de de bde ba phun sum ldan// gal te bde ba
220b7: kun 'dod na/ / 'dod pa thams cad yongs su spongs// 'dod pa thams cad yongs spangs pas// mchog tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// ji srid 'dod pa'i rjes 'brang ba// de srid bar du doms mi 'gyur// de las gang dag
220b8: shes rab kyis/ / ldog byed de dag tshim pa thob// 'dod pas ngoms par mi 'gyur bas// shes rab kyis ni ngoms pa skyid// shes rab kyis ni ngoms pa'i mi// srid pa'i dbang du mi 'gyur ro// 'dod la chags pa'i mi gang yin// /
221a1: de dag kye ma chos min dga'// chung zad gson por 'dug pa na// bar chad mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// blo ngan longs spyod kyis bcom pas// pha rol tshol bar mi byed cing // bsam brlag 'dod la sred pa yis//
221a2: bdag dang gzhan yang phung bar byed// kar sha pa na'i char bab kyang // 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms mi 'gyur// 'dod pa mnog chud nyes med par// mkhas pa rnams kyis khong du chud// lha yi 'dod pa rnams la yang // lhag
221a3: par dga' bar mi 'gyur gyi/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams// sred pa zad pas dgyes par 'gyur// gangs can dang ni mnyam pa yi// gser gyi ri bo yod gyur kyang // nor des gcig kyang mi tshim par// rtogs
221a4: par gyis la legs par spyod/ / gang dag sdug bsngal de yi rgyu shes pa// de dag nam yang 'dod la dga' mi 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na zug rngu'i rgyur shes nas// de dag gdul phyir brtan pa slob par byed// 'dod pa'i
221a5: tshoms te gnyis pa'o/ / lus can rnam par rtog pas rab bcom pa// 'dod chags mi bzad gtsang bar rjes lta bas// 'dod chags phyir zhing rab tu 'phel 'gyur te// rang gi 'ching ba de yis dam por byed// gang
221a6: dag rnam rtog nye bar zhi dga' zhing / / mi sdug sgom pa rtag tu dran byed de// nga yi sred pa rab tu spangs pa yis// rang gi 'ching ba de dag rul bar byed// 'dod pa mun nag 'dra bas g.yogs// sred pa'i dga' bas bkab
221a7: dang / / bag med 'ching bas bcings bdag/ tshad mar chud pa'i nye dang 'dra// skyes bu bag med rab tu spyod byed pa// 'khri shing bzhin du sred pa 'phel 'gyur zhing // rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te// ma drung mun
221a8: 'dod pa'i be'u dang 'dra/ / mi dag dran par byed dang chags byed dang // yid bde ba la rtog par byed pa dag/ de yis yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khyams// tshal nad 'bras bu 'dod pa'i spre'u dang mtshungs// mi gang rtag tu bde
221b1: ba 'dod byed pa/ / skya dang rga bar nye bar 'gro 'gyur zhing // skye dgu sred pa rnams kyis mdun du bdar// rgya nang ri bong yongs su rgyug pa bzhin// sred pa rnams kyi mdud pa'i sems can dag/ srid dang srid min dag la sems chags
221b2: shing / / kun sbyor ro la dga' ba'i byis pa rnams// yang dang yang du sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur// skye bo grub dang bde rnams dang bral zhing // bdud kyi sbyor ba dag dang ldan pa de// rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te// ma drung nu zho
221b3: 'dod pa'i be'u 'dra/ / 'di na sred pa de 'dra spong byed pa// srid dang srid min dag la sred bral zhing // dge slong srid pa zil gyis gnon byed pa// lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan 'da'// gang zhig 'jig rten spang dga' ba'i/ sred
221b4: pa'i bud med 'dis bkol ba/ / de yi mya ngan 'phel 'gyur te// rtswa la char pa bab pa bzhin// gang zhig 'jig rten spang dka' ba'i// sred pa'i bud med 'di spong ba// de yi mya ngan ldog 'gyur te// pad ma las ni chu
221b5: thigs bzhin/ / de phyir ji snyed 'di lhags pa// khyed la smra yis khyed bde shig/ u shir phyir ni rtswa bzhin du// sred pa rtsar bcas drungs nas phyung // skyes bu sred pa dang 'grogs na// yun ring dus su 'khyam 'gyur
221b6: bas/ / sred pa drungs nas byung shig dang // mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med// yang dang yang du nye len cing // yang dang yang du mngal du 'jug/ gnas skabs 'gyur dang gzhan 'gyur bas// sems can 'od dang 'gro
221b7: bar byed/ / 'dirarin sprad kyi sred pa de// spongs la sa po tshad cig dang // de la sred pa med 'gyur zhing // de ni yang du 'khor mi 'gyur// dal 'byor chung ni ma gzan par// gang gis lha dang mi rnams su// don gnyer
221b8: bcings nas 'jog byed pa/ / yul la sred pa de las rgol// sems can dmyal bar skyes na yang // dal 'byor thal bas 'gyod par 'ong // gang phyir srid mtsho rgyur gyur pa// yul la sred pa 'bras kyi gzhi// 'khri zhing
222a1: rngubs babs byed pa/ / gdung bar byed pam bsngal na// sdug bsngal 'di ni yang dang yang // dam pa kun du ldog sa 'gyur// dbar na ldan shing ca nas ma gtan na// bcad kyang byang dang / bakho nang zad//
222a2: bzhin med pa'i phra rgyas ma gton na// yang dang yang du sdug bsngal 'di mi ldog/ dper na bdag nyid kyis ni byas pa'i mtshon// de yis rkun po'i mtha' yis bdag gsod ltar// de bzhin nang gi sems las byung
222a3: yi/ sred pas lus can nye bar gsod par byed// de ltar snod las sdug bsngal dag/ 'byung ba'i nyes dmigs shes kyis te// sred slong sa nye bar len med dang // dran ldan dge slong kyad tu zlas// sred pa'i choms te gsum pa'o//
222a4: bag yod 'chi med gnas yin te// bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas// bag yod 'chi bar mi 'gyur te// bag med pa ni rtag tu 'chi// de yi khyad par de rig pas// mkhas pa rnams ni bag dang bcas// bag yod pa la rab
